Alexandrine Tinnehof 22,  Amsterdam   This  spacious corner  house with 207 m²  of  living space is located in  a  quiet courtyard and on the water.  On  the floating terrace you  can moor a boat and enjoy the sun at the end of the day. There is private parking and a spacious storage room in the underground car park. The house has three floors; each with plenty of light and water views. On the ground floor is the luxurious kitchen with diner and a conservatory with access to the terrace. The impressively high ceiling has a void that connects the kitchen with the living room on the first floor. On the second floor you will find two bedrooms and a beautiful and spacious bathroom including a walk-in shower and a freestanding bathtub.  The house is located on IJburg's Haveneiland-West, where all necessary amenities are available; from shops and eateries, to schools, sports and recreational facilities. The nearby bus and tram stops, as well as several highway ramps, ensure perfect accessibility.  Layout:  Ground floor: The front door is located on a quiet car-free courtyard. Upon entering, there is a spacious hall with meter cupboard. Then one enters the spacious kitchen diner. Besides the high ceiling and large windows, the void makes the space even more impressive and provides a connection to the living room above. The entire ground floor has a natural stone floor with underfloor heating. The high-quality kitchen consists of an appliance wall and large cooking island where one can sit. The kitchen is equipped with Gaggenau appliances, including a steam oven, warming drawer, coffee machine, American fridge, dishwasher, induction hob and teppanyaki plate. Next to the kitchen is a large dining table with chairs, where you can enjoy the water views. The dining room has a special neon wall light from artist Celine States. Glass sliding doors separate the dining from the conservatory, which is ideal as a sitting area or study. Also here there are wonderful views of the water through the sliding glass doors, giving access to the floating terrace. Next to the stairs to the first floor are a guest toilet and a practical storage room.  First floor: On the first floor is the living room with lots of light. There is an oak parquet floor, a nice TV wall and storage room under the stairs. Near the staircase you will find a special work of art; specially designed for the house by the German artist Jörg Mandernach.  Second floor: On the second floor yet another special custom-made artwork by the artist Ted Green. From the landing there is access to the two bedrooms, as well as the bathroom, a separate toilet and a storage cupboard. The L-shaped bedroom at the front has a fixed wardrobe and stunning views of the water. The second bedroom, located at the rear, also has a built-in wardrobe. The spacious bathroom is provided with a bathtub, walk-in shower, two washbasins and a closet.  Outdoor space: From the conservatory, there is access to the floating terrace on the “Dwarsgracht” canal. It is possible to moor your own boat here, which can be used to sail straight onto the IJmeer.   Storage/parking: In the closed car park there is a private parking space with next to it a spacious storage room equipped with shelving units. The garage can be entered by car from the Talbotstraat. Right next to the storeroom and parking space, there is an entrance/exit that opens onto Alexandrine Tinnehof, just a few metres from the front door of the house.  Location: The house is located on Haveneiland-Oost in IJburg; a pleasant residential area where everything is at hand. In just a few minutes' walk there is Shopping Centre IJburg with numerous shops for daily shopping, as well as bus and tram stops with connections to Central Station, among others. Furthermore, the neighbourhood boasts various schools, playgrounds, parks and recreational beaches. Thanks to the nearby accesses to the A10, A9 and A1 highways, other cities such as Utrecht, Haarlem and Leiden can be reached in no time.  Features: - Living area: 207 m² (NEN measured) - Number of bedrooms: 2 - Number of bathrooms: 1 - Year built: circa 2006 - Energy label: A - Private parking and storage room in the underground parking garage - Situated at a quiet courtyard and water - Floating terrace with possibility to moor a boat  Rental conditions: - Rental price: € 3,300 per month - The rental price is exclusive of heating, water, electricity, TV and internet; tenant needs to conclude contracts for this himself - Availability: immediately - Type of contract: limited period of time (max. 2 years) - Deposit: amounting 2 times the rental price - The property is upholstered and has some furniture pieces  This information has been carefully compiled by Engel & Völkers. No liability can be accepted by Engel & Völkers regarding the accuracy of the information provided, nor can any rights be derived from the information provided.  The measurement instruction is based on NEN2580. The object has been measured by a professional organisation and any discrepancies in the given measurements cannot be charged to Engel & Völkers. The buyer declares that he has been given the opportunity to have his own NEN 2580 measurement carried out.

Spacious double-down apartment  (130m2)  with fabulous  roof terrace!  Fully renovated in 2012  (including  double glazing), and well maintained  (new  heating device in 2018). The original  characteristics (wooden floors) have been  retained, but all modern appliances are provided. The apartment is being offered fully furnished, including laundry machine, flatscreen tv, fast glass-fiber internet etc.   The apartment is situated at the 3rd and 4th floor, with private stairs. The 3rd floor has a large living room across the entire length of the house, connected to a fully-equipped open kitchen. A corner of the living room is partially separated, enabling use as a study/hobby room. There is a small balcony, which is great to overlook street life. The 4th floor contains a large master bedroom, two good-sized 2nd and 3rd bedrooms, as well as a separate storage room. The master bedroom has 3 windows and large closets. The 2nd bedroom has a double bed as well as a sink. The luxurious large bathroom is equipped with floor heating and has a bath and separate shower.  Perhaps the best feature of the house is the large roof terrace (55m2), which provides sunny views on the surrounding city all day long.  The apartment is located in a vibrant real Amsterdam area, with lots of restaurants and original shops and bars on walking distance of Tropenmuseum and Oosterpark. Furthermore, there is excellent nearby public transportation (trains, trams, busses).

Extremely bright and  spacious,  furnished, penthouse  of almost  180 m2 available per  immediately.   Layout  Entrance on  the  sixth floor, via the elevator. The  open living and dining room  surround the modern kitchen with cooking island foreseen of built-in appliances. The living area includes a built-in television in a state of the art designer cabinet. One bedroom is on the first floor, ensuite bathroom with a walk-in shower and sink. Down the hall a separate toilet, laundry room and work-out room overlooking Shell's gardens.  The beautiful spiral staircase leads to the top floor. Master bedroom with walk-in closet and sunny, south facing, roof terrace. In the hallway a separate toilet and two convenient home-offices, which can be converted into (children's) bedroom(s) if desired. Two spacious balconies facing north, including electric BBQ, overlooking the garden of the Shell office building. Modern spacious bathroom with bathtub, walk-in shower and huge roof terrace facing south. By use of a thermal energy storage system, the building is extremely energy efficient, keeping energy bills low.   Indoor parking in the basement of the building. Bicycle storage and indoor storage available.  Location  Among beautiful, brand new buildings, The Grid opened its doors almost two years ago. The double penthouse provides stunning views of the IJ from the balconies and roof terraces. Within walking distance you will find the cultural center Eye film museum. Also the popular A'DAM tower with its various restaurants and A'DAM Lookout which offers breathtaking views over all of Amsterdam. The Grid is within walking distance of the ferry station Buiksloterweg, through this ferry you (24 hours a day) for free within minutes at Central Station Amsterdam.   Details  - Available immediately, until December 31st, 2023; - Deposit equal to 2 months rent; - Furnished; - Two furnished bedrooms, two bathrooms, two offices/children's rooms; - Indoor storage space; - Indoor parking for 1 car and bicycle.

Important:  –  The  house is  available on  18/01/2023.  – The  apartment  is furnished and upholstered.  –  The rental price is excluding gas,  water and electricity and excluding  television and internet.  - Deposit is 2x the monthly rent.  – Contract period is for a definite period of time (2 years).  This characteristic 3-room apartment is located in the Woubruggestraat in Amsterdam. The apartment has a living area of 57 m2, was built in 1929 and has an energy label D.  Nice living in Amsterdam. ** Text in  English  below**  ZEER RUIM  APPARTEMENT GESTOFFEERD TE HUUR  IN  LOMMERRIJKE BUURT VOOR MAXIMAAL 2  JAAR.   ALGEMEEN Op een uitstekende locatie  in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid bevindt zich  dit riante ca. 200 m2 grote drie laags benedenhuis met een zonnige tuin. Het appartement is uitermate geschikt voor een gezin.  LOCATIE Het is gelegen in een zeer gewilde en aantrekkelijke woonomgeving met vele voorzieningen op loopafstand, zoals het Vondelpark, het Concertgebouw, het Museumplein met toonaangevende musea en chique boutiques, kwaliteitswinkels in de Cornelis Schuytstraat, de Van Baerlestraat en de P.C. Hooftstraat. Vele diverse trendy restaurants en uitgaansgelegen bevinden zich op loopafstand. Goede openbaar vervoer verbindingen in de directe nabijheid en betaald parkeren op de openbare weg middels vergunningensysteem. Het benedenhuis is zodanig gesitueerd dat u snel op de Ring A-10 bent. Ook zijn er diverse goede scholen in de buurt. De nieuwe vestiging van de BRITISH SCHOOL bevindt zich op loopafstand bevinden.   INDELING Via de entree stap je gelijk de gezellige keuken van het souterrain binnen. Daar bevindt zich een goed uitgeruste keuken. Aan de tuinzijde is de eetkamer met openslaande deuren naar de tuin evenals een  slaapkamer. Het souterrain heeft verder een toilet, twee bergingen en veel kastruimte. Het is ook mogelijk direct vanaf de straat naar de bel-etage te gaan.  Op deze etage zijn een grote woonkamer met aan de tuinzijde een schuifpui en frans balkon, een slaapkamer en een toilet.  Op de eerste etage bevinden zich een kleine slaapkamer, de badkamer en twee grote slaapkamers en suite met en suite kasten en schuifdeuren. De kamer aan de straatzijde heeft een erker en de kamer aan de tuinzijde openslaande deuren en een loggia. De badkamer heeft een bad, douche en dubbele wastafel en er is een separaat toilet.   BIJZONDERHEDEN * DRIE laags benedenhuis met eetkamer, 5 slaapkamers en een tuin op het zuiden. * Gestoffeerd te huur met gordijnen, verlichting, kledingkasten in master bedroom. * Huurtermijn maximaal 2 jaar conform Wet Doorstroming Huurmarkt. * Bouwjaar 1913 * Woonoppervlakte ca. 200 m2 * Tuin op het zuiden ca. 42 m2  * Utilities (G/W/E/internet) komen voor rekening huurder. * Borg 2 maanden * Huurprijs € 3.850,- per maand * GEEN DELERS!!  ----------------------------------------------------------------  VERY SPACIOUS UNFURNISHED THREE FLOORS APARTMENT FOR RENT IN AMSTERDAM OUD-ZUID FOR A MAXIMUM OF 2 YEARS.  GENERAL This spacious approx. 200 m2 three floors lower house (benedenhuis) with a sunny garden is excellently located in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid. It is ideal for a family.  LOCATION The house is located in a very popular and attractive residential area. Many amenities are within walking distance, such as the Vondelpark, the Concertgebouw, the Museumplein with leading museums and chic boutiques and quality shops in the Cornelis Schuytstraat, the Van Baerlestraat and the P.C. Hooftstraat. Many trendy restaurants and nightlife are also within walking distance. Good public transport is in the immediate vicinity and paid parking on the public road through a licensing system. The apartment is situated near the entrance of the Ring A-10. There are also several good schools in the area. The new location of the BRITISH SCHOOL (BRITAMS) is located on walking distance.  LAYOUT Via the entrance you step directly into the cozy and well-equipped kitchen in the basement. On the garden side of the basement is the dining room with French windows  giving access to the garden, as well as a bedroom. The basement further has a toilet, two storage rooms and plenty of cupboard space. From the entrance one can also directly access the first floor (bel-etage). This floor features a very large living room with sliding doors and a French balcony on the garden side, a bedroom and a toilet. On the second floor there are a small bedroom, the bathroom and two large adjoining  bedrooms seperated by sliding doors and cupboards; the room on the street side has a bay window and the bedroom on the garden side has French windows and a loggia. The bathroom has a bath, a shower and a double washbasin. There is a separate toilet.  PARTICULARITIES * THREE layers lower house with dining room, 5 bedrooms and a garden on the south. * Unfurnished to rent with curtains, lighting, wardrobes in master bedroom. * Lease period up to 2 years in accordance with the Wet Doorstroming Huurmarkt (Law on a freer circulation on the rental market). * Year of construction 1913 * Living area approx. 200 m2 * Garden on the south approx. 42 m2 * Utilities (Gas / Water / Electricity / Internet) are charged seperately to the tenant. * Deposit 2 months  * Rent € 3.850,- per month * NO SHARING!!

** BINNENKORT IN  VERHUUR  | Westerpark  West **   Eén toplocatie, drie  woongebouwen:  Salt, Pepper en Blend.  Gebouw  PEPPER is één brok beleving en  emotie’. Jong en oud vindt  hier haar plek in een 1-, 2-, 3- of zelfs 4-kamerappartement. Het wonen in PEPPER biedt alle vormen van comfort. De indeling van de appartementen is helder en niet ‘ingewikkelder’ dan nodig. Ze zijn allemaal maximaal van binnen naar buiten gericht, zodat je als bewoner één kunt worden met het uitzicht over de stad. De penthouses variëren in gebruiksoppervlakte vanaf 130 m2 en hebben allen een eigen balkon met uitzicht over de stad en/of over de groene Brettenzone.  • 3 woongebouwen: Salt, Pepper & Blend • Penthouses • Woonoppervlakten vanaf ca. 130 m2 • Indicatieve huurprijzen vanaf ca. € 2950 ,- per maand exclusief service kosten • Verwachtte oplevering vanaf medio juni 2023  Het Westerpark ligt letterlijk aan je voeten. Westerpark West wordt gebouwd en ingericht als een zeer hoogwaardige plek om te wonen, te werken en te recreëren. Picknicken met je vrienden, voetballen met de kinderen, rondjes hardlopen met je buren of in alle rust genieten van het uitzicht vanaf je eigen terras: dat kan hier straks allemaal. Van ‘tijd’ proberen we hier in alle opzichten zo veel mogelijk Quality Time te maken. Dat doen we met goede voorzieningen voor de hele buurt (denk aan horeca, kinderdagverblijven) en slimme, comfortabele gebouwen (gebruik van duurzame installaties en state-of-the-art techniek).   - Huren in Westerpark West? –   Ben jij enthousiast geworden over het project? Reageer dan op deze advertentie (contact met de makelaar) met je naam en e-mailadres. Wij zorgen er dan voor dat je als eerste op de hoogte bent van de start inschrijving en hoe dit in zijn werk gaat.  NB: Aan het beeldmateriaal (artist impressions) en plattegronden kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend.

Te huur: prachtig  3-kamer  appartement in  de Rivierenbuurt!  Omgeving "De Wielingen" in  de  Rivierenbuurt heeft alles wat modern  wonen  vraagt: rust, veiligheid, comfort, bereikbaarheid, voorzieningen en karakter.  Op een  steenworp afstand ligt de Scheldestraat met een uitgebreide keuze aan winkels en restaurants, eveneens om de hoek ligt de Beethovenstraat, een van Amsterdams meest aantrekkelijke winkelstraten, waar dagelijks boodschappen doen een genoegen is. Ook overige publieke faciliteiten liggen zeer prettig binnen bereik. Het complex "De Wielingen" kent verschillende woningtypen, van driekamerappartementen van 75 m2 tot enkele luxe penthouses. Bijna alle appartementen zijn luxe uitgevoerd, met een ruime woonkamer, twee of drie slaapkamers, toilet, een keuken met een modern werkblad, roestvrijstalen spoelbakken en ATAG inbouwapparatuur, een royale, betegelde badkamer met ligbad en luxe doucheset, moderne wastafel, spiegel en planchet. In de bijkeuken is een aansluiting voor de wasmachine. In de woonkamer zijn aansluitingen voor telefoon, televisie, radio en internet. Deze zijn ook door te lussen naar de hoofdslaapkamer. Een aantal portiekwoningen gelegen aan met name de Volkerakstraat heeft een ander uitrustingsniveau. Bij deze woningen is bijvoorbeeld de keuken niet voorzien van inbouwapparatuur. Alle woningen hebben een balkon, een (dak)terras of een loggia (inpandig balkon). Alle appartementen op de begane grond beschikken over een groot terras. Fantastisch turn-key studio  appartement  op enkele  minuten afstand  van de Noord-Zuidlijn!  AANVRAAG  BEZICHTIGING UITSLUITEND PER MAIL, BEZICHTIGINGSMOMENTEN:   - WOENSDAG 15 MAART TUSSEN 15:00-16:00  UUR  - VRIJDAG 17 MAART  TUSSEN 09:00-10:00 UUR  REQUEST VIEWING BY MAIL ONLY, VIEWING TIMES:  - WEDNESDAY, MARCH 15 BETWEEN 15:00-16:00 HOURS - FRIDAY, MARCH 17 BETWEEN 09:00-10:00 HOURS  Ligging:  Het appartement bevindt zich in Amsterdam Noord. Het winkelcentrum ‘Mosplein’ is op loopafstand. In vijf minuten fiets je naar het Metro Station Noorderpark en ben je in enkele minuten in hartje Amsterdam. Er is reeds veel gebouwd en het stadsdeel is constant in ontwikkeling. Daarnaast zijn er veel voorzieningen voor kunst en cultuur zoals het Eye Filmmuseum en Tolhuistuin. In het NDSM terrein zijn verschillende horeca gelegenheden te vinden zoals Noorderlicht, Pllek en de IJ-Kantine. Maandelijks vindt hier de vlooienmarkt in de IJ-hallen plaats. Voor uw dagelijkse boodschappen kun je terecht bij het winkelcentrum Mosveld. Ook ligt Cafe de Ceuvel, de Van der Pekmarkt en Van der Pekplein op loopafstand met gezellige restaurantjes en cafés. In de nabije omgeving zijn er drie pont verbindingen met de rest van de stad: Distelweg op 2 minuten fietsen, NDSM werf en Buiksloterweg. Wandel naar en door het Noorderpark of verken de buurt en omgeving per fiets. Er is genoeg te beleven.  De woning is ook goed bereikbaar met de auto en de Ring A10 is binnen vijf minuten bereikbaar. Voor de deur zijn er  voldoende parkeermogelijkheden en parkeren kan middels een parkeervergunning.  Indeling:  Via de gemeenschappelijk entree bereik je de hal met lift. Het appartement ligt op de 4e verdieping. Bij binnenkomst valt op hoe licht dit appartement is. Het appartement is energiezuinig gebouwd met uitsluitend duurzame en natuurlijke materialen en is er per appartement 3 zonnepanelen geplaatst. De woning is zeer recent (volledig) verbouwd en zeer luxe en trendy afgewerkt. Aan alles is gedacht. De vloeren zijn voorzien van prachtig laminaat, de keuken is stijlvol, de wanden zijn glad gestuukt en het sanitair strak en eigenzinnig. De keuken is voorzien van diverse Whirlpool inbouwapparatuur, waaronder een combi oven, koel-/vriescombinatie, inductiekookplaat, vaatwasser en was-droogcombi machine. Aan alles is gedacht, want het appartement is voorzien van een airco, slaapgedeelte en kledingkast. De badkamer is prachtig en voorzien van een wastafelmeubel, douche en toilet. Hier kun je direct wonen!  Bijzonderheden:  - Gerenoveerd in 2022 - Beschikbaar per direct voor 24 maanden - Huurprijs is excl. Gas-Water-Elektra-T.V-Internet en Gemeente Belastingen.  - Airco aanwezig - Separate slaapgedeelte - Energielabel A - De waarborgsom bedraagt 2 maanden huur - Woning is beschikbaar voor maximaal 2 volwassenen - Inkomenseis €4.500,- bruto gezamenlijk per maand - Vlakbij Metro Noord-Zuidlijn - Voldoende parkeergelegenheid  - Huisdieren niet toegestaan - Roken niet toegestaan - Oplevering per direct  De op deze website getoonde vrijblijvende informatie is door ons (met zorg) samengesteld op basis van gegevens van de verkoper (en/of derden). Wij staan niet in voor de juistheid of volledigheid daarvan. Wij adviseren u en/of uw makelaar om contact met ons op te nemen bij interesse in een van onze woningen.

**ENGLISH BELOW**  PER  DIRECT BESCHIKBAAR!   Schrijf  je nu in voor  de  beschikbare appartementen, zie de woningzoeker  op  account.southdock.nl/aanbod voor alle beschikbare woningen. Start  nu  jouw  huuraanvraag op de  projectwebsite SOUTHDOCK.NL. De eerste mensen zijn hun prachtige appartement al ingetrokken!  NDSM South Dock biedt ruimte aan meer dan tweehonderd appartementen. Van tweekamerappartementen van circa 62 m2 tot vijfkamerappartementen van circa 129 m2. De grote raampartijen halen het daglicht naar binnen, de buitenruimtes – een terras of balkon – geven een gevoel van ruimte. De appartementen zijn slim ingedeeld, waardoor de beschikbare ruimte optimaal wordt benut. De afwerking is luxe en met veel aandacht uitgevoerd. De badkamer en keuken zijn van alle gemakken voorzien.  NDSM South Dock ligt direct aan het water en bestaat uit meerdere gebouwen. De 18 verdiepingen hoge toren en de grote raampartijen geven NDSM South Dock een unieke uitstraling. Grootstedelijk en open, robuust en toegankelijk. De begane grond van de toren is gereserveerd voor commerciële activiteiten: kantoren, winkels en horeca. Daarboven komen appartementen. NDSM South Dock staat ook voor gemak. Zo is er een ondergrondse parkeergarage en dankzij de bringme service in de lobby mis je nooit meer een pakketje.  De gemeenschappelijke tuin en slim uitgekiende verlichting maken het compleet. NDSM South Dock heeft de perfecte mix van levendigheid, ruimte en geborgenheid.  NDSM bruist van de energie, het is dé plek voor mensen die alles uit het leven willen halen. In de directe omgeving vind je koffie- en lunchtentjes, cafés, restaurants en alle voorzieningen voor je dagelijkse boodschappen. En de stad is nooit ver weg, met de pont ben je in tien minuten in het centrum van Amsterdam.  NDSM South Dock ligt op een top locatie in Amsterdam. Direct aan het IJ schuin tegenover pontsteiger maar dan met de zon en het water op het zuiden. Door de gunstige ligging is het slechts 10 minuten rijden naar de A10 en sta je binnen 10 minuten op Amsterdam Centraal.  5 redenen om te huren in NDSM South Dock: - aan de zonkant van het IJ met uitzicht over het water en de stad - NDSM: een rauw en levendig stuk Amsterdam - twee- tot vijfkamerappartementen, voorzien van buitenruimte - het pontje voor de deur en voorzien van een ruime parkeergarage - vele voorzieningen op loopafstand  Meer weten over de South Dock huurappartementen? Zie de FAQ op de South Dock website via southdock.nl/# voor antwoord op de meest gestelde vragen. Voor overige vragen kun je contact opnemen met de makelaars!  AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY!  Register now for available flats, see the housing finder at myaccount.southdock.nl/housing-offers/ for all available properties. Start your rental application now on the project website southdock.nl/en/. The first people have already moved into their beautiful flat!  NDSM South Dock offers space for more than two hundred flats. From two-room flats of around 62 m2 to five-room flats of around 129 m2. The large windows bring in daylight, while the outdoor spaces - a terrace or balcony - give a sense of space. The flats are cleverly arranged, making best use of the available space. Finishing is luxurious and done with great attention. The bathroom and kitchen are fully equipped.  NDSM South Dock is located right on the water and consists of several buildings. The 18-storey tower and large windows give NDSM South Dock a unique appearance. Metropolitan and open, robust and accessible. The ground floor of the tower is reserved for commercial activities: offices, shops and catering establishments. Above it will be flats. NDSM South Dock also stands for convenience. There is an underground car park and thanks to the bringme service in the lobby, you will never miss a parcel again.  The communal garden and cleverly designed lighting complete it. NDSM South Dock has the perfect mix of liveliness, space and security.  Bustling with energy, NDSM is the place for people who want to get the most out of life. In the immediate vicinity you will find coffee and lunch bars, cafés, restaurants and all facilities for your daily shopping. And the city is never far away; the ferry takes you into the centre of Amsterdam in ten minutes.  NDSM South Dock is in a prime location in Amsterdam. Right on the IJ obliquely opposite the ferry pier but with the sun and water facing south. Because of its convenient location, it is only a 10-minute drive to the A10 and you are at Amsterdam Central Station within 10 minutes.  5 reasons to rent in NDSM South Dock: - on the sunny side of the IJ with views over the water and the city - NDSM: a raw and lively part of Amsterdam - two- to five-room flats with outdoor space - the ferry in front of the door and a spacious car park - Many amenities within walking distance  Want to know more about the South Dock rental flats? See the FAQ on the South Dock website at southdock.nl/en/#  for answers to the most frequently asked questions. For other questions, please contact the estate agents!

SPACIOUS LIVING IN  A  BEAUTIFUL AND  LIGHT APARTMENT  (75 M2) IN A  MONUMENTAL  BUILDING WITH A SUNNY GARDEN  OF  45 M2!  This attractive apartment  with  beautiful details has a  living room with open kitchen, two bedrooms and was completely renovated a few years ago.  LOCATION  Despite its central location, the Singel can be called a relatively quiet canal.  This apartment is located in a characteristic building between the Blauwburgwal and Brouwersgracht.   There are various options for daily shopping in the vicinity, such as Albert Heijn and Jumbo, but the Noordermarkt is also reachable within walking distance.  The huge bar and restaurant offers in the vicinity also makes this location so unique.  Within a few minutes you are in the lively 9 streets, with an array of hip shops and boutiques.   For relaxation, sports and also the necessary entertainment, you can cycle to the Westerpark within 8 minutes: the cultural complex where you will find regular festivals and markets all year round, but especially in the summer.  The house has a perfect location in relation to public transport. The Central Station can be reached by foot within 10 minutes, from where you can reach Schiphol Airport in 15 minutes.   You can also get on the Noord/Zuidlijn in the direction of the Zuidas in no time.  LAYOUT  In this beautiful and monumental canal house from 1760, Singel 68 in Amsterdam, the realization of 10 luxury apartments was completed a few years ago.  During the renovation of the classic and monumental building, no expense was spared to preserve the characteristic aspects, while at the same time living comfort was achieved that amply meets current standards.  All apartments are light, optimally insulated and have characteristic features.  Via the common entrance you reach Singel 68 K located on the ground floor.  On this floor are the living room with luxurious gas fireplace and open kitchen (equipped with various built-in appliances) and the first bedroom with en-suite bathroom with a shower and sink with furniture.  Adjacent to the living room is the sunny garden with lots of privacy!  The second bedroom is located in the basement and has an en-suite bathroom with bath and sink.  The washer/dryer connection is also located here.  Unique to this house is that it has been completely renovated from top to bottom while retaining authentic details including the authentic fireplace and the original wooden beams in the ceiling.  PARTICULARITIES  - Living area: 75 m2 (NEN-2580 certificate available) - 2 bedrooms - 2 bathrooms - Luxurious gas fireplace - Sunny garden of 45 m2 - Rental price: €3.000,- including internet and service costs; - Rental price excluding gas, water, electricity; - Unfurnished; - Deposit of 2 months rent; - Rental agreement for a maximum of 2 years; - Available immediately; - No students - No pets   This information has been compiled by us with the necessary care. On our part, however, no liability is accepted for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All specified sizes and surfaces are indicative. Tenant has his own duty to investigate all matters that are important to him or her. The NVM conditions apply.

SCHRIJF JE IN  VIA  DE PROJECTWEBSITE:  FRAME-AMSTERDAM. COM   The Frame Building  in  ArenAPoort, Amsterdam		  Op de  hoek  van het winkelcentrum Amsterdamse Poort en aan de  voet van  de Amsterdam ArenA Boulevard verrijst de nieuwe woontoren ‘The Frame Building’.   The Frame Building is een omvangrijke locatietransformatie van een leegstaand, verouderd kantoorgebouw naar een duurzaam woongebouw met in totaal 213 huurappartementen. Op de plaats van het oude ING hoofdkantoor zal The Frame Building verrijzen. De bouw is in de zomer van 2021 gestart en de verwachte oplevering van The Frame Building zal in het 2e kwartaal van 2023 zijn. The Frame Building zal in totaal 213 huurwoningen omvatten, waarvan 69 sociale huurwoningen, 37 woningen in het middenhuur segment en 107 vrije sector huurwoningen. De appartementen variëren in grootte van 26 m2 tot en met 102 m2 . Huurprijzen vanaf € 825,- tot € 2.600,- per maand exclusief € 50,- voorschot servicekosten, inclusief vloer- en wandafwerking.   Toekomstige bewoners van The Frame Building wonen gasloos en de appartementen worden aangesloten op het stadsverwarmingsnetwerk van Amsterdam. In de entree van het gebouw komt een pakketservice waar de bewoners hun postpakketten kunnen laten bezorgen of retourzenden in beveiligde pakketlockers. Bewoners worden direct op de hoogte gesteld wanneer pakketten worden afgeleverd en pikken het pakketje op wanneer het hen uitkomt. De bewoners kunnen gebruik maken van ruime inpandige fietsenstallingen en van een wasserette met professionele was- en droogautomaten. Op het dak van het appartementencomplex komt een gemeenschappelijk dakterras voor de bewoners.   Het complex is gemakkelijk bereikbaar en ligt centraal in de deelgemeente Amsterdam-Zuidoost op loopafstand van het openbaar vervoer en het winkelcentrum Amsterdamse Poort. In de omgeving van The Frame Building is een uitgebreid winkelaanbod voor alle dagelijkse benodigdheden en gezellige horecagelegenheden. Het Nelson Mandelapark ligt om de hoek en met de fiets is ook het Gaasperpark en Gaasperplas zijn binnen enkele minuten met de fiets te bereiken.  De ligging van The Frame Building direct naast belangrijke openbaar vervoersknooppunten zoals station Amsterdam Bijlmer ArenA en diverse fietsroutes – in combinatie met de grote fietsenstalling met maar liefst 430 plaatsen in de plint van het gebouw – stimuleert duurzaam reizen met openbaar vervoer en de fiets. Op 5 minuten loopafstand vanaf The Frame Building ligt het trein- en metrostation Amsterdam Bijlmer ArenA en sta je met het openbaar vervoer binnen 15 minuten op belangrijke plaatsen als de Amsterdamse Zuidas, Amsterdam-Centraal en de luchthaven Schiphol. Met de gunstige ligging van The Frame Building zijn de snelwegen A2, A9 en A10 met de auto binnen enkele minuten te bereiken.  Uniek aan The Frame Building is dat het project Turn-Key wordt opgeleverd met een hoogwaardige afwerking aan de binnen- én buitenkant. Zo zijn alle ramen van de woningen voorzien van zonwerend HR++ isolatieglas, zijn de binnenwanden goed afgewerkt, zijn alle woningen uitgerust met een Bruynzeel keuken met diverse inbouwapparatuur en is ieder appartement voorzien van een pvc- of houten vloer.  Let op; The Frame Building beschikt niet over een eigen parkeergarage. Parkeren is mogelijk (op basis van beschikbaarheid) in de nabije omgeving in de gemeentelijke- of commerciële garages (Q-Park). Huurder is zelf verantwoordelijk voor het regelen van een parkeergelegenheid. Wij zijn niet verantwoordelijk voor de beschikbaarheid, het aanvragen en wel of niet verkrijgen van een parkeerabonnement of vergunning.      Ben jij binnenkort de nieuwe bewoner van The Frame Building? Schrijf je nu in via  om op de hoogte te worden gehouden van start verhuur!

Zeer luxe wonen  aan  de P.C.  Hooftstraat! Nieuw,  op het hoogste niveau,  gerenoveerd  dubbel benedenhuis met luxe inrichting,  2  slaapkamers met een privé badkamer, Wellness,  domotica bediening  voor tv/sonos speakers, gordijnen, vitrage en jaloezieën en een riant dakterras met privacy screen. Het appartement ligt aan het rustige gedeelte van de Pieter Cornelisz Hooftstraat op een toplocatie in Amsterdam Zuid. Links van de woning loopt u het Vondelpark in en rechts de exclusieve winkelstraat. In de directe omgeving is er genoeg keuze uit goede restaurants, cafe's, scholen en supermarkten en met 11 minuten lopen staat u op het Leidseplein. Daarnaast is er een goede verbinding van het openbaar vervoer naar de Zuidas (18 min), Amsterdam Centraal (20 min) of het Westerpark (17 min), Met de auto ben je eenvoudig op de ring A10.   Indeling:  Bel-etage: Entree, toilet, openslaande deuren naar de woonkamer en open keuken. Het zitgedeelte heeft een luxe cinewall met ingebouwde tv, speakers en gashaard. De luxe Gaggenau keuken is voorzien van alle gemakken zoals een wijnkoeler, extra brede koelkast, vriezer, oven, combi-oven, koffiemachine, quooker, kookplaat met ingebouwde afzuiginstallatie.   Via de bijkeuken is er toegang tot het riante dakterras. Het terras is voorzien van electrische screens om zelf te kunnen bepalen hoeveel schaduw/privacy is gewenst.  Soutterrain: In het soutterain zijn er twee slaapkamers beide voorzien van een tweepersoonsbed, privé badkamer en een op maat gemaakte kast met tv-voorbereiding. In de lange gang is een lange kastenwand aan beide kanten, waardoor een ruime inloopkast is ontstaan. Aan de achterzijde is er toegang tot het Welness gedeelte, hier kunt u genieten van een sauna, turks stoombad, of de hottub.  Bijzonderheden: - Luxe keuken met Gaggenau; - Domotica:  bediening tv, speakers, gordijnen via de "huis"tablet. - Airco; - Privé Wellness: Sauna, turks stoomcabine en Hottub; - Groot dakterras met electrisch screen voor privacy; - 2 slaapkamers met een eigen badkamer; - 3 toilets;  Dit appartement is per direct beschikbaar voor maximaal 2 jaar en kost €10.000,- per maand excl. g/w/e.

Light and well  laid  out 2-bedroom  apartment located  on the popular Javastraat  in  Amsterdam East! Particularly sunny and  very  charming ground  floor apartment  of approx. 75 m2  with  a nice garden facing South-West.  The  apartment has a modern finish and  consists  of  2 bedrooms, a  large living room with French doors to the garden and modern kitchen at the front.  Layout:  The spacious living room is located on the garden side and has access to the sunny garden facing South-West, through double doors. The large modern living kitchen at the front of the apartment is accessible from the living room en suite. The attractive anthracite-colored kitchen is equipped with built-in appliances and a sturdy concrete countertop. The kitchen fits a spacious dining table easily. The beautiful solid shelves against the tile wall underline the sturdy atmosphere in the kitchen and are also very useful for crockery, glassware and cookbooks.  The master bedroom is located at the rear of the apartment and has space for a large double bed and cupboards. The second bedroom is also located on the garden side, which is currently used as an office but, given its dimensions, can certainly also be used as a bedroom with a double bed.  The bathroom has, thanks to the unique gray-blue tiles, a luxurious look and is equipped with a walk-in shower, wooden washbasin and a separate cabinet for washing machine, dryer and storage space.  Next to the bathroom is a separate toilet with Mediterranean tile floor and wall tiles.  The entire apartment has a beautiful wide plank floor and double glazing.  In the sunny garden there is a shed for the necessary storage space. Due to its South-West facing position, you can enjoy the sun all day.  The apartment is surrounded by peace and greenery but is close to all the bustle and activity of the city. In the immediate vicinity there are many nice shops, delicious restaurants and cozy cafes. The Olympic stadium, Stadionplein and the Zuidas can be reached within minutes. The well-known and beautiful Vondelpark and the Amsterdam forest are also nearby for a lovely picnic or a relaxing walk. The accessibility of the apartment is good with various options for using public transport and the Haarlemmermeerstation and Station Zuid / WTC nearby. Within a few minutes by car you can also reach the A10. There is a lot of parking in the area. In the Stadionbuurt 2 parking permits per address are available, without waiting time. A tramway runs through the Turnerstraat, which is only used as an emergency line and is therefore hardly used.  Particularities:  -2 spacious bedrooms -Very favorable layout -Sunny garden facing South-West -Separate and indoor storage -Modern finish -The house is offered unfurnished and upholstered for a rental period from April 1, 2023 to April 1, 2024

FOR RENT: Brand  new  and super  modern 'eco'  town house of 142sqm  (176  sqm incl. basement), located in  the  trendy Spaarndammerbuurt! This furnished house features  a  garden,  roof terrace, balcony  and a private indoor parking spot.   Location: The Spaarndammerbuurt is a trendy neighbourhood in Amsterdam West. This part of the Krommieniestraat has been built in the last few years and is very family friendly. For daily grocery shopping you can go to the Spaarndammerstraat or the cozy Haarlemmerdijk. The Westerpark and Westelijke Eilanden are located within walking distance. In the immediate vicinity is a wide range of trendy restaurants in the Spaardammerbuurt, Westerpark and Jordaan.   Lay-out: Ground floor There are 2 separate entrances, 1 for the house and 1 for the home office (it's possible to register as a freelancer).  Entrance in the hall with space for wardrobe. Via the hall you reach the cozy kitchen diner with high ceiling. The kitchen is custom made (Fontijn) and includes all modern appliances like a Quooker, induction hob with extraction, oven, microwave-combination with heat drawer underneath, fridge and freezer (all Siemens) and a Liebherr wine climate fridge. The big glass doors in the kitchen give access to the garden. In summer the trees make a good natural coverage and the house and garden becomes very private.  In the hall is a toilet.  First floor On this floor is the living room where you can have a sitting room and an extra dinning room or home office etc. There is enough space to give this room your own touch with some extra furniture or decoration. In the front is a lovely balcony with evening sun.   Second floor In the front is a big bedroom and in the hall a cupboard with the washing machine. In the back is another bedroom (now a kids room) and the bathroom, that features a bath, walk in shower, double sink and toilet.   Third floor Here is the master bedroom. A luxury bedroom with lovely Piet Boon blinds, custom fit wardrobe and shoe cupboard with fitted shelves. The walls and ceiling are painted with Bauwerk lime wash paint, which makes it very unique. In the back is the big roof terrace. In the summer, when the trees are in bloom and green, this is an amazing hideaway in the city. it's a cozy and quiet terrace and you have sun from 9am-4pm (very sunny!).   Basement You can reach the basement by the stairs in the hall on the ground floor or via the common hall of the association. Right now it's used as a storage room but you can also create a gym, home cinema or kids play room for example.    Indoor parking There is 1 indoor parking spot for this apartment (see photos). There are also 2 extra parking spaces that you can share with the other members of the association. Very handy when you have guests coming over.   Finishing level:  - Includes a private parking spot! - Garden - Everything is brand new - Concrete floors with Coaton layer on top of it - Built in spots - Cast floors - High ceilings - Under floor heating/cooling, controlled by a smart system  - Mechanical ventilation, smoke detectors, modern heating system - The house is very safe for children   Availability:  1st of March 2023  Contract: 24 months  Rent price: € 3.800,- per month, excluding utilities, including parking spot  Deposit:  Equivalent to two months of rent  Delivery level: Furnished  Reservation: This information has been compiled by us with due care. Fully and stylishly  furnished  and also  charming 4-room  apartment in a quiet  street,  ideally located in the beautiful  Rivierenbuurt  within walking distance of the Beatrixpark.   ENVIRONMENT  The house  is located in the Roompotstraat in the cozy Scheldebuurt (Rivierenbuurt). Around the corner are the Scheldestraat and the Maasstraat with numerous nice shops, specialty shops and restaurants. An ideal living environment; a quiet neighborhood with schools, nurseries and playgrounds within walking distance, yet with the bustling city around the corner. In 5 minutes you can cycle to De Pijp with, among other things, the Albert Cuyp market, but the Zuidas and Schiphol are also quickly accessible. Sports enthusiasts are in the right place here with the Beatrix and -Amstelpark, the De Mirandabad and the Amstel just a few minutes away. Various trams and buses stop around the corner and RAI train station and the North-South line are within walking distance. Both the A-10 and the A-2 are quickly accessible by car and you can park in front of the door.  LAYOUT You reach the second floor through the joint (now completely renovated) staircase. You enter the hall. From this hall you have access to both the living room at the front and the two bedrooms and an office at the rear. The living room has a combined living and sitting area and has a very luxurious open kitchen that is equipped with all modern conveniences. The kitchen is equipped with a kitchen bar and this kitchen bar gives you the opportunity to have a nice breakfast in the morning or, of course, to have a drink with friends in the evenings.  The house has just been completely renovated and everything was recently completed (February 2023). During the renovation, everything in the house has been tackled and this house from around 1930 now also has an A-class energy label.  The entire house is equipped with a beautiful PVC glued floor with underneath processed and underfloor heating throughout the house, which in turn contributes greatly to the living comfort that will be experienced. This underfloor heating can be controlled remotely via WiFi.  Furthermore, a separate toilet and luxurious bathroom has been chosen, which also has an extra toilet and a luxurious washbasin and the house is of course equipped with a washing machine and dryer.  The house is equipped with very good and high-quality new furniture and is completely ready to move in and you may soon be the first occupant of this beautiful apartment.  If you have become curious, respond quickly via our website to make an appointment for a viewing.  Available immediately in consultation  Price per month €2975 excluding costs for GWL and including service costs

Fred. Roeskestraat 92  A14,  1076 ED  Amsterdam  This spacious and bright  3-bedroom  apartment is located in the  modern  apartment building “De Fred”. The building  was built  in 2017 and has a beautifully landscaped courtyard garden. It is located in a quiet area between the Stadionbuurt and Zuidas. Accessibility by car and public transport is therefore perfect. Furthermore, the area offers numerous amenities and the city centre is within cycling distance. The apartment is on the 6th floor and can be reached by lift. The large windows provide plenty of light and offer wide views on three sides. The flat features, amongst others, a beautiful herringbone oak floor, high wardrobes in the bedrooms and a luxurious kitchen with a kitchen island and high-quality built-in appliances. Attached to the living room is a spacious 10 m² south-facing balcony overlooking the beautiful courtyard garden. In the basement of the building is the storage room and a parking garage, where a private parking space can be rented with the apartment.  Layout: The complex consist of three modern buildings, situated around the charming courtyard garden. This inner garden is reached via the stately main entrance. A short walk along the pond and cozy seats surrounded by pergolas with lovely plants and flowers, will bring you to the entrance of “building A”, where the apartment is on the 6th floor. The flat can be reached by lift or staircase. Upon entering one finds a spacious entrance hall with meter cupboard and a guest toilet. The bright living room overlooks the courtyard garden and features an open kitchen with kitchen island and luxury Siemens appliances. There is also access to the spacious balcony, where you can enjoy the sun all day due to its south-facing location. On the other side of the apartment are the two bedrooms. Both are fitted with wardrobes and have stunning views of the Stadiongracht and Amsterdam-Zuid. Between the living room and bedrooms is the modern bathroom, equipped with a walk-in shower, bathtub and double washbasin. Next to it is a practical storage room with a washing machine and dryer. The apartment has its own storage box in the basement of the building. There is also a parking garage, with the possibility to rent a private parking space.  Location: The apartment is located in Amsterdam Zuid, between the Stadion neighborhood and the Zuidas financial district. The accessibility is therefore ideal! The A10 highway is just around the corner and there are numerous public transport connections, such as buses, trams, metros and trains, which depart from the nearby Station Zuid. There are many cosy coffee corners, lunchrooms and good restaurants in the area as well as a wide range of shops. There are also various (international) schools close-by. Furthermore, the city centre is within cycling distance and there are plenty of opportunities for leisure activities such as Vondelpark, Beatrixpark and the Amsterdamse Bos.  Characteristics: • Living area: 113 m² • Number of bedrooms: 2 • Number of bathrooms: 1 (+ separate toilet) • Year of construction: 2017 • Energy label: A • Spacious and bright living room with modern open kitchen • Well insulated and well maintained • Large balcony facing south (approx. 10 m²) • Open view of the surroundings • Private storage room in the basement • Charming courtyard garden for communal use  Conditions: • Private parking space in the garage for rent separately (for € 250.- per month) • Rental price is excluding water, electricity, city heating, TV and internet; the tenant must conclude his own contracts • Unfurnished (but included: wardrobes, washing machine and dryer) • Availability: from April 24, 2023 • Type of contract: limited period of time, maximum 2 years • Deposit: of 2 months’ rent  This information has been carefully compiled by Engel & Völkers. A fantastic apartment,  approximately  75 m²  in total,  with a sunny roof  terrace  of almost 25 m² and  a  west facing balcony on the third  and  fourth  floor in the  Rivierenbuurt in Amsterdam Zuid. At the back you will find the open kitchen. From the living room and the kitchen you have access to the balcony. PENTHOUSE apartment on  the  Pieter Calandlaan.  Here you  live surrounded by facilities  such  as supermarkets, shops, restaurants and  public  transport. The apartment itself includes a  beautiful sun-through  living room, a modern kitchen with built-in appliances fully equipped and a spacious south-facing balcony with an unobstructed view of the greenery. Furthermore, the apartment has two bedrooms and a comfortable bathroom. In the underground garage you have your own parking space and storage room. Furthermore, this is an energy-efficient apartment with energy label A, which has been obtained, among other things, through the HR ++ glazing.  LOCATION The Pieter Calandlaan is part of the Nieuw-West district. Here you live in a convenient location, in the middle of various shops, supermarkets, a modern gym and catering establishments where you can also go for a snack and drink. You will also find more than 150 shops, food courts, a theater and cinema at the large shopping center (Osdorpplein). There are also plenty of relevant facilities such as childcare, primary and secondary schools in the vicinity. In addition, you live within a short walking and cycling distance of the recreational areas Nieuwe Meer and Sloterplas and the Amsterdamse Bos.  ACCESSIBILITY From the apartment you can walk to the nearest tram stop (line 1) in a minute, which will take you to the heart of the city center within 20 minutes. In 5 minutes it will take you to the NS lelylaan train station, which has a direct connection to Schiphol Airport and the Zuidas. You also live about ten minutes by bike from the nearest metro station (Heemstedestraat). Car travelers also live in a good place on the Pieter Calandlaan. From here you can reach the highways A4, A5 A9 and A10 (ring road around Amsterdam/Haarlem) in a five to ten minute drive.  ENTRANCE The complex of which this apartment is part has a closed entrance with a mailbox and the bell/intercom system with a communal hall behind it. From there you will find the elevator. This will take you to the eighth floor where the apartment is located. In the underground garage of the complex you have access to a private parking space  LAYOUT When you enter the apartment you have a spacious entrance hall. From here you can reach all rooms of this apartment, including the living area, at the end of the entrance hall. This is a real sun-drenched living room, something that is unique for an apartment. A beautiful floor has been installed over the entire apartment  Halfway through the living area is the modern light-colored kitchen with fully equipped. Finally, you can reach the wonderfully spacious terrace that belongs to this apartment from the living room. From this south-facing balcony you can enjoy an unobstructed view of the green surroundings.  From the entrance hal access to the two bedrooms, access to a neatly tiled bathroom with shower and sink. This house has a separate toilet with sink. Finally, between the bathroom and the toilet you have a storage space at your disposal, which also contains the connection points for both a washing machine and a dryer.  Rent: €2250,00 excluding utilities, parking in the garage €200,00 Deposit: three months  Available: immediately

Een ruim appartement  gelegen  in Amsterdam  Nieuw-West! Het  appartement ligt op de  10e  verdieping en heeft een fantastisch  uitzicht. Parkeren is mogelijk in de ondergelegen parkeergarage en hier is ook de fietsenberging te vinden. Het Vondelpark is in 5 minuten per fiets te bereiken. **IMMEDIATELY AVAILABLE**  Brouwersgracht  180 A,  1013 HC  Amsterdam **Semi-furnished or fully  furnished  if desired**  On one  of  the most desirable canals in the center of  Amsterdam we  offer a 200 square meters luxurious 04 room apartment with 02 bathrooms. This exceptional accommodation is part of a new building, realized under architectural qualities, and located in the famous Jordaan area. The project has taken 10 years to realize and the results are stunning. The building is situated on a double canal plot that was developed in 16th century.  The 12 meter wide facade faces south and provides sensational light and views. The building accommodates five layers, each approximately 200 / 260 square meters. Each floor contains one unique loft-like residence. Only materials of the highest quality are used and the building offers full comfort as well as several green solutions for energy efficiency.  The canal house was successfully designed to fit the area and connect former warehouses. But all offered comfort stands out and cannot be matched. We offer this apartment semi-furnished or fully furnished if desired.  Please take some time to go through the specifications that we think will fulfil your needs: •	Grand living room with open kitchen; •	2 fireplaces; •	Poggenpohl Plusmodo kitchen; •	Wolff 48” dual fuel range ovens:4 burners, a charbroiler and a griddle •	Sub-Zero side-by-side refrigerator accompanied by a wine storage unit; •	Gaggenau DF464 intelligent dishwasher; •	Natural stone flooring; •	3 spacious bedrooms; •	2 bathrooms finished on a Phillipe Starck level; •	Guest toilet with urinal; •	Storage closets; •	Water usage eco switches on showerheads and toilet; •	Walk-in wardrobe •	Box-in-box concept for warmth and sound insulation; •	One level floor plan; •	Ceiling height of 2,7 meter; •	Next generation floor heating systems; •	Nefit Topline Aquapower HRC heating systems; •	extra solarline-sunboiler with solar collectors for warm water; •	HR+ glass in all facade and patio doors and windows; •	Water capture for patio sprinkler system drainage; •	All extra electricity and gas are brought by Greenchoice, labelled greenest energy company; •	Energy efficient light sources throughout the building; •	Wheelchair friendly building; •	Integrated hi-speed WiFi connection; •	Any electrical expansions available on request (satellite/alarm/comp/...);  Lay-out: Ground floor, entrance door of the apartment, here you will enter the hallway that provides a view on the patio and connects the living room and hallway to the rear of the building. The patio, which has 9 French balconies on each floor, functions as the heart and lungs of the building. It provides a bright natural light source and home made fresh oxygen.  The loft-like living room, approximately 80 square meters with fireplace, is extremely light as the front of the building is facing south. The numerous windows and French balconies supply an unparalleled view of the beautiful canal and surroundings from different perspectives. The open kitchen is phenomenal and will amaze any cook or guest. Fully equipped and with the quality of a professional restaurant kitchen you now can enjoy at home.  The hallway attaches a guest toilet, a storage closet, a good size internal storage space, and a spacious bathroom with bath, large shower and basin.    Furthermore the hallway connects three spacious bedrooms, one of which is equipped with a fireplace. Between two of these bedrooms a walk-in wardrobe is situated which connects to the second bathroom with shower, toilet and basin.  This supreme quality accommodation must be seen and will definitely amaze you. It is located in one of the most sought after areas in town, and will provide you with all comforts for modern living. The accommodation is offered fully furnished to highest standards, but if required, the landlord is willing to temporarily remove the furniture. This is when terms and conditions are agreed of course.  Specifications: •	04 room apartment •	Ground floor with canal view •	Approx. 200 m2 •	02 bathrooms •	**Semi-furnished or fully furnished if desired**  Please contact our office for a viewing and you will be impressed.

Renovated and upholstered  3-room  apartment of  approximately 51  m². The apartment has  a  spacious and sunny roof terrace  of  approximately 32 m² and is located on the  third and  top floor.  NOT FOR SHARERS At the request of the landlord, it is not possible to make this property available to sharers. Sharers are understood to mean students and/or friends who rent the house together. The cohabitation of 2 or more (highly educated) working persons is also not possible. A couple or a family is eligible for this home.  THE LAYOUT Through the common staircase you reach the private entrance of the apartment on the second floor. Through the private entrance you reach the hall of the apartment on the third floor. The spacious hall gives access to all rooms of the apartment. At the front you will find the cozy living room of approx. 18 m² with a luxurious open kitchen. The handle-less kitchen is equipped with a 5-burner gas stove, a dishwasher, a fridge with freezer compartment, a combination oven/microwave, a stainless steel extractor hood and a natural stone worktop. The spacious bathroom is centrally located in the apartment. The bathroom has a bath, walk-in shower, double sink with storage drawers, bathroom mirror and a design radiator. There is also a separate toilet with fountain and a separate laundry room.  At the rear are the two bedrooms. The first bedroom measures approx. 8.8 m² (2.50 m x 3.51 m) and the second bedroom approx. 5.6 m² (2.50 m x 2.23 m). Via a fixed staircase in the hall you have access to the spacious roof terrace of approximately 32 m².  LOCATION The house is located in the popular area Rivierenbuurt (South District) near the shops on Rijnstraat and Maasstraat. Easily accessible by car via the ring road A-10, exit Rai and exit Amstel (S109 and S111) and by public transport. The location is ideal to quickly get to the center or to quickly go outside Amsterdam. Martin L. King Park is steps away.  THE MAINTENANCE It is a completely renovated apartment (renovation year 2020). All walls are neatly plastered and painted, the kitchen and sanitary facilities have been completely renovated, the electricity and central heating system have both been renewed and the entire apartment has double glazing. In addition, the apartment is equipped with both under and over curtains, surface-mounted spotlights and a beautiful floor has been laid.  PARTICULARITIES -Not suitable for sharers; -Rental price is excl. G/W/L; -Deposit of 2 months; -Minimum rental period is 1 year; -An income requirement applies to this object, based on a gross monthly income of at least 4x the net rent.

HIGH END FURNISHED  APARTMENT  IN THE  HEART OF  THE OUDE-PIJP!  THE  G:   Project THE G has  been  realized in the middle of De  Pijp,  where  Gerard Doustraat and  Tweede Jacob van Campenstraat meet. The project consists of 31 apartments, all of very high quality.  THE G is located in the most beautiful part of De Pijp, around the corner from the famous Albert Cuyp market. There is an abundance of the latest restaurants, hip bars and nightlife. But also various boutique shops and supermarkets for daily shopping. You will find an Albert Heijn literally at a later distance! Living more centrally in this popular neighborhood is actually not possible.  THE G offers you the opportunity to enjoy everything this popular place has to offer in the luxury of a very comfortable home.  Apartment:  The tastefully furnished apartment is located on the first floor of the residential complex and is accessible via the elevator.  The open living room is furnished with, among other things, a large comfortable corner sofa, teddy fabric armchair, round dining table, 3 luxurious dining room chairs and beautiful matching home accessories.  A nice chic contrast has been created between the light wooden floor and dark kitchen. The modern kitchen with AEG built-in appliances is equipped with a large refrigerator, combi oven and 4-burner gas stove.  The bathroom has a luxurious look due to the black with gold marble look tiles and is equipped with a large walk-in rain shower, toilet, washbasin and heated towel rail. The bedroom is located at the sunny front of the apartment and is equipped with a double bed, TV, a custom-built wardrobe and blackout blinds.  Location:  There is a good connection with public transport, the tram or metro (Vijzelgracht stop) will take you to Amsterdam Central Station, Zuid/WTC station and Amsterdam Amstel within 15 minutes. Sights such as Museumplein, Sarphatipark and Rembrandtplein are within walking distance.  Specifics:  - Living area of approx. 40 m2 - Underfloor heating throughout the apartment - Furnished (with the expection of kitchen inventory) - 1 bedroom - Spacious bathroom with rain shower - Energy label A - Elevator access - Please note: there is no dishwasher and there is no washing machine connection.  For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact ROTSVAST Amsterdam.

APPARTEMENT H–G LUXE  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, storage room  with  connection for the washing machine  /  dryer, large storage room for storage  /  technology,  separate toilet and  modern bathroom with walk-in shower and sink. Two bedrooms on the south side. On the southwest side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the west-facing balcony. All apartments of this type have a PVC floor, wall finishes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the real estate agents.  "We have compiled this information with the necessary care. In de verhuur:   Twee kamer  appartement met  terras in hartje centrum  aan  het verlengde van de Haarlemmerdijk  om  de hoek bij het Singel. Het ligt op  een uitstekende  locatie nabij diverse openbaarvervoers mogelijkheden en diverse uitvalswegen en op loopafstand van het Centraal Station en de Dam.  Indeling:  Eerste etage; de woonkamer met ruime keuken bevindt aan de achterzijde van het appartement. De keuken is voorzien van al de benodigde apparaten. Via de woonkamer heeft u middels openslaande deuren toegang tot het ruimte terras.   Aan de voorzijde bevindt zich de slaapkamer met uitzicht over de Haarlemmerstraat. De badkamer is voorzien van een douche, wastafel en toilette.   Locatie:  De Haarlemmerstraat is misschien wel de leukste en gezelligste straat van Amsterdam. Naast allerlei winkels zijn er tal van culinaire hotspots te vinden in de Haarlemmerstraat / Haarlemmerdijk. In de directe omgeving zijn onder andere de grachtengordel, Prinseneiland en de Jordaan met de Noordermarkt, Lindengracht en de Westerstraat te vinden met wekelijkse markten op de zaterdag en de maandag. Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen zijn diverse supermarkten en speciaalzaken aanwezig.  Bel of mail ons kantoor voor een afspraak!

In Slotermeer-Zuidwest mogen  wij  u een  zeer ruim  en licht gelijkvloers appartement  van  ca. 157 m² aanbieden. Het  appartement  is voorzien van 3 slaapkamers met  balkon en eigen parkeerplaats. Het  appartement wordt verhuurd met een leegstandswetvergunning en is niet geschikt om te delen door meer dan 2 personen die geen familie zijn van elkaar.    Het appartementencomplex ligt tegenover het overdekte winkelcentrum van Slotermeer (Plein ’40 ’45). Elke dag is hier de grootste markt van Amsterdam Nieuw-West, een ideaal gebied dus voor de dagelijkse boodschappen. In de directe nabijheid bevinden zich diverse winkels en zijn er goede openbaar vervoer verbindingen (metrostation Burg. de Vlugtlaan, NS station Sloterdijk). Op loopafstand is het heerlijk ontspannen aan de Jan de Jonghkade bij het water. Recreatiemogelijkheden aan Sloterplas, Sloterstrand en het Sloterparkbad zijn binnen enkele fietsminuten bereikbaar. Daarnaast bent u zo in het centrum van Amsterdam met de tram (lijn 7 en 14) of met de fiets. De uitvalswegen, zoals de N200, Ringweg A4, A5, A9 en de A10 zijn uitstekend te bereiken.  Indeling: Begane grond: Via de gemeenschappelijke representatieve entree kunt u met de lift of het trappenhuis naar de 3e verdieping. Via de galerij loopt u naar de woning en heeft u een prachtig uitzicht op de gemeenschappelijke binnentuin.  Derde verdieping: U komt binnen in een ruime hal. De woonkamer is heerlijk ruim! De grote ramen zorgen voor veel natuurlijk lichtinval en dat geeft ook direct een ruimtelijk gevoel. Via openslaande deuren is het aangename balkon op het zuidwesten te bereiken, waar de zon van begin middag tot ondergang aanwezig is. De woonkeuken is opgesteld in een U-vorm waardoor de ruimte optimaal wordt benut en er veel opbergruimte is. De lichte keuken is o.a. voorzien van een 4-pits inductieplaat en oven, afzuigkap, dubbele wasbak en vaatwasser.  Er is in deze opstelling voldoende ruimte voor het plaatsen van een kleine eettafel. Naast de keuken bevindt zich nog een ruime berging met veel opbergruimte. De grote raampartijen staan garant voor een mooi uitzicht vanuit ieder vertrek en in de gehele woning ligt een laminaat vloer. Aan de linkerzijde van het appartement treft u de moderne badkamer aan. De badkamer is voorzien van een dubbele wastafel met meubel, inloopdouche met ingebouwd zitje, designradiator, zwevend toilet met bidetfunctie en een kastenwand.  De slaapkamers zijn van goed formaat. Twee slaapkamers zijn van ruim formaat en bevinden zich aan de straatzijde van de woning, waarvan één slaapkamer met inbouwkast en openslaande deuren naar een Frans balkon. De kleinere slaapkamer kijkt uit op de binnentuin. In de gang bevindt zich nog een separaat toilet met fonteintje en een washok/berging met de wasmachine- en droger aansluiting. Om het geheel compleet te maken, beschikt het appartement over een eigen parkeerplaats in de onder gelegen parkeergarage en een extra berging in de onderbouw.  Dit gestoffeerde appartement is per direct beschikbaar en kost €2250,- per maand excl. g/w/e. De verhuur vindt plaats met een leegstandswetvergunning, dat betekent een verhuurperiode van tenminste 6 maanden. De huurder heeft 1 maand opzegtermijn en de verhuurder 3 maanden.

Bosboom Toussaintstraat 24-3,  Amsterdam   Charmant  en optimaal  ingedeeld appartement van 138m2  (  NEN-gemeten) in een karakteristiek pand,  met  ruim dakterras in een van de  leukste  straten in het populaire  Oud-West. Dit goed ingedeelde 4-kamer appartement is bijzonder sfeervol, recentelijk volledig gerenoveerd en in uitstekende staat.  Indeling: Via het gemeenschappelijke trappenhuis bereikt u het appartement op de derde verdieping. Op de eerste woonlaag van het appartement bevinden zich de drie slaapkamers en badkamer. De luxe, moderne badkamer is voorzien van een wastafelmeubel,  ligbad, inloopdouche en wc. Een  separate kast voor wasmachine en droger bevindt zich op deze verdieping. Op de vierde verdieping de lichte woonkamer met prachtige dakramen en open haard. De moderne, open keuken met kookeiland ligt aan de achterzijde en beschikt over alle moderne inbouwapparatuur. Tevens een gasten wc op deze woonlaag. Op de vijfde verdieping is het ruime dakterras met dakhuis en zonnescherm.  Locatie: De Bosboom Toussaintstraat ligt in de populaire buurt van Oud-West. Op loopafstand zijn alle voorzieningen voor uw dagelijkse boodschappen alsmede een brede keuze aan leuke eettentjes, cafés en goede restaurants. Het appartement ligt om de hoek van de gezellige Jan Pieter Heijestraat en 'De Hallen', met onder andere de Foodhallen, een bioscoop en een bibliotheek. Ook het Vondelpark is vlakbij. De bus- en tramverbindingen zijn goed en ook de uitvalswegen (ring A10) zijn goed te bereiken. VOORWAARDEN VAN TOEPASSING!   Perfect ingedeeld  3-kamer appartement  op de begane grond  in  het centrum van Amsterdam!  OMGEVNG:  Deze woning ligt pal in het centrum van  Amsterdam, in  het midden tussen het Waterlooplein en het Weesperplein. Het Koninklijk Theater Carré, Hortus Botanicus en Artis liggen allemaal in de directe omgeving dus er is genoeg te doen in deze buurt! De bereikbaarheid met het OV is uitstekend, met verscheidene haltes en lijnen bij onder andere het Waterlooplein, Weesperplein en de Plantage Middenlaan. Bussen, trams en metro's rijden hiervandaan naar alle windstreken! De bijzondere en wereldberoemde Magere Brug ligt om de hoek.  INDELING: Begane grond: entree, hal, toilet met een fonteintje, woonkamer met een half-open keuken aan de achterzijde, twee slaapkamers aan de voorzijde, badkamer voorzien van een douche, wastafel en een wasmachine aansluiting.  Separate berging gelegen in de onderbouw.  BIJZONDERHEDEN: - De woning wordt verhuurd "as is"; - Geen verhuur aan studenten!; - De servicekosten bedragen circa €. 26,47 per maand; - Garantstellingen worden niet geaccepteerd; - De inkomenseis is: het (gezamenlijk) NETTO maandinkomen moet minimaal 2,5x de maandhuur bedragen.  - 1500,- EUR waarborg; - De woning mag door maximaal 2 VOLWASSENEN bewoond worden (kinderen zijn welkom); - De huur is exclusief gas, water en licht; - Uittreksel bevolkingsregister is verplicht in het aanvraagdossier; - Verhuurder rekent eenmalig € 16,50 contractkosten; - Alle maten op de plattegrond zijn indicatief; - Oplevering per direct, verhuur voor minimaal een jaar.  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ENGLISH TRANSLATION:   Please note our terms & conditions first!  PLEASE NOTE:  - The house is rented "as is"; - No students allowed; - The monthly service costs are €. 26,47 each month; - No financial guarantees allowed; - Your (combined) monthly NET income has to be at least 2,5 times the rent; - 1500,- EUR as warrant; - Maximum of two adults (children are welcome); - Gas, water and electricity are excluded; - Available immediately, contract of a one year minimum; - Excerpt of population register needed for application; - All measurements on the floor plan are indicative; - The land lord charges one-time € 16,50 contract costs.  !!No exceptions will be made!!

ATTENTION! THIS APARTMENT  IS  UNFURNISHED AND  AVAILABLE FROM  APRIL 1ST TO JULY  31ST,  2023 (4 MONTHS TOTAL)  Top  apartment in one of the nicest  streets in  the Pijp area. This modern, bright en spacious apartment has two floors, two bedrooms and was completely renovated in 2016. This renovation has been done with high quality materials. In addition, the apartment has a cozy roof terrace.  Layout: On the 2nd floor of the building one enters the private entrance to the apartment. The internal stairs lead you to the the 3rd floor hallway with wardrobe space and toilet (half-bath). From here you will enter the living space with the light, modern yet cozy living room with modern gas fireplace and a bedroom. At the heart of the 3rd floor there is the modern kitchen with kitchen island. The kitchen is equipped with all modern appliances and has plenty of storage space. The whole apartment has a light coloured, solid oak wood floor. The windows on the entire width of the 3rd floor, both in the front as in the back, make this a bright living space  Through the internal stairs to the 4th floor. Via the landing there is access to two spacious bedrooms. The master bedroom is located at the rear of the house and has lots of natural light because of the two skylights, one of them equipped with a rain sensor. At the front of the house is the third bedroom that also has two skylights. The original beams in both bedrooms are exposed and renovated. At the landing and bedrooms you’ll see there is the same light coloured oak wooden floor as on the 3rd floor. The bathroom is modern and has a free standing tub, spacious shower with rain shower and sink. In addition, there is a skylight with rain sensor in the bathroom so there is plenty of natural light and both mechanical and natural ventilation. To end the tour on the fourth floor, there is a separate room with a second toilet and the connections and space for the washing machine. Through the open staircase there is access to the roof terrace.  Location: The apartment is located in the bustling and trendy Pijp area. Within walking distance of the Sarphatipark and one of the best markets in Amsterdam, the Albert Cuyp market. Also the city center is a few minutes cycling distance away. The Pijp is known for its wide variety of cafes, restaurants and other catering establishments, such as at the Marie Heinekenplein and Gerard Douplein. The public transport connections are very good. The metro ‘North-South line’ is at a 3 minute walking distance, as well as multiple tram stops.  Features: - Living space: 89 m2 (NEN measured) - Completely renovated (under architecture) in 2016 - Oak wooden floor throughout the house - Gas fireplace and central heating - Underfloor heating in bathroom - Smart features: Hue lights, Nest thermostat, Nest smoke detectors, rain sensors - Energy label: C - Three bedrooms

Wonen in de  Statendam:  de parel  van Overhoeks!  Fijn appartement in Amsterdam-Noord  van  circa 92 m2. De woning  is  voorzien van onder andere een keuken  in  hoekopstelling, een badkamer met  een ligbad en/of douche, 2 slaapkamers en een balkon.   Hammarbystraat 114 3-kamer appartement met een oppervlakte van 92 m2. Het appartement beschikt over een lichte woonkamer van 40 m2 met toegang tot het balkon. De slaapkamers bereik je via de hal. De halfopen keuken betreft een hoekopstelling en is voorzien van diverse inbouwapparatuur. De badkamer is voorzien van een ligbad en/of douche, designradiator en een wastafel. Het toilet tref je in een aparte ruimte. Praktisch is de inpandige berging welke is voorzien van een aansluiting voor jouw wasmachine en/of droger! Dit appartement beschikt tevens over een berging op de begane grond en één eigen parkeerplaats in de ondergrondse parkeergarage.  Rustig wonen met alle gemakken binnen handbereik Wonen in de Statendam: de parel van Overhoeks! De wijk Overhoeks, gelegen in Amsterdam-Noord, is een moderne, duurzame en groene woonwijk. Zo wandel je hier heerlijk over de IJpromenade. Overhoeks ligt namelijk aan het IJ tegenover Amsterdam Centraal Station. Lopend sta je binnen 10 minuten op de veerboot richting het centrum. In Amsterdam-Noord vind je onder andere de bekende A'DAM Lookout en het Eye filmmuseum. Verder tref je op 20 minuten loopafstand het Noorderpark en met de auto zit je met een kwartier op de ring A10.
