Spectacular penthouse, 2  bedrooms  / of  approximately 145  sqm located on the  fourth  and fifth floor of the  beautiful  new complex 'De Ontmoeting' with its  own indoor parking space and  fantastic roof terrace with a beautiful view!  Very light and spacious apartment in loft style with an unobstructed view over Amsterdam. This modern, luxurious and open-plan apartment has floor-to-ceiling windows that provide light all day long with stunning sunset views over the city. The apartment was built in 2005 and completely renovated in 2015 with a completely new layout. Spread over two floors, the apartment has a lot of outdoor space, with a south-facing balcony on the 4th floor and a very large roof terrace (45sqm) on the top floor. The apartment is uniquely private with no buildings opposite most windows and no adjoining roof terraces.  The apartment is fully furnished with quality furniture and appliances. Located on the 4th floor, the open plan designer kitchen catches the morning sun and is equipped with quality SMEG appliances including a 5 ring gas hob, a large and wide oven, a full height double door fridge and freezer and a dishwasher. Other kitchen equipment can be made available. The kitchen gives access to the spacious dining and living room, with 6 meter high floor to ceiling windows in the living area where you can enjoy the evening sun. The master bedroom has an extra long double bed (180 cm wide, 220 cm long) and a walk-in wardrobe with built-in shelves and drawers. The bathroom has a large bath to relax in, a spacious shower, a toilet and two sinks. There is a second separate toilet and a handy utility room with a washing machine and mechanical ventilation system. The 5th floor contains a second living room with TV and access to the roof terrace. The very spacious second bedroom also has a double bed and double doors to the large roof terrace.  The apartment is located in the bustling and popular Amsterdam East known as the Indische Buurt. The mix of cultures and diversity of entrepreneurs makes it one of the nicest neighborhoods in Amsterdam. There are plenty of great restaurants nearby such as Bar Mitts, The Meets, Pompstation and Wilde Zwijnen, and great bars such as Walter Woodbury's, Botanique and Bar Basquiat. Add to this the many different supermarkets and food markets nearby, clothing stores and so on, it makes for a very lively neighbourhood. Both the Oosterpark and the Flevopark are within walking distance, as are the Muiderpoort train station and various tram connections. Due to its central location, you can reach the A10 ring road in a few minutes by car and the center of Amsterdam in 10 minutes by bike.  The 145 sqm apartment is located on the top 4th and 5th floors of an award-winning design building. Access to the apartment is via the stairwell or the elevator, which also takes you to the indoor parking garage with an extra wide private parking space, which is included in the rental price.  Details: - Fully furnished - Spacious roof terrace - Private parking space in garage - Available from 01-03-2023 - Located in the popular Indische neighborhood - Lots of natural light - Rent € 3000, - excl. per month - Deposit 2 months - Rental agreement model B (max 2 years)  If you meet the following requirements, you can request a viewing: - Candidate has a permanent job - Income requirement 3 X the gross rent - House sharing not possible - Guarantee not possible - Pets not allowed - Smoking not allowed

APPARTEMENT H–H EXCLUSIEF  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, storage room  with  connection for the washing machine  /  dryer, large storage room for storage / technology,  separate toilet  and modern bathroom with walk-in shower and sink. On the east side two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. Also on the east side is the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the east-facing balcony.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the real estate agents.  "This information has been compiled with the necessary care. However, we accept no liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All dimensions and surface areas are indicative. The NVM conditions apply."

What a wonderful  house!   For  rent from  April 1, 2023 via  Home  of Orange: unique and fully  furnished  3-bedroom apartment (105 m2) with a  spacious roof terrace (12 m2).  In a quiet location in the center of Amsterdam and with all the facilities within walking distance. A monumental building with a view on the Montelbaanstoren!  Layout You enter the house and you step right into the hall where the 3 bedrooms can be found. The entire house has a beautiful wooden floor. The first toilet is also located in the hall. Adjacent to the second bedroom is the roof terrace, which you enter via a staircase. There is also an own space for the washing machine and dryer on the first floor.  The living room, kitchen and bathroom can be found on the second floor of the house. The living room has patio doors at the back. The spacious kitchen and dining room can be reached through the patio doors. The modern open kitchen has various built-in appliances, such as a combination microwave, refrigerator, freezer, gas stove and dishwasher.  The modern bathroom has a walk-in shower, bathtub, double sink and a second toilet.  Location The apartment is located in the center of Amsterdam near Amsterdam Central, Dam Square, Kalverstraat and Oosterpark for a green environment. The Nieuwmarkt and Waterlooplein are just around the corner and in the weekend you can find a market overhre. All the restaurants you can think of are within walking distance. The supermarkets are also around the corner, including an organic supermarket. Lively neighborhood in the center of Amsterdam, but also a quiet and child-friendly street.  The apartment is easily accessible by car via the A-10 ring road and by public transport (Amsterdam central within walking distance). For information about a parking permit, you can consult the website of the municipality of Amsterdam.  Particularities • Available from April 1, 2023 • Rental price €3450.00 excl. per month • Deposit 2 months rent • 3 bedrooms • Fully furnished • Pets in consultation • House of over 105 m2 • Roof terrace of 12 m2 • Fantastic location  Interested? Stairs towards roof-terrace. Beautiful and sunny roof-terrace overlooking the museum-square and "Rijks-museum". In het bruisende  centrum  van Osdorpplein,  met alle  faciliteiten binnen handbereik ligt  een  slim ingedeeld, mooi afgewerkt, driekamerappartement  van  ca. 63.8 m² op de 2e  verdieping.   De woonkamer is  letterlijk het centrale gedeelte van deze woning. De open hoekkeuken en het woongedeelte zijn één geheel en kunnen via bijvoorbeeld een eetgedeelte toch van elkaar gescheiden worden. Vanuit de woonkamer stap je jouw heerlijke loggia van 4,1 m² op die gelegen is op het zuidoosten. Geniet hier optimaal van de eerste zonnestralen. De grootste slaapkamer is ruim en grenst direct aan de badkamer. Zo stap je gelijk vanuit je bed onder de douche. Wat een luxe!  De woning wordt opgeleverd met afgewerkte wanden zodat jij er bijna gelijk in kunt trekken.  Het appartement is voorzien van een moderne, CO2-neutraal geproduceerde Bruynzeel keuken, uitgevoerd in model Atlas met zwarte Stretto greep lijst, de kasten zijn wit en het keukenblad is modern lichtgrijs. De keuken is voorzien van luxe inbouwapparatuur van het merk Siemens en beschikt onder meer over een combimagnetron, vaatwasser, inductiekookplaat en koelkast met vriesvak. De kasten zijn extra hoog, waardoor je nog meer opbergruimte tot jouw beschikking hebt.  De badkamer is voorzien van een inloopdouche met Hansgrohe douchemengkraan, een Villeroy & Boch wastafel met meubel en een ronde spiegel boven de wastafel. De wanden zijn afgewerkt met witte wandtegels en donkergrijze vloertegels. Het toilet is eveneens Villeroy & Boch en heeft een fonteintje.  Op het dak zijn 3 zonnepanelen direct gekoppeld naar de meter van het appartement. De opbrengst komt dus direct ten goede van het eigen verbruik.  NEW CENTRAL LIVING | 40 HUURAPPARTEMENTEN IN OSDORPPLEIN, AMSTERDAM. Waar nieuwe energie ontstaat en oude glorie bruist. Dat is de plek waar The Hub Apartments het stralende middelpunt in het vernieuwde Osdorpplein in Amsterdam wordt. Midden in het Osdorpplein komen 40 huurappartementen en vormt zich dé plek waar je wilt wonen, werken, winkelen, uitgaan en ontspannen. Je huurt hier straks vanaf circa €1.350,- per maand  (excl. servicekosten). Je hebt straks ook de mogelijkheid om gemeubileerd te huren bij The Hub Apartments.  WONINGTYPES In The Hub Apartments kun je kiezen uit 2- en 3-kamerappartementen variërend in grootte van circa 47 tot 76 m². De huurprijs is vanaf circa €1.320,- per maand  (excl. Servicekosten). De definitieve servicekosten zijn nog niet bekend. Het voorschot servicekosten is voor nu vastgesteld op een bijdrage van € 75,- per maand.  THE HUB | HET MIDDELPUNT Vanuit The Hub Apartments is alles dichtbij: de binnenstad van Amsterdam, uitvalswegen naar plekken buiten de stad zoals bijvoorbeeld Schiphol. Blijf je in de buurt, dan heb je rondom Osdorpplein al mogelijkheden te over. Van de dagelijkse boodschappen tot sneaker speciaalzaak en van snelle lunch tot romantisch dineren, keuze genoeg. Ook voor events en cultuur ben je om de hoek bij het Theater de Meervaart aan het juiste adres. Een echt middelpunt dus.  Meer weten? Wil je meer weten over de verschillende type appartementen die in The Hub Apartments beschikbaar zijn en je interesse bij ons kenbaar maken, ga dan naar de projectwebsite thehubapartments.nl.  De link naar deze pagina staat op de projectpagina onder de kaart. Of neem contact op met Eefje Voogd makelaardij.  "Deze informatie is door ons met de nodige zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan. Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn indicatief. Van toepassing zijn de NVM voorwaarden."

Thans bieden wij  aan  deze fraaie  bovenwoning op  de eerste verdieping met  twee  slaapkamers. Het appartement is gelegen  in  de rustige Karel du Jardinstraat in  de Nieuwe  Pijp en is op enkele minuten loopafstand van het Sarphatipark. De foto's zijn van recent na de verbouwing een aantal jaar terug. Inmiddels is de woning bewoond geweest.  Indeling: Het appartement heeft een eigen entree op het bordes op de eerste verdieping. U staat direct in de hal die alle ruimtes met elkaar verbindt. Aan de voorzijde van het appartement ligt de woonkamer met daar aan grenzend de half open keuken. De woonkamer is door zijn grote raampartij heerlijk licht. De moderne keuken is voorzien van inbouwapparatuur.   De twee ruime slaapkamers bevinden zich aan de rustige achterzijde van het appartement. Vanuit beide slaapkamers is het balkon te bereiken. In het midden van het appartement is de badkamer gesitueerd die voorzien is van een wastafelmeubel, inloopdouche en wc.  Omgeving: Het appartement is gelegen in een zeer rustige straat, maar gelegen op loopafstand van het bruisende hart van de Pijp. De welbekende Albert Cuypmarkt en het Sarphatipark liggen op enkele minuten loopafstand. Uitstekende bereikbaarheid door middel van eigen en openbaar vervoer. Diverse tram- en busverbindingen zijn op korte afstand te vinden (en de Noord-Zuid lijn bij gereedkomen).  Bijzonderheden: -  Twee ruime slaapkamers; -  V.v. dubbel glas: Energielabel B; -  Mechanische ventilatie; -  Minimale huurperiode 1 jaar; -  2 maanden borg; -  Niet beschikbaar voor studenten;  Huurprijs €2.250,- per maand excl. G/W/L en servicekosten

Ruime begane grond  woning  met 2  slaapkamers, grote  woonkamer met open keuken,  badkamer  voor- en achtertuin. De woning  is  in november 2021 compleet gerenoveerd (keuken, badkamer, vloer,  toilet, wanden).  De woning is gelegen in een rustige woonwijk in Oost en zeer kindvriendelijk. Op loopafstand bevinden zich het Muiderpoortstation, het Oosterpark en de Dappermarkt.  Indeling In deze rustige woonwijk bereikt u via de voordeur het appartement op de begane grond. U komt binnen in de gang die leidt tot de keuken. De open keuken grenzend aan de woonkamer is voorzien van alle gemakken met Siemens en AEG inbouwapparatuur. De woonkamer is gelegen aan de voorzijde en krijgt veel licht binnen door de grote raampartij. De badkamer is voorzien van een inloop regendouche, wastafelmeubel en grote badkamerkast. Tegenover de badkamer zit het separate toilet. Aan de achterzijde van de woningen bevinden zich de twee opvallend ruime en lichte slaapkamers. Vanuit de linker slaapkamer is de achtertuin waar u heerlijk s ’ochtends in het zonnetje kunt zitten. Ook heeft u toegang tot de prachtige binnentuin waar speeltoestellen staan voor kinderen. Hiernaast bevat de woning 1 interne berging met aansluitingen voor een wasmachine en droger.  Omgeving Op loopafstand bevinden zich het Muiderpoortstation, Flevopark, Oosterpark, Sciencepark, de gezellige winkelstraten (Middenweg, Javastraat, Dappermarkt), maar ook hartje Amsterdam is prima bereikbaar per fiets of per openbaar vervoer. Bent u afhankelijk van een auto: geen wachttijden voor een parkeervergunning, en in no time op de A10 !  Bijzonderheden: Woonoppervlakte ca. 80 m2; Per 1 mei beschikbaar; Compleet gerenoveerd in 2022; Achtertuin van 15 m2 (en toegang tot de grote binnentuin); Benedenwoning met tuin; 2 Slaapkamers; 1 Inpandige berging met wasmachine en droger aansluitingen; Geen servicekosten; Huurprijs is excl. G-W-E- T.V & Internet en Gemeentebelastingen; Max 2 personen en huisdieren niet toegestaan.  AVAILABLE AS MAY 1 - COMPLETELY RENOVATED 80M2 TWO-BEDROOM APARTMENT IN AMSTERDAM EAST  Spacious ground floor apartment with 2 bedrooms, large living room with open kitchen, bathroom, and front and back garden. The apartment is completely renovated (kitchen, bathroom, toilet, floor and walls) in 2022. The property is located in a quiet residential area in the East and very child friendly. The Muiderpoort station, Oosterpark and Dappermarkt are within walking distance.  Layout In this quiet residential area you can reach the apartment on the ground floor through the front door. You enter the hallway that leads to the kitchen. The open kitchen adjacent to the living room is equipped with all conveniences with (Siemens and AEG) appliances. The living room is located at the front and gets a lot of light through the large windows. The modern bathroom has a walk-in rain shower and washbasin furniture. Opposite the bathroom is the separate toilet. At the rear of the houses are the two strikingly spacious and bright bedrooms. From the left bedroom is the back garden where you can sit in the sun in the morning. In addition, the house contains 1 internal storage room with room for a wasmachine and tumble dryer.  Surroundings The Muiderpoort station, Flevopark, Oosterpark, Sciencepark, the cozy shopping streets (Middenweg, Javastraat, Dappermarkt) are within walking distance, but the heart of Amsterdam is also easily accessible by bicycle or public transport. Are you dependent on a car: no waiting times for a parking permit, and in no time on the A10!  Particularities Living area 80 m2; Backyard 15 m2; Available from may 1; Completely renovated in november 2021; Ground floor apartment with garden; 2 Bedrooms; 1 Storage with room for wasmachine and tumble dryer; No service costs; Max 2 persons and pets not allowed.

High-quality renovated 3-room  apartment  of approximately  69 m²  with two bedrooms and  a  sunny balcony of approximately 6  m².  The house has its own entrance.   NOT  FOR SHARERS At  the request of the landlord, it is not possible to make this property available to sharers. Sharers are understood to mean students and/or friends who rent the house together. The cohabitation of 2 or more (highly educated) working persons is also not possible. A couple or a family is eligible for this home.  THE LAYOUT Through the porch you reach the private entrance of the apartment on the first floor. The spacious hall gives access to all rooms of the apartment. At the front you will find the living room with luxurious open kitchen. The handle-less kitchen is equipped with a 5-burner gas stove, a dishwasher, a refrigerator, a freezer with 3 drawers, a combination oven/microwave, a stainless steel extractor hood and a natural stone worktop. The spacious bathroom is centrally located in the apartment. The bathroom has a walk-in shower, bath, double sink with storage drawers, bathroom mirror and design radiator. The toilet with fountain is located in a separate room, as is the separate laundry room with washing machine connection.  At the rear are the two bedrooms. The first bedroom measures approximately 7 m² (3.89 m x 1.79 m) and the second bedroom approximately 15.9 m² (3.89 m x 4.09 m). The balcony of approximately 6 m² can be reached through both bedrooms and is located on the south.  LOCATION The property is located in a quiet street in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid on the border with Duivelseiland and De Pijp, between Van Baerlestraat and Hobbemakade. Several good restaurants such as Le Garage and Loetje, cafes, shops, various museums and the Museumplein are a stone's throw away. Public transport (tram 3, 5, 12, 16, and 24) and the arterial roads are also nearby.  THE MAINTENANCE It is a completely renovated apartment (renovation year 2020). All walls are neatly plastered and painted, the kitchen and sanitary facilities have been completely renovated, the electricity and central heating system have been renewed and the entire apartment has double glazing. In addition, the apartment is equipped with curtains  and a beautiful wooden floor.  PARTICULARITIES -Not suitable for sharers; -Rental price is excl. G/W/L; -Deposit of 2 months; -Minimum rental period is 1 year; -An income requirement applies to this object, based on a gross monthly income of at least 4x the net rent.

LOCATED IN A  GOOD  LOCATION AND  FOR RENT  FROM THE FIRST OF  APRIL:  WE PROUDLY PRESENT: A SOUTH-WEST  FACING  AND PARTIALLY FURNISHED APARTMENT WITH 3  BEDROOMS  AND SUNNY BALCONY!  LOCATION  This newly built modern secured complex with two lifts is in a desirable and convenient area of Amsterdam. The A10 motorway as well as public transport, metro and bus, leading to the business area "Zuidas".  Within walking distance, you will find Sportplaza Mercator which includes an indoor swimming pool and fitness center.   The Sloterplas, a well known lake, offers plenty of opportunities for outdoor swimming, jogging and walking.  The Rembrandt Park is also ideal for sport and other leisure activities and connects to the Vondelpark for a perfect 10 kilometer running lap.  Tram line 13 stops opposite the apartment and brings you to Dam Square and Central Station. A metro stop is in walking distance, with train connections to Schiphol Airport, Utrecht and to the coast (e.g. Zandvoort, Bloemendaal, Scheveningen).   If you like to cycle, a 10-to-15-minute ride takes you to the famous Jordaan area, city center, Leidseplein and Rembrandtplein for theatre, film and entertainment.  Grocery shopping, restaurants and bars also within walking distance.  A 5-minute walk takes you to the 85 meters high roof terrace of the Leonardo Rembrandt Park Hotel. It offers not only fantastic views over Amsterdam in all directions, but also a sky bar, cocktail lounge and a restaurant with an international menu.  For car owners the area offers plenty of paid parking spaces on a per hour or day rate.   Alternatively, a parking space within the apartment complex, can be rented monthly for an additional fee of € 60 per calendar month (including 1 access key).  LAYOUT   With the elevator to the fifth floor. A large entrance hall containing plenty of storage for shoes and coats.   A wide hallway takes you through to a very spacious (35m2), open living room and kitchen, connecting to a sunny enclosed conservatory with large bi-folding doors.  The modern, fully equipped kitchen includes a fridge, freezer, oven, dishwasher, and induction cooker.  Next to the kitchen is an indoor pantry providing extra storage and space for a washing machine and tumble-dryer.  Two spacious double bedrooms, each including a large cupboard, lighting and curtains.  The third bedroom is more than suitable for children, an office or walk-in closet.  All bedroom’s include lighting and curtains.   A spacious, recently renovated (2020) bathroom, including shower, wash basin unit with plenty of storage, large, illuminated + heated mirror as well as a separate hand towel heating.   An attractive oak floor throughout the appartement for easy maintenance and cleaning.  The rental includes a private garden (on the first floor) for use by tenants and owners and  the use of a bicycle storage in the basement (2 keys).   To get an idea of ??the utilities, below is an overview of what the landlord is currently paying:  City heating and electricity €50-€100 per month. Water €20-€40 per month. Internet + Television €30 - €75 per month.  PARTICULARITIES  - Living area: 107 m2 (NEN-2580 certificate available) - Partially furnished: everything present except couch and beds - Located close to the Sloterplas, Rembrandtpark and Erasmuspark - 3 bedrooms - Sunny balcony - Elevator present  - Fantastic view - Beautiful communal courtyard garden - Energylabel A  - Rent: € 2.250,- per month excluding utilities - Possibility to rent a parking space: €60,- per month - District heating - 2 months deposit - Available from the first of April 2023 - Rental contract for a maximum of 2 years - Pets to be discussed - NOT SUITABLE FOR HOUSE SHARERS  This information has been compiled by us with the necessary care. Pietersbergweg 5A Ruim  3  kamer appartement  van 76,2  m2 op de 2e  verdieping  type A  *** Reageren  en  selectie: U kunt alleen online reageren  op  deze  woning. Doe  dit via de ‘reageer’-knop onderaan de pagina of via het contactformulier van Funda of Pararius. Wij maken een selectie voor de eerste kandidaten die kunnen bezichtigen. Telefonisch kunnen wij geen bezichtigingsafspraak voor u inplannen. ***  Omringd door water, spreken de drie imposante torens voor zich: Trinity Buildings staat voor klasse, stijl en comfort. In de woontorens zijn 133 comfortabele appartementen te vinden in verschillende prijsklassen. Alle woningen zijn bijzonder luxe afgewerkt en van alle gemakken voorzien. Je fiets, scooter of auto parkeer je zorgeloos in de parkeerkelder. In de royale gemeenschappelijke stadstuin geniet je van de Amsterdamse zon.  Wonen in Trinity Buildings is naast comfortabel ook erg duurzaam. Dankzij diverse duurzaamheidsmaatregelen kun je rekenen op lage energielasten. Het gebouw draagt energielabel A door onder andere duurzame stadsverwarming, HR++ beglazing, gebruik van zonne-energie en ledverlichting.  Alle appartementen zijn even luxe afgewerkt met onder andere een hoogglans keuken compleet met inbouwapparatuur, een volledig betegelde badkamer, wit gespoten wanden en plafonds, een pvc-vloer en een berging.  In de parkeerkelder is ruimte voor 93 auto’s, ook vind je er tien laadstations voor elektrische voertuigen. Indien gewenst kun je een parkeerplek huren, dit is niet verplicht.  De dag starten met een kop thee en een krantje, een digitale lunch met collega’s, uitgebreid barbecueën op een zwoele zomeravond: je kunt altijd gebruikmaken van de royale, groene stadstuin welke je deelt met andere bewoners.  *** Huurvoorwaarden: De voorwaarden die wij stellen aan u als nieuwe huurder van een woning in ons beheer kunt u op onze website terugvinden. Alle informatie is nadrukkelijk onder voorbehoud. Hieraan kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend.

Belangrijk:  –  De  woning is  per direct  beschikbaar.  – Het  appartement  is gestoffeerd en niet gemeubileerd.   – De huurprijs is exclusief water  en  elektriciteit.  Gasloos en  met zonnepanelen.   - Exclusief televisie en internet.   – Waarborgsom is 2x de maandhuur.  – Contractperiode is voor bepaalde tijd, 2 jaar.  – Servicekosten €50 p/m zit inbegrepen in de huurprijs.  Stijlvol wonen in Amsterdam. Dat kan goed in deze buurt. Een mooi park om de hoek en alle denkbare voorzieningen dichtbij. Dit is een kindvriendelijke buurt met relatief veel gezinnen. De buurt heeft naar verhouding veel jonge inwoners van tussen de 25 en 44 jaar. Verder is het een betrekkelijk rustige buurt gekeken naar de bevolkingsdichtheid.  Dit prachtige nieuwbouwappartement is afgewerkt met uiterste precisie en oog voor detail. Stoer, robuust en tegelijkertijd gedetailleerd met de mooiste materialen en de beste merken.   De woning is perfect bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer en auto. De dichtstbijzijnde uitvalsweg in de nabije omgeving op slechts 4 minuten rijden. Gesitueerd op fietsafstand van het centrum van Amsterdam. Er zijn meerdere gezamenlijke fietsenstallingen.   Een heerlijk appartement op een fantastische locatie!

About the project Amsterdam is the capital of the Netherlands, known for its artistic heritage, extensive canal system and narrow houses with gables, legacies from the 17th century, the city's Golden Age. The Museum Quarter houses the Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum with works by Rembrandt and Vermeer, and the Stedelijk Museum with modern art. Bicycles are characteristic of the city's character; there are numerous bike lanes.  Built in 1999, this L-shaped apartment building has 43 homes and ample parking, it is adjacent to the single-family home, also located on the Oeverpad. It has 2 and 3 bedroom homes with an average floor area of 95 square feet or 1,020 square feet.  Advantages of living at Oeverpad  - It is located in the district Amsterdam New-West - Supermarket at 625 m. - Close to public transport - bus and streetcar - and shopping Osdorp - At 20 minutes cycling distance from Amsterdam Centre  More media of the property are available on our website. Elegant 1 bedroom  apartment  of 58m²  with a  bath and a roof  terrace  in the east of Amsterdam  (Watergraafsmeer)   Highlights: - Furnished, turn key  state -  Renovations designed by an architect - Excellent quality wooden flooring and built in cabinets throughout the apartment - Outside space: a wide balcony accessible from the dining and the kitchen and a large roof terrace of approx. 45m² - € 2.050,- per month, excl. utilities - Available from 23rd of April - No pets nor students preferred.  Layout: The entrance of the apartment is on the third floor to be reached by a private, newly carpeted stairwell. The apartment has a an open plan living room with a sofa TV corner and annexed balcony over the width of the apartment. The kitchen has an island with a bar that is ideal for entertaining guests. It is fully equipped with high quality appliances: oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge/freezer and an espresso machine.  The bedroom has a fine quality new mattress with a built in wardrobe, a television and connects to the ensuite bathroom fitted with a bath tub, sink with storage and a separate shower.  Location: Located in Watergraafsmeer a village that became a part of Amsterdam about a century ago. It has a rich history with generously sized houses and leafy avenues whose first residents were mainly notables.  There are many trendy restaurants and cafes nearby, to name a few: De Kas with organic mediterranean food, Jacobsz, Mr and Mrs Watson.  Beautiful Park Frankendael is almost at your doorstep and has a weekly organic market. The Oosterpoort shopping center is a less than 10 min walk, with a great variety of shops and supermarkets. The city center is about 15 min. cycling distance; Centraal Station is to be reached in less than 20 min.  Public transport: Train stations Muiderpoort and Science park with frequent trains to Centraal Station, are both in the area.  Tram 19 towards centrum, busses: 41 and N87 towards Muiderpoort and Centraal Station.

** BINNENKORT IN  VERHUUR  | Westerpark  West **   Eén toplocatie, drie  woongebouwen:  Salt, Pepper en Blend.  Gebouw  SALT is subtiel, gestructureerd en heeft  een  elegante  uitstraling. Het wonen  in SALT biedt alle vormen van comfort. Jong en oud vindt hier haar plek in een 1-, 2-, 3- of zelfs 4-kamerappartement. De indeling van de appartementen is helder en niet ‘ingewikkelder’ dan nodig. Ze zijn allemaal maximaal van binnen naar buiten gericht, zodat je als bewoner één kunt worden met het uitzicht over de stad. De appartementen variëren in gebruiksoppervlakte van 37 m2 tot 86 m2 en hebben allen een eigen balkon met uitzicht over de stad en/of over de groene Brettenzone.  • 3 woongebouwen: Salt, Pepper & Blend • Studio's en 2-kamerappartementen • Woonoppervlakten van ca. 37 m2 tot ca. 86 m2 • Indicatieve huurprijzen vanaf ca. € 975 ,- tot ca. € 1500 ,- per maand exclusief service kosten • Verwachtte oplevering vanaf medio juni 2023  Het Westerpark ligt letterlijk aan je voeten. Westerpark West wordt gebouwd en ingericht als een zeer hoogwaardige plek om te wonen, te werken en te recreëren. Picknicken met je vrienden, voetballen met de kinderen, rondjes hardlopen met je buren of in alle rust genieten van het uitzicht vanaf je eigen terras: dat kan hier straks allemaal. Van ‘tijd’ proberen we hier in alle opzichten zo veel mogelijk Quality Time te maken. Dat doen we met goede voorzieningen voor de hele buurt (denk aan horeca, kinderdagverblijven) en slimme, comfortabele gebouwen (gebruik van duurzame installaties en state-of-the-art techniek).   - Huren in Westerpark West? –   Ben jij enthousiast geworden over het project? Reageer dan op deze advertentie (contact met de makelaar) met je naam en e-mailadres. Wij zorgen er dan voor dat je als eerste op de hoogte bent van de start inschrijving en hoe dit in zijn werk gaat.  NB: Aan het beeldmateriaal (artist impressions) en plattegronden kunnen geen rechten worden ontleend.

APPARTEMENT H–F’ LUXE  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, large storage  room  for storage / technology with  connection  for the washer / dryer, separate  toilet  and  modern bathroom  with walk-in shower and sink. On the north side two bedrooms, one with access to the first balcony on the north. On the northeast side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the second balcony on the northeast. All apartments of this type have a PVC floor, wall finishes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments  At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY FLAT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury flats per floor. Each flat has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-coloured composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey colour. The luxury flats range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each flat has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE FLAT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive flats are located. These flats have all the features of the most spacious luxury flats. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive flats range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive flats plus an ensuite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handleless cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (ensuite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the estate agents.  "This information has been compiled with the necessary care. There is a parking lot in the underground parking garage that comes with the rental of this property as well as a separate storage room. Nieuw Amsterdams Huys  te  huur!  Nieuw opgeleverd  high-end, gestoffeerde maisonnette van  68m2  met balkon. Dit luxe en  energiezuinige  appartement is gelegen op de 14e  en 15e verdieping van appartementencomplex  VERTICAL EAST en biedt fenomenaal uitzicht. Het appartement is per direct te betrekken!  Het appartementencomplex is onder architectuur en toekomstbestendig gebouwd, hoogwaardig geïsoleerd en volledig gasloos. Om de energievraag zo laag mogelijk te houden wordt gebruik gemaakt van gebouw gebonden Warmte-Koude-opslag in de bodem (WKO installatie), zonne(boiler)panelen en windmolens/turbines. Het is dan ook niet gek dat het appartement voorzien is van een energielabel A++.  Voor de bewoners zijn er diverse gemeenschappelijke voorzieningen gerealiseerd zoals een fietsenstalling, gemeenschappelijke binnentuin en geveltuinen. Op de 5e verdieping bevinden zich een daktuin met terras en een meerdere “Shared Living” spaces zoals de gym, een private dining room met open keuken en toilet en 2 logeerkamers met eigen badkamer.  Uniek is de mogelijkheid om gebruik te maken van deelauto’s en elektrische deelfietsen die via de VvE beschikbaar zijn.  INDELING Begane grond: gemeenschappelijke hoofdentree met intercom-/videofoon installatie en postkasten; trappenhuis en 2 liften.  Indeling woning: bij binnenkomst in de beneden hal bevinden zich de de trap naar de 2e etage en de deur die toegang geeft tot de woonkamer. De woonkamer is licht en heeft een open design keuken die is voorzien van inbouwapparatuur. Via de openslaande deuren betreed je een heerlijk balkon op het westen. Boven bevinden zich het separaat toilet, de berging, de slaapkamer en de heerlijk ruime badkamer die voorzien is van een inloopdouche, ligbad en wastafelmeubel.   De woning is aangesloten op een gemeenschappelijke WKO-installatie en mechanisch ventilatiesysteem waarbij gebruik gemaakt wordt van een WTW-installatie. Hierdoor wordt de woning gelijkmatig verwarmd in de winter en gekoeld in de zomer.  OMGEVING EN BEREIKBAARHEID Amsterdam Sloterdijk transformeert zich in razend tempo tot een grootstedelijke woon/werkgemeenschap waar kantoorpanden en unieke architectonische appartementengebouwen elkaar afwisselen. In de omgeving is veel ruimte voor groen (Tuin van BRET en Westerpark) en cultuur (De School en Amsterdam Art Center). Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen kan men terecht bij de winkelcentra aan de Willem Kraanstraat en het Bos en Lommerplein, beiden liggen op geringe afstand van de woning.  Dit appartement heeft een erg gunstige ligging ten opzichte van de ring A-10 en Station Sloterdijk. Het appartement ligt zeer centraal zodat alle delen van de stad, luchthaven Schiphol en omliggende steden zoals Haarlem optimaal bereikbaar zijn.  BIJZONDERHEDEN - Complex is eind 2022 opgeleverd; - Woonoppervlakte 68 m2 volgens NEN meetrapport; - Gelegen op de 14e en 15e verdieping met fantastisch wijds uitzicht; - Zeer energiezuinig: energielabel A++ dus lage energielasten; - Voorzien van rook-/koolmonoxidemelders; - Klassieke visgraat vloer; - Moderne keuken met inbouwapparatuur; - Station Sloterdijk en Ring A10 om de hoek; - Fietsenberging met 2 eigen plekken.  HUURVOORWAARDEN - Huurprijs € 1.800 per maand; - Exclusief elektriciteit, internet en gemeentelijke belastingen; - Voorschot warm water en verwarming €185 per maand; - Waarborgsom 2 maanden huur; - Beschikbaar per direct; - Huurcontract model B; 2 jaar daarna onbepaalde tijd; - Gestoffeerd: alleen vloer- /raambekleding en design lampen; - Huisdieren, studenten en delers niet toegestaan.

***Sharing allowed ***   Beautiful maisonette  house. Upon  entering you will immediately  find  two bedrooms and a bathroom  with  bath with shower and toilet. If  you  go  down the  stairs, you will find a toilet and a spacious storage room with washing machine connection in the small hall.  The living room has a spacious balcony with a view of the harbor and the IJ. The kitchen is located in the middle of the house and has various built-in appliances such as a dishwasher, fridge-freezer and combi oven.  Can I rent this property? - € 7,962 gross per month (one income) - € 9,100 gross per month (dual earners)  Living in Westerdoksdijk Living on the Westerdoksdijk means living in bustling Amsterdam with a beautiful view of the IJ, moored boats in the Westerdok and the Amsterdam canals. It is unique living with a wide view over the water and the city center at your feet. There are different housing types, often with a spacious balcony or (communal) roof terrace.  Under the complex is a parking garage, bicycle shed and private storage space.  VIEWINGS / INFORMATION: - Viewings are ONLY possible on working days between 8.30 am and 5 pm, so not in the evening or at the weekend. - Planning a viewing or requesting information by telephone is NOT possible. The lessor has chosen to show the candidates around and/or provide them with information. A viewing or information can only be requested via Funda or via the website of the renting broker.

Elegant living in  a  high-end renovated  former schoolhouse.   This unique apartment  with  exceptionally high standards is situated  in  a building that was built in  the  iconic  Amsterdamse School architectural  style. Tall ceilings, large windows and the spectacular view of the water make this a fabulous spot to come home to.   A tour  The ground floor Central lobby with a sophisticated decor and the elevators and staircase.  The first floor All rooms are on this level. The spacious living room with three sets of French doors to the sunny rear terrace and a view of Noorder Amstelkanaal canal at the front features a central feature fireplace. The fireplace is the focal point of this extremely bright space and lends the home added atmosphere and warmth. The contemporary Bulthaup kitchen with an island is fitted with a full range of modern appliances, perfect for preparing elaborate meals for friends and family.    The two spacious master bedrooms are to the right of the entrance. The rear bedroom features a walk-in closet, French doors to a balcony and a luxury connecting bathroom - the ultimate boutique hotel feel. The bathroom is equipped with a free-standing bathtub, walk-in shower, toilet and a custom made vanity. The original, characteristic windows lend a unique sense of space. The second spacious bedroom at the front with a connecting bathroom and fitted closets offers a unique view of Noorder Amstelkanaal.   Both bathrooms feature high-end finishes, with Gigacar ceramic tiles and Monolith sinks.  The outdoor space The generous terrace off the living room with a view of the courtyard garden at the rear is the ideal spot for entertaining, or a simple cup of coffee in the morning sun. The balcony off the master bedroom also offers a similar wonderful view.    The area and accessibility The wide green buffer zone between the water of Noorder Amstelkanaal and the quiet one-way road Pieter Lastmankade make this a unique location. The apartment is on the border of the dynamic center of Concertgebouw district and Vondelpark.   Schools, sports clubs and gyms and the shops on Cornelis Schuystraat are within walking distance of the property. Many museums, including Rijks- Stedelijk and Van Gogh museum are less than a 5-minute bicycle ride away. The A10 offers a quick connection to the city center and Schiphol.   Stops for public transportation are within easy walking distance and Amsterdam Zuid is only five minutes away by bicycle. From the station, Schiphol is just a 7-minute commute away.   The specifications  - Available: 1st of May; - Rental price: € 7.750,- excl. per month; - Deposit: 2 months' rent; - Rental terms: at least 12 months; - Unfurnished; - Indexation: CPI +1%. -English below Dutch-   Schitterende, geheel  gerenoveerde, woning  van c.a. 150m2, waarbij  veel  originele details behouden zijn gebleven.  Gelegen  in een prachtig woning-blok uit 1925  naar  ontwerp  van architect  C.J. Rutgers.  Omgeving. Gelegen in stadsdeel Amsterdam-Zuid, in de geliefde “Concertgebouwbuurt”. Op de kruising Banstraat/ Nicolaas Maesstraat, met de Cornelis Schuytstraat en de Jacob Obrechtstraat om de hoek. Beide straten staan bekend om de vele boetiekjes, traiteurs en speciaalzaken. Maar ook de Van Baerlestraat, Beethovenstraat en de P.C. Hooftstraat, met hun rijk gevarieerde aanbod aan winkels, terrassen en restaurants zijn op steenworp afstand gelegen. Daarnaast natuurlijk de nabijheid van het Vondelpark, en de gezellig Pijp, met de Albert Cuypmarkt. Diverse (Internationale) scholen zijn ook nabij te vinden.  Indeling. Het woonhuis is verdeeld over een ruime entree op de begane grond, eerste en tweede verdieping en een kleine kelder en heeft de volgende indeling:  - Begane grond:     Vanaf de straat toegang tot de entreehal, middels de prachtige gebeeldhouwde en gelakte teakhouten deur omgeven door de oorspronkelijke glas in lood ramen.     Vanuit de hal is er toegang tot de kelder met stahoogte, en een opp. van ruim 10m2. - Eerste verdieping:     Via de vaste originele trap, toegang tot de eerste verdieping. Overloop met toilet. Middels openslaande deuren, binnenkomst naar de ruime en zeer lichte woonkamer. Toegang aan de voorzijde tot het pand-brede balkon gelegen op het Oosten met zicht op de karakteristieke panden van de Banstraat. De achterzijde biedt tevens een fraai uitzicht, over de binnentuinen. Vanuit de woonkamer is er verbinding met de zeer ruime opgezette woonkeuken. De prachtige luxueuze keuken is uitgevoerd in de kleur zwart, met een marmercomposiet aanrechtblad, en voorzien van inductie-kookplaat met ingebouwde afzuiging, grote koelkast met vriezer, een cooker, oven/magnetron combi. en uiteraard een vaatwasser. Tevens vanuit de keuken toegang tot het balkon. - Tweede verdieping:     Via een vaste trap, toegang tot de tweede verdieping. Overloop, met toegang tot 3 zeer goed formaat slaapkamers, waarbij de ouder-kamer is voorzien van een badkamer en-suite met ligbad, separate inloop-douche, dubbele wastafels, en toilet. Alle drie de slaapkamers hebben vaste inbouwkasten. Tevens toegang tot de gasten badkamer met inloop-douche en dubbele wastafels, en een derde separaat toilet. Een ruime vaste trap geeft toegang tot het zeer royale dakterras van c.a. 30m2.  Kenmerken:  - Prachtig geheel verbouwde (4 jr. geleden) woning, met behoud van originele details. - Het geheel is zeer luxueus afgewerkt, met gebruik making van prachtige materialen. - C.a. 150m2, 3 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers, royaal dakterras van c.a. 30m2, (hekwerk rondom de vlonders nog niet zichtbaar op de foto’s, maar is aanwezig). - Zeer veel lichtinval in de woning door de vele raampartijen en door de ochtendzon aan de voorzijde en de middagzon aan de achterzijde. - Geweldige locatie in Amsterdam Oud- Zuid. - Gordijnen/blinds allemaal verzorgd door de verhuurder, (nog niet zichtbaar op de foto’s). - De buitengevels van het woonblok Banstraat 34 t/m 42 heeft de vorm van een schip, compleet met kajuit, reling, schoorsteen en boeg. - Banstraat: naar Joan Albert Ban (1597 - 1644): rechtsgeleerde, muziektheoreticus en Rooms-Katholieke priester in Haarlem.  Wat een geweldige woning, heerlijke ruime, zeer prettige indeling, en prachtig verbouwd!!  Beschikbaar per direct voor lange periode. Minimale huurperiode tenminste 12 maanden. 2 maanden waarborgsom. Gordijnen en wasmachine/droger zijn aanwezig.  A beautiful, and completely renovated, house of approx. 150m2 where, although the entire house has been renovated, many original details have been preserved. Located in a beautiful residential complex (date; 1925) designed by architect C.J. Rutgers.  Surroundings. Located in the Amsterdam-Zuid district, in the popular "Concertgebouw area". At the Banstraat/ Nicolaas Maesstraat intersection, with the Cornelis Schuytstraat and the Jacob Obrechtstraat around the corner. Both streets are well-known for the many boutiques, traiteurs, and specialty shops. But also the Van Baerlestraat, Beethovenstraat and the P.C. Hooftstraat, with their wide variety of shops, terraces and restaurants, are in the immediate vicinity. In addition the proximity of the Vondelpark, and the cozy “de Pijp”, with the famous Albert Cuyp Market. Various (international) schools can also be found nearby. Very centrally located in relation to the highway (Ring A-10), and within walking distance of, and easily accessible by, public transport (trams and buses).  Layout. The house is divided over a spacious entrance on the ground floor, a first and second floor and a small basement.  - Ground floor:     From the street immediate access to the house into the entrance hallway, through the beautiful carved and lacquered teak-door with the original stained glass windows. From the hallway there is access to the basement (approx. 10m2) - First floor:     Via the fixed original staircase, access to the first floor. Landing with toilet. Through French doors, entry to the spacious, and very bright living room. Access to the front-side balcony facing East, with views over the characteristic buildings of the Banstraat. The backside also offers a beautiful view over the inside gardens.     From the living room there is a connection to the spacious kitchen. The beautiful luxurious kitchen is finished in black, with a marble composite counter top, and equipped with an induction cook-hob with built-in extractor, large fridge with freezer, a cooker, oven/ microwave combination. and of course a dishwasher. Also from the kitchen there’s access to the balcony. - Second floor:     Via a fixed staircase, access to the second floor. Landing, with access to three very well sized bedrooms. The master bedroom is equipped with a bathroom en-suite with bath, separate walk-in shower, double sinks, and toilet. All three bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. Also access to the guest bathroom with walk-in shower and double sinks, and to the third, and separate, toilet. A spacious fixed staircase gives access to the very spacious roof terrace of approx. 30 m2.  Features:  - Beautiful, 4 years ago completely renovated house, while retaining many of its original and characteristic details. - The house has been very luxuriously finished, making use of beautiful materials. - Approx.150m2, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious roof terrace of approx. 30m2, (fencing around the decking is not visible on the photos, but has been placed). - Very bright house, because of the many windows, and the morning sun at the front- and the afternoon sun at the backside. - Great location in Amsterdam Oud- Zuid. - Curtains/ blinds are present in the house, (not yet visible on the photos). - The exterior facades of the Banstraat 34 to 42 complex, has the shape of a ship, completely with cabin, railing, chimney and bow. - Banstraat: after Joan Albert Ban (1597 - 1644): law scholar, music theorist and Roman Catholic Priest in Haarlem.  Really a marvelous house, very spacious lay-out, and beautifully renovated!  Available immediately for long period. Minimum rental period at least 12 months. 2 months deposit. Curtains and washer/dryer are present.

Harry Banninkstraat, Oosterdokseiland/  130m2/  4 rooms/  furnished apartment.   A stunning, high-  end  apartment for rent. Located at  Oosterdokseiland,  that can be characterised by high-quality  and  sleek high-rise buildings, right  next to Amsterdam Central Station.  Numerous facilities are in the immediate vicinity such as the Library (OBA), the Conservatory, museums, supermarket, coffee shops and good restaurants. Within just a few minutes you are in the historic city centre. In front of the apartment complex is a beautiful long pedestrian promenade with a wide jetty. This jetty offers a nice view over the water to the old town.  Public transport tram, metro, train and bus are all within walking distance.  The apartment has been beautifully finished with high quality materials. Due to the large windows surrounding the living area and open plan kitchen, the apartment is very bright. The luxurious kitchen is equipped with all possible amenities.  From the living room a guest/ office room can be reached. By means of a solid sliding door this room can be closed off from the living room.  The master bedroom is spacious, and equipped with a very comfortable double bed with Tempur mattress. From the hallway a 4th room can be entered that is in use as a very large (and permanent) walk-in closet. A beautiful floor with underfloor- heating is laid throughout the apartment.  The bathroom with bathtub, separate shower, double sink, and toilet is luxuries and beautifully finished. A separate toilet and inside apartment storage can be reached from the hallway.  Naturally the building has an elevator and it is possible to rent a parking spot in the underlying public parking garage. This parking is for rent at additional costs, and does not go via the landlord.  Landlord prefers to rent out the apartment including advance payment for electricity/ heating costs, and internet. The monthly pre-payment amount of € 340,- , comes on top of the mentioned rental price. The apartment can be rented for a maximum period of 24 months.  Truly a fantastic high- end apartment with an amazing view on a very central location!

**This property is  listed  by a  certified expat  broker.**  STYLISHLY FURNISHED  MONUMENTAL  APARTMENT IN THE HEART OF  AMSTERDAM  WITH OPTIONAL PARKING SPACE IN NEARBY  PARKING  GARAGE. The bright living/dining room is the ideal place to receive guests. The oak wooden floor gives the entire house an authentic and attractive appearance.  Through the hall you have access to the separate guest toilet with fountain. The spacious bathroom is fully equipped including a lovely bath, spacious walk-in shower, toilet, towel radiator and double sink with washbasin. The playful layout gives access via the staircase to the first bedroom at the rear of the house, which is equipped with fitted wardrobes. The second bedroom and the laundry room can also be reached via the stairs and are located at the rear of the house, which ensures complete peace and quiet a stone's throw from the bustle of the city. APARTMENT H–F LUXE  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, large storage  room  for storage / technology with  connection  for the washer / dryer, separate  toilet and modern bathroom with  walk-in shower and sink. On the south side two bedrooms, one with access to the first south-facing balcony. On the southeast side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the second balcony on the southeast. All apartments of this type have a PVC floor, wall finishes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments  At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-coloured composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey colour. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury flats. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive flats range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an ensuite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handleless cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (ensuite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the estate agents.  "This information has been compiled with the necessary care. However, we accept no liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All dimensions and surface areas are indicative. The NVM conditions apply."

About the project  At  the Weesperkarspel  you will  find the modern, stylish  apartment  complex De Kameleon. This complex  was  built in 2012 and contains two,  three  and  four room flats,  with a living area varying from 54m² to 137m². This beautiful building unerringly manages to combine luxury with pleasure. The flats are luxuriously equipped with a spacious kitchen, spacious bathroom and a large balcony (a lot of privacy thanks to the layout) with views over the surroundings. At the Kameleon, characteristic architecture and luxurious equipment join forces with the vibrant surroundings of Amsterdam Zuidoost.    For all residents De Kameleon offers a roof garden of no less than 5000m², including running water and tall trees. A lovely place where you can enjoy the fresh outdoor air and the view of the surroundings. Ideal in the warm spring and summer months.  Near the building you will find a parking garage. Residents have their own floor for parking, which visitors to the shopping centre cannot enter.    All facilities are within easy reach from the complex. For daily shopping you can go to the underlying shopping centre, complete with several supermarkets, forty specialty shops, fitness facilities and restaurants. Sports enthusiasts can reach the Bijlmerpark in just a few minutes. Ideal for a jog, a piece of cycling or a nice walk. The Gaasperplas is also within easy reach, where you can swim, row, dive or have a lovely picnic.    Amsterdam Zuidoost is a cultural spectacle anyway. The area is really full of cinemas, theatres and concert halls for a well-deserved night out. Southeast is also known for its huge selection of restaurants with various cuisines - a hidden gem awaits you in every corner of every street.    With a location in the heart of the Bijlmer, the Chameleon is easy to reach by both car and public transport. The Kameleon has a very good location in relation to the A1, A2, A9 and A10 motorways. For a direct connection to the characteristic Amsterdam city centre (reachable in 15 minutes) or the luxurious Zuidas you can use the numerous bus connections or get off at the nearby metro station Kraaiennest. Schiphol can be reached in just 30 minutes.  Choice of two-room, three-room and four-room flats  Roof garden with an area of 5000m²  Underneath shopping centre for daily shopping  Several recreational areas within walking distance  Easy connection by car and to the public transport network  Parking garage with own floor for residents  Close to Schiphol  More media of the property are available on our website. No rights can be derived from the offer text and displayed media.

Herengracht 570-C, 1017CH  Amsterdam   TOP  OF THE  RANGE BRAND NEW FULLY  FURNISHED  TWO BEDROOM AND BATHROOM CANAL  APARTMENT  WITH TERRACE IN THE CITY CENTER.   Luxurious  and fully  furnished apartment of approx. 100m2 on the two top floors of a historical canal house. This beautiful apartment is located on an excellent location in the City Centre of Amsterdam around the corner of the Amstel, Utrechtsestraat, Waterlooplein and Frederiksplein.  Excellent public transport facilities such as tram and metro are close by. Supermarket, restaurants and theatres are on walking distance.  Lay-out: Communal marble entrance hall with access to the apartment by stairs on the third floor. Charming open plan living area with original beam ceiling, light flooring with underfloor heating and a gas-lit fire place. The living area is overlooking the beautifully landscaped inner gardens and facing south, for sunlight throughout the day. Luxurious open fully equipped (AEG & Quooker) kitchen with dining area. Hall-way with separate guest toilet. Renovated and upholstered  3-room  apartment of  approximately 50  m² with a balcony  over  the full width of the  house.  Located in a quiet street in  the popular neighborhood Rivierenbuurt.  NOT FOR SHARERS At the request of the landlord, it is not possible to make this property available to sharers. Sharers are understood to mean students and/or friends who rent the house together. THE LAYOUT You reach the entrance of the house on the first floor via the communal staircase. Central hall provides access to all rooms. Living room with open kitchen located at the front. There is also a separate toilet with fountain and a separate laundry room.  The master bedroom is located at the rear and measures approximately 9.5 m². The second, smaller bedroom is also located at the rear and measures approximately 7 m². The balcony can be reached from both bedrooms. The balcony measures approximately 3.5 m² and is located on the North.  LOCATION The house is located in the popular area Rivierenbuurt (South District) near the shops on Rijnstraat and Maasstraat. The location is ideal to quickly get to the center or to quickly go outside Amsterdam. Martin L. King Park is steps away.  THE MAINTENANCE This is a renovated house (renovation year 2018). The kitchen, electricity and central heating system were renewed. All walls and ceilings are smoothly plastered. In addition, a beautiful laminate floor has been laid throughout the apartment and high-quality lace curtains have been hung in all rooms. The house has full double glazing.  PARTICULARITIES -Not suitable for sharers; -Rental price is excl. G/W/E; -Deposit of 2 months; -Minimum rental period is 1 year; -An income requirement applies to this object, based on a gross monthly income of at least 4x the net rent.
