Spacious, characteristic 4-room  apartment  of approximately  95 m²  with a bright living  room,  two en-suite rooms that can  be  closed off, and a wonderfully sunny  south-facing  balcony.  The property  is located in the popular neighborhood Rivierenbuurt around the corner from De Pijp. The house has an energy label C.  NOT FOR SHARERS At the request of the landlord, it is not possible to make this property available to sharers. Sharers are understood to mean students and/or friends who rent the house together. The cohabitation of 2 or more (highly educated) working persons is also not possible. A couple or a family is eligible for this home.  THE LAYOUT The entrance of the house is on the second floor. A central hall provides access to all rooms. The living room consists of three different areas that can be closed off by room and sliding doors. This makes it easy to create two extra bedrooms. The room at the rear measures approximately 14.3 m² and the room at the front approximately 11.6 m². The simple kitchen is located at the rear of the house. The kitchen is equipped with a kitchen unit with sink and there is a gas and washing machine connection. The bathroom is centrally located and has a bath with shower and a double sink. The toilet is separate.  The master bedroom is located at the rear and measures approximately 18.4 m² (4.50 m x 4.10 m) and here is the connection for washing machine and dryer. The sunny balcony measures approximately 4 m² and is located on the south.  Optional to take over from current tenants: - dishwasher; - 4-burner gas hob; - oven/microwave combination; - washing machine + dryer.  LOCATION The house is centrally located in the popular area Rivierenbuurt (South District) between Scheldestraat and Maasstraat. Near the RAI with the Europaplein station of the North / South line and around the corner from the lively area De Pijp. Easily accessible by car via the ring A-10 exit RAI and exit Amstel (S109 and S111) and by public transport. The location is ideal to quickly get to the center or to quickly go outside Amsterdam. The Beatrixpark and Martin L. Kingpark are just around the corner.  THE MAINTENANCE This is an apartment in a good state of maintenance. The kitchen has been (partially) modernised. The walls were repainted in 2021. The entire house has double glazing and energy label C. Finally, the apartment is equipped with both under and over curtains, lace curtains and lighting.  PARTICULARITIES -Not suitable for sharers; -Rental price is excl. G/W/E; -Deposit of 2 months; -Minimum rental period is 1 year; -An income requirement applies to this object, based on a gross monthly income of at least 4x the net rent.

English please do  see  below. Request  for a  viewing; please do send  us  an e-mail. Not for sharing.!  Wonen  in het mooiste gedeelte van de Helmersbuurt! Dit  goed ingedeelde  ONGEMEUBILEERDE twee-slaapkamer appartement van ca. 80 m2 met balkon is gelegen aan de Alberdingk Thijmstraat  in de geliefde Helmersbuurt (Oud West) ! Dit appartement heeft dankzij de hoekligging veel lichtinval. De woning heeft een houten vloer. Met de vele kleinschalige winkeltjes, gezellige restaurants en leuke koffietentjes om de hoek, ademt deze buurt een dorpsachtige sfeer uit.  Ligging: U woont hier in de geliefde en populaire Helmersbuurt (Stadsdeel Oud-West), in alle rust maar toch vlakbij het Leidseplein, de Overtoom en het fraaie Vondelpark voor de “groene” ontspanning. Alle denkbare faciliteiten bevinden zich op loopafstand. Denk aan supermarkten (Albert Heijn en Marqt), (woon)winkels, tennisbanen, sportscholen, restaurants en gezellige cafés, maar natuurlijk ook het unieke project “De Hallen” gevestigd in de voormalige tramremise met een indoor food market, restaurants, een bioscoop en een hotel. Al met al een unieke plek om er een middagje door te brengen. U kunt uiteraard ook terecht in de Bosboom Toussaint en de Eerste Constantijn Huygensstraat. Ook de beroemde P.C. Hooftstraat met haar luxe winkels is op steenworp afstand evenals het Museumplein met diverse musea. Neemt u de fiets, dan bent u in een paar minuten op het Leidseplein en in tien minuten staat u op de Dam. Op een paar minuten lopen van de Overtoom met tramlijn 1 naar het centrum, Centraal Station en richting station Lelylaan met een aansluiting naar Schiphol. Dit appartement is bovendien uitstekend gelegen ten opzichte van de uitvalswegen. Binnen een paar minuten bent u op de Ring A-10. Parkeren middels parkeervergunning.  Indeling: Middels het gezamenlijke trappenhuis, komt u op de eerste verdieping. De centrale hal geeft toegang tot alle vertrekken. De royale, lichte en recentelijk gerenoveerde woonkamer met open keuken is gelegen aan de voorzijde van de woning. De grote ramen zorgen voor veel lichtinval in deze ruimte. Het balkon is gelegen aan de voorzijde. De moderne keuken is voorzien van diverse inbouw apparatuur Een ruim bemeten master-slaapkamer en een kleinere tweede slaapkamer, ideaal als werk kamer.  De badkamer is uitgerust met bad, separate douche en wastafel. De woning is voorzien van houten vloer.  English Living in the most beautiful part of the Helmersbuurt! This two bedroom UNFURNISHED apartment of approx. 80m2 with balcony and storage room is located at the Alberdingk  Thijmstraat, in the beloved area called The Helmersbuurt (Old West). Situated at the corner, this apartment has lots of daylight coming in. The house has an oak floor. With its many local shops, cosy restaurants and nice coffee shops so nearby, this neighbourhood exhales an almost village-like atmosphere.  Location: You will live in the popular and beloved area Helmersbuurt (Old West district). Quiet, but still so close to the Leidseplein &  Overtoom and to the beautiful Vondelpark for the "green" relaxation. All facilities are within walking distance. Supermarkets (Albert Heijn and Marqt), shops, tennis courts, gyms, restaurants and cosy pubs are also walking distance. Last but not least the unique project: ‘De Hallen’ located in the former tram depot with an indoor food market, restaurants, a cinema and a hotel. Overall a unique spot to spend an afternoon. You can visit as well the Bosboom Toussaintstraat and the Eerste Constantijn Huygensstraat and what about the famous P.C. Hooftstraat with its luxury shops just a few steps away and don’t forget the Museumplein with several museums. Taking the bike, you are within a few minutes at Leidseplein and in ten minutes on the Dam Square. Just a few minutes’ walk from the Overtoom where you can take tramline 1 to the centre Central Station or station Lelylaan which has a direct 7 minute connection to Schiphol-Airport. This apartment is also ideally situated to the exit roads. Within a few minutes you are on the Ring A-10. Parking is via a parking permit.  Layout: Through the communal staircase, you will enter the apartment on the first floor. The central hall gives access to all rooms. The spacious, and bright living room with open kitchen is located at the front of the house. The large windows provide lots of daylight in this room. The house has an oak floor. The balcony is located at the street side. The modern kitchen is equipped with various built in appliances. A spacious master bedroom and a smaller second bedroom which can be used as an office. The bathroom gives access to the bathroom with a bath, shower and sink and toilet.

~THIS PROPERTY IS  NOT  FOR SHARING~   Looking  for a home where  you  can perfectly live with a  family  and nanny or older child in  the same  building? Then this apartment (unfurnished) is exactly what you are looking for! The apartment is also for sale.  This property actually consists of 2 apartments. An apartment on the first floor and a renovated small apartment on the fourth floor. The bright apartment of approximately 85 m2 on the first floor consists of 4 rooms, on the 4th / 5th floor a renovated living space of 43 m2 in total consisting of a floor of 31 m2 and via an internal staircase a room under the roof of 12 m2.  The 128 m2 property was built in the 1930s and located in a beautiful wide street in Amsterdam South, in the popular Rivierenbuurt. From the front you have a beautiful view of the water of the Amstel Canal.  LAYOUT APARTMENT FIRST FLOOR An authentic Amsterdam portico with stone stairs leads to the private entrance of the completely renovated apartment. The beautiful wooden entrance door opens into a beautiful portal with wardrobe and provides access to the spacious bright hall. All rooms are accessible from this hall, as well as the separate toilet, the meter cupboard and a cupboard with connection for a washing machine and dryer.  The living room extends over the entire width of the house and can be divided in two by means of a sliding door with glass surface division. Three built-in wardrobes provide the necessary storage space. In the morning the sun shines through the windows and attractive bay window in the living room. From here there is a beautiful view of the water where many boats sail. The master bedroom is located at the rear of the apartment and gives access to the west-facing balcony with a view of the green inner garden. A spacious built-in wardrobe, with TV connection, offers plenty of storage space.  From both the master bedroom and the hall there is access to the fully tiled bathroom with underfloor heating which has a washbasin, a walk-in shower, a bath and niches in the wall for bathroom accessories.  The attractive kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances, including a microwave and extractor hood, a dishwasher and a refrigerator. The floor is finished with tiles framed by a wooden trim. From the kitchen there is also an access to the balcony.  The second bedroom at the rear has a spacious wardrobe and two windows with a view of the garden.  The entire apartment on the first floor has a beautiful herringbone parquet floor, except for the kitchen, the walls are plastered in white and the living rooms and bedrooms have frames. All windows are double glazed.  FOURTH FLOOR APARTMENT LAYOUT The fourth floor is accessible through its own entrance door, which leads to the spacious stairwell. On the top floor is the entrance to the completely renovated living space. The spacious hall has a skylight in the roof, which provides natural daylight. The deep storage room and the cupboard with connection for a washing machine are accessible from this hall. Daylight also enters these two spaces through the roof. The bright living area is located at the front. Here too there is again a skylight, which, next to the windows, provides a lot of light. The kitchen includes an electric hob and fridge. The neat bathroom with washbasin, walk-in shower and toilet is fully tiled. An open wooden staircase leads to the bright attic room with two Velux skylights and a marmoleum floor. The visible purlins of the roof construction make this room look very spacious.  NEIGHBOURHOOD The apartment is quietly located and within walking distance of the many shops, good restaurants and cafes in the Scheldestraat, Maasstraat and Beethovenstraat. A boat could be moored around the corner from the apartment in the Amstelkade. It is the ideal location to discover all the canals in Amsterdam from here. For a nice walk in the green, the Beatrix Park is less than 500 meters away. You can reach all the cultural attractions of Amsterdam South (Rijksmuseum, Stedelijk Museum, Van Gogh Museum and Concertgebouw) as well as the Center in no time by bike. The location is easily accessible by car from the Ring A10 and public transport is also nearby.  PARTICULARITIES - Total living space 128 m2 - First floor 85 m2, fourth floor 31 m2 and attic 12 m2 - Cozy and quiet neighborhood - Close to waterway - Year of construction 1936 - Block heating

Beautifully renovated and  well-insulated  2 bedroom  apartment with  lovely view of Schinkel  river  in the charming Hoofdorpplein area  in  Amsterdam Zuid. The Vondelpark, shops, restaurants  and  other amenities are within  walking distance. Schiphol ist just over 10 minutes by car and Amsterdam Zuid Station is 10 minutes by bike.  The apartment is situated on the 3rd and 4th floor of a building from around 1900 and has wooden floors and a front balcony as well as a roof terrace with a great view. The apartment is fitted with a modern kitchen and a washing machine and can be rented furnished or unfurnished.  The door to the apartment is situated on the second floor. The internal stairs lead up to the hall and separate toilet on the 3rd floor. From here you enter the spacious living / dining room with balcony and nice view of the Schinkel and a modern, open kitchen with built-in appliances and an induction hub.  On the 4th floor there are two good sized bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with two sinks, shower, bath, toilet and bidet. A built-in closet in the hall houses the washing machine.  Stairs lead up to the big roof terrace complete with table and benches which offers an amazing view of the Schinkel with its towbridge and the roofs of Amsterdam Zuid all the way to the Rijksmuseum and the Zuidas.  Energylabel A.  The price is excluding water, gas, electricity, tv and internet.  The apartment can be rented furnished for an additional 200€ / month.  Pets and smoking not permitted.  The apartment is available at the latest on 1-5-23 (moving in at the end of March can be agreed) for a period of 1 year which can be prolonged if both parties agree.

*** ENGLISH TEXT  BELOW***   GESTOFFEERD  TE-HUUR AANGEBODEN  RECENT GERENOVEERD, ZEER NET  EN  HEERLIJK LICHT APPARTEMENT VAN CA.  60  m2 PLUS 43 M2 DAKTERRAS MIDDEN  IN HET BRUISENDE PIJP. Aan de voorzijde van het appartement bevindt zich de ruime woonkamer met open keuken. De keuken is voorzien van alle benodigde inbouwapparatuur. De woonkamer biedt ruimte voor een gezellige zithoek en eethoek. Tevens is in deze ruimte een extra inbouwkast gerealiseerd welke perfect kan dienen als jassen- en/of schoenenkast. Vanuit de woonkamer is het dakterras bereikbaar. Deze is met recht bijzonder te noemen! Ruim 43 m2 dakterras in de Pijp met zongarantie! En als kers op de taart: het dakterras kan elektrisch geopend worden.   Vanuit de woonkamer is een hal naar alle overige vertrekken. In de hal is een separaat toilet gerealiseerd en een extra ruimte voor de wasmachine en droger.  Waarna de master-bedroom met privé badkamer. De slaapkamer is ruim en biedt voldoende ruimte voor een groot bed en kastenwand. Vanuit de slaapkamer is de badkamer bereikbaar. De badkamer is voorzien van een douche, wastafel en handdoekradiator.  Locatie: Het appartement bevindt zich in de populaire buurt de Pijp.  In de Pijp is een grote diversiteit aan cafés, gezellige terrasjes en leuke restaurants. In de directe nabijheid is de Albert Cuyp markt met hippe winkels en diverse delicatessenzaken. Voor recreatie kunt u terecht in verschillende parken zoals het Sarphatipark.   Bereikbaarheid:  De woning ligt zeer centraal en is uitstekend bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer: Tram en de Noord/Zuid lijn met rechtstreekse verbinding naar Centraal station zijn op steenworp afstand. Met de auto heeft u een goede aansluiting met de Ring A10,A2 en A1. Via het openbaarvervoer is Schiphol in 25 minuten te bereiken.   Bijzonderheden: Recent gerenoveerd Huurprijs € 2250,= per maand exclusief g/w/l/internet 43 m2 dakterras Gestoffeerd Goed bemeten slaapkamer Centrale ligging  Waarborgsom 2x maandhuur  Geen huisdieren   Voor deze woning is een inkomenseis van toepassing. De inkomenseis is 2,5 keer de huur (bruto) aan inkomen. Located on the third floor in the Pijp area. Around the corner from the Sarphatipark and the Albert Cuyp market.  Layout:  From the common stairwell the apartment on the third floor is reached. Also the staircase has recently been renovated and looks very neat.  At the front of the apartment is the spacious living room with open kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary built-in appliances. The living room offers space for a cozy sitting and dining area. In the immediate vicinity is the Albert Cuyp market with trendy stores and various delicatessens. For recreation you can visit various parks such as the Sarphatipark.   Accessibility:  The property is very centrally located and is easily accessible by public transport: Tram and the North/South line with direct connection to Central Station are just steps away. By car you have a good connection to the Ring A10,A2 and A1. By public transport, Schiphol Airport can be reached in 25 minutes. *** For English,  please  see below  ***  Geheel gerenoveerd en zeer  hoogwaardig  afgewerkt GEMEUBILEERD 2-kamer appartement aan  de  levendige Admiraal de Ruijterweg!  Dit  karakteristieke  pand  is in  zijn geheel gerenoveerd en is per 1 maart 2023 beschikbaar.   LOCATIE De Admiraal de Ruijterweg is een centrale, levendige straat in stadsdeel De Baarsjes met alle voorzieningen binnen handbereik.  Om de hoek vind je onder andere de Jordaan, de Da Costabuurt en de populaire Foodhallen.  De Baarsjes heeft zich de afgelopen jaren ontwikkeld tot een gezellige trendy buurt met een mix van winkels, restaurants en andere voorzieningen.  Daarbij zijn er in de directe nabijheid veel leuke winkels, restaurants en cafés, zoals bijvoorbeeld de Neef van Fred, Bar Baarsch, Bar Spek, Volare en White label coffee.  Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen bevinden diverse supermarkten (Albert Heijn, Aldi, Dirk van den Broek & Stach) zich op loopafstand, maar ook de lokale groente- en visboer en slager vindt je in de Jan Evertsenstraat. Tevens ligt de Ten Katemarkt op vijf minuten fietsafstand. Voor sport en ontspanning zijn het Erasmuspark en Rembrandtpark op steenworp afstand.  Tot slot is het appartement per auto goed bereikbaar (Ring A 10 is binnen vijf minuten te bereiken) ven zijn er diverse tram en bus haltes in de nabijheid, zelfs voor de deur.  INDELING  Middels de gemeenschappelijke entree en het nette trappenhuis v.v. vloerbedekking bereik je het appartement op de vierde en tevens bovenste verdieping. De luxe open keuken met bargedeelte gedeeltelijk uitgevoerd in greep loos donker hout is voorzien van alle mogelijke inbouw apparatuur, zoals een inductieplaat met ingebouwde afzuigkap (BORA), vaatwasser, oven, ijskast en vriezer.  In het midden van het appartement een separate wc, een wasruimte en de badkamer – voorzien van een inloopdouche en wastafel met meubel.   Aan de rustige achterzijde bevindt zich de ruime slaapkamer, schuifdeuren deuren bieden hier toegang tot het tweede balkon. Finally, the apartment is easily accessible by car (Ring A 10 can be reached within five minutes) and there are several tram and bus stops in the vicinity, even in front of the door.  LAYOUT Through the communal entrance and the neat staircase with carpet you reach the apartment on the fourth and top floor. In the middle of the apartment a separate toilet, a laundry room and the bathroom - equipped with a walk-in shower and washbasin with furniture. At the quiet rear is the spacious bedroom, sliding doors provide access to the second balcony. Fantastic double maisonette  with  a spacious  roof terrace,  a few steps away  from  the Vondelpark. **ENGLISH BELOW**  PER  DIRECT BESCHIKBAAR!   Schrijf  je nu in voor  de  beschikbare appartementen, zie de woningzoeker  op  account.southdock.nl/aanbod voor alle beschikbare woningen. Start  nu jouw  huuraanvraag op de projectwebsite SOUTHDOCK.NL. De eerste mensen zijn hun prachtige appartement al ingetrokken!  NDSM South Dock biedt ruimte aan meer dan tweehonderd appartementen. Van tweekamerappartementen van circa 62 m2 tot vijfkamerappartementen van circa 129 m2. De grote raampartijen halen het daglicht naar binnen, de buitenruimtes – een terras of balkon – geven een gevoel van ruimte. De appartementen zijn slim ingedeeld, waardoor de beschikbare ruimte optimaal wordt benut. De afwerking is luxe en met veel aandacht uitgevoerd. De badkamer en keuken zijn van alle gemakken voorzien.  NDSM South Dock ligt direct aan het water en bestaat uit meerdere gebouwen. De 18 verdiepingen hoge toren en de grote raampartijen geven NDSM South Dock een unieke uitstraling. Grootstedelijk en open, robuust en toegankelijk. De begane grond van de toren is gereserveerd voor commerciële activiteiten: kantoren, winkels en horeca. Daarboven komen appartementen. NDSM South Dock staat ook voor gemak. Zo is er een ondergrondse parkeergarage en dankzij de bringme service in de lobby mis je nooit meer een pakketje.  De gemeenschappelijke tuin en slim uitgekiende verlichting maken het compleet. NDSM South Dock heeft de perfecte mix van levendigheid, ruimte en geborgenheid.  NDSM bruist van de energie, het is dé plek voor mensen die alles uit het leven willen halen. In de directe omgeving vind je koffie- en lunchtentjes, cafés, restaurants en alle voorzieningen voor je dagelijkse boodschappen. En de stad is nooit ver weg, met de pont ben je in tien minuten in het centrum van Amsterdam.  NDSM South Dock ligt op een top locatie in Amsterdam. Direct aan het IJ schuin tegenover pontsteiger maar dan met de zon en het water op het zuiden. Door de gunstige ligging is het slechts 10 minuten rijden naar de A10 en sta je binnen 10 minuten op Amsterdam Centraal.  5 redenen om te huren in NDSM South Dock: - aan de zonkant van het IJ met uitzicht over het water en de stad - NDSM: een rauw en levendig stuk Amsterdam - twee- tot vijfkamerappartementen, voorzien van buitenruimte - het pontje voor de deur en voorzien van een ruime parkeergarage - vele voorzieningen op loopafstand  Meer weten over de South Dock huurappartementen? Zie de FAQ op de South Dock website via southdock.nl/# voor antwoord op de meest gestelde vragen. Voor overige vragen kun je contact opnemen met de makelaars!  AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY!  Register now for available flats, see the housing finder at myaccount.southdock.nl/housing-offers/ for all available properties. Start your rental application now on the project website southdock.nl/en/. The first people have already moved into their beautiful flat!  NDSM South Dock offers space for more than two hundred flats. From two-room flats of around 62 m2 to five-room flats of around 129 m2. The large windows bring in daylight, while the outdoor spaces - a terrace or balcony - give a sense of space. The flats are cleverly arranged, making best use of the available space. Finishing is luxurious and done with great attention. The bathroom and kitchen are fully equipped.  NDSM South Dock is located right on the water and consists of several buildings. The 18-storey tower and large windows give NDSM South Dock a unique appearance. Metropolitan and open, robust and accessible. The ground floor of the tower is reserved for commercial activities: offices, shops and catering establishments. Above it will be flats. NDSM South Dock also stands for convenience. There is an underground car park and thanks to the bringme service in the lobby, you will never miss a parcel again.  The communal garden and cleverly designed lighting complete it. NDSM South Dock has the perfect mix of liveliness, space and security.  Bustling with energy, NDSM is the place for people who want to get the most out of life. In the immediate vicinity you will find coffee and lunch bars, cafés, restaurants and all facilities for your daily shopping. And the city is never far away; the ferry takes you into the centre of Amsterdam in ten minutes.  NDSM South Dock is in a prime location in Amsterdam. Right on the IJ obliquely opposite the ferry pier but with the sun and water facing south. Because of its convenient location, it is only a 10-minute drive to the A10 and you are at Amsterdam Central Station within 10 minutes.  5 reasons to rent in NDSM South Dock: - on the sunny side of the IJ with views over the water and the city - NDSM: a raw and lively part of Amsterdam - two- to five-room flats with outdoor space - the ferry in front of the door and a spacious car park - Many amenities within walking distance  Want to know more about the South Dock rental flats? See the FAQ on the South Dock website at southdock.nl/en/#  for answers to the most frequently asked questions. For other questions, please contact the estate agents!

Elegant living in  a  completely high-end  new-build apartment  in the center of  Amsterdam.   Special living in one  of  the luxury apartments of the crown  project  "The  Artesia" at  Reguliersdwarsstraat 98, 100 and 106. This three-room apartment is located on the third floor and has a loggia facing south. The high level of finish and the choice of materials contribute to a stylish living experience. The rear of the apartment and the balcony overlook a triple garden designed by the internationally renowned landscape architect Piet Oudolf. The view of this secluded courtyard garden is breathtaking.  A tour  The third floor Upon entering via the communal staircase or elevator, the modern open kitchen at the rear immediately appeals to the imagination. The custom-made kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances and a cooking island with breakfast bar. The living room receives a lot of daylight through the various windows, which creates a spacious and open feeling. At the front are the two spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and the bathroom with sink, shower and bath. There is a separate toilet in the hall. The entire apartment has underfloor heating and a lighting plan is available. Light materials and colors have been used which gives a feeling of elegance and luxury.  The project The Artia consists of a triptych of 17th-century buildings, located at Herengracht 543 and buildings built on the Reguliersdwarsstraat behind it. This concerns house numbers 98, 100 to 104 and 106, including the original coach house.  The homes will be connected to a ATES installation with 17 groundwater sources of approximately three hundred meters deep. The sources include the installed heat pumps for heating or cooling. The buildings and apartments are also architecturally insulated by means of retaining walls, underlying floors and roofs. In this way a gasless complex is realized with energy label A++(+). The project design was done by Hofman Dujardin who focus on a high-end look and feel.  The environment and accessibility The Reguliersdwarsstraat is formed by the village-like character in the center of Amsterdam. The area offers a wide range of shops, restaurants, terraces, coffee cafes and cultural hotspots such as the Rijksmuseum, De Hermitage, Royal Theater Carré, Hortus Botanicus and Artis. The house is easily accessible by the various tram and bus stops and the metro station of the North / South line on the Rokin.  The specifications  - Available: directly; - Rental price: € 2.500,- excl. utilities etc. per month; - Rental term; a minimum of 12 months; - Security deposit: 2 months' rent; - CPI + 1%; - Unfurnished. APPARTEMENT H–F EXCLUSIEF  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, large storage  room  for storage / technology with  connection  for the washer / dryer, separate toilet and  modern bathroom  with walk-in shower and sink. On the south side two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one with access to the south-facing balcony. On the south side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with built-in appliances.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. The scent of flowers, singing birds and the feeling of ultimate freedom and privacy will meet you if you have the exclusive pleasure of living here. TE HUUR: Zeer  hoogwaardig  afgewerkt, luxueus  appartement met  internationale allure, gelegen op  een  laag (ca 210M2) direct aan  het  Vondelpark. Het appartement beschikt over een  royale  woonkeuken, waanzinnige woon/leefruimte met  toegang tot een ruim prive gelegen terras. Drie goed bemeten slaapkamers (beschikken over airco), twee luxe badkamers (o.a. ligbad, stoom douche en dubbele douche). Het appartement geniet een prachtig uitzicht op het Vondelpark, is gelegen in een kleinschalig vrijstaand statig gebouw, en beschikt over twee inpandige parkeerplaatsen op loopafstand.  Zoals eerder vermeld, het geheel heeft een zeer hoogwaardig afwerkingsniveau.  Indeling: Middels de lift komt u direct uit in de hal van de woning. De hal biedt toegang tot alle vertrekken.  Direct bij binnenkomst komt u in de woonkeuken. Deze woonkeuken (Valcucine) is voorzien van alle denkbare luxe voorzieningen, onder andere: een Liebherr koelkast + vriezer, een Gaggenau hete lucht oven en stoomoven , een warmhoudlade en een Liebherr wijnklimaatkast.  De charmante, riante en lichte living bestaat uit drie in elkaar overlopende ruimten. U geniet hierdoor vanuit de living van een prachtig weids uitzicht over het Vondelpark. De living beschikt over een knusse tv hoek en een ingebouwde gashaard. Middels de living heeft u tevens toegang tot het ruime zonnige terras welke op het Zuidwesten gelegen is.  De goed bemeten master bedroom is gelegen aan de achterzijde van het appartement en beschikt over een eigen badkamer en toilet. De badkamer is voorzien van een dubbele wastafel, douche een ligbad (met uitzicht op het Vondelpark). De badkamer heeft een ingebouwde tv, waardoor u de mogelijkheid geniet vanuit het ligbad televisie te kijken. De ruime douche heeft een ingebouwde stoomcabine. Uiteraard is deze slaapkamer ook voorzien van diverse inbouwkasten.  De twee overige slaapkamers zijn beide van goed formaat en kunnen middels de hal de tweede badkamer bereiken. De tweede badkamer beschikt over een dubbele douche en dubbele wastafel. Uiteraard is er ook een separaat toilet aanwezig.  In het midden van het appartement treft u de bijkeuken, deze bijkeuken is voorzien van een laundry en veel bergruimte.  Ligging:  Gelegen op top locatie in een rustige straat direct aan het Vondelpark, op steenworp afstand van bekende winkelstraten als de P.C. Hooftstraat, Van Baerlestraat en de altijd gezellige Cornelis Schuytstraat. Ook diverse uitgaansgelegenheden als het Leidseplein en het concert gebouw liggen binnen handbereik. Diverse tram en buslijnen treft u in de directe nabijheid, maar ook middels auto is de ringweg A10 binnen enkele minuten bereikbaar.   Bijzonderheden: - Huurprijs: EUR 12.000 per maand, excl. G/W/E; - Per direct beschikbaar;  - Domotica, video- intercomsysteem en persoonlijke sleutel lift;  - Gehele appartement beschikt over ingebouwde speakers, aangestuurd door een Sonos systeem;  - De slaapkamers zijn voorzien van airco;  - Twee inpandige parkeerplaatsen beschikbaar;  - Alarmsysteem;  - Zeer hoogwaardig afgewerkt, internationale allure.

Completely renovated 3-room  apartment  with spacious  balcony on  the Ceramplein in the  popular  'Indische buurt' of Amsterdam. The  apartment  is very spacious and has a  living area  of ??no less than 87 m². The apartment complex was built in 1998 and is therefore completely insulated. The kitchen has been completely renewed and is equipped with various built-in appliances. A beautiful new floor has been laid and the walls and ceilings have been plastered and painted. The laundry room with lots of extra storage space is centrally located in the apartment. This indoor storage room is closed with a barndoor (sliding door). The bathroom has been upgraded and has a bath, corner shower and a beautiful washbasin. The separate toilet is located in the hall. The balcony at the front of the apartment is wonderfully spacious and situated on the sunny southwest. There is a bicycle shed on the ground floor. The lively bustle of Javaplein is just around the corner, with plenty of nice restaurants, hip shops and nice terraces. Public transport is perfectly arranged, within walking distance is NS station Muiderpoort. What else do you want? The apartment can be rented for a period of 2 years. Interested? Comfortabel licht 3-kamer  appartement  aan de  rand van  Amsterdam van circa 81  m2.  De woning is voorzien van  onder  andere een dichte keuken, een badkamer  met  ligbad en separate douche,  2 slaapkamers en een fijn balkon. Het appartement is gelegen in de wijk Buitenveldert: rustig wonen met alle gemakken binnen handbereik!  Spangenhof 39 3-kamer appartement met een oppervlakte van 81 m2.  Het appartement beschikt over een lichte woonkamer van 25 m2 met toegang tot het balkon. Een van de slaapkamers tref je en suite aan de woonkamer. Deze slaapkamer is 11 m2 en ook prima in gebruik te nemen als werk- en/of studeerkamer. De tweede slaapkamer heeft een oppervlakte van 13 m2. De gesloten keuken is uitgerust met een gaskookplaat, elektrische oven, spoelbak en afzuigkap. De badkamer is voorzien van een ligbad, separate douche, designradiator en een wastafel. Het toilet tref je in een aparte ruimte. Praktisch is de inpandige berging welke is voorzien van een aansluiting voor jouw wasmachine en/of droger!   Let op: Het is mogelijk dat er een wand geplaatst is tussen de woonkamer en de en suite slaapkamer.   Rustig wonen met alle gemakken binnen handbereik Hou je van de stad, maar woon je liever iets rustiger? Dan is Buitenveldert een goede keuze. Deze wijk is gebouwd als zuidelijke tuinstad van Amsterdam. Hier woon je dichtbij de aantrekkelijke Zuidas met alle voorzieningen. In Buitenveldert woon je heerlijk groen. In de nabijheid vind je het Amsterdamse Bos, waar je heerlijk kunt wandelen, sporten, spelen of kunt genieten van een heerlijke sauna. De wijk biedt een rijke schakering aan faciliteiten. Van een ruim winkelaanbod en veel sportvoorzieningen, tot scholen en kinderopvang. Winkelcentrum Gelderlandplein ligt op loopafstand. En ook de bereikbaarheid is goed. Vanuit Buitenveldert heb je een directe aansluiting op de ringweg A10, trein en sneltram.

LAYOUT  The  apartment  has recently  been completely  renovated. This beautiful three-room  apartment  is located in a well-maintained  apartment  complex in Amsterdam. This spacious apartment  is located  on the 3rd floor and is accessible via the staircase. Upon entering you enter the hall, from which all rooms are accessible. The very bright living room is located at the rear of the complex and gives access to the spacious balcony located on the West. From the balcony, there is an unobstructed view of the surroundings. The modern kitchen diner is adjacent to the living room and gives access to a smaller balcony located on the East. The kitchen diner is equipped with built-in appliances such as a dishwasher, an oven/microwave, an induction hob, a fridge and a freezer and is equipped with a dining table and chairs. The master bedroom is located at the front of the apartment and has a large wardrobe and a bed. The second bedroom is located at the rear and can optionally be furnished as desired. The bathroom has a bath with shower, a washbasin and a washer/dryer. In the hall there is a separate toilet. The entire house was renovated in 2020 and furnished and has a brand-new combination boiler. A great apartment for expats!  SURROUNDINGS  In this green and very quiet area there are several schools and recreational areas. The apartment on the Scherpenzeelstraat is very conveniently located in relation to the recently renovated Reigersbos shopping center. Public transport (reigersbos metro station) at a 2-minute walk, the metro will take you to the heart of Amsterdam in 20 minutes! Various recreational areas in the vicinity such as the Gaasperplas and Abcoude. Also very centrally located in relation to highways (A2, A9, A10). Gaasperdam is a neat, quiet and very green neighbourhood. In addition, within walking distance is the Reigersbos shopping center with various shops and eateries. The Bijlmercentrum, where there are various shops, eateries and entertainment, can be reached within cycling distance.  INFORMATION  Basic rent: € 1.750,- Deposit: € 3.500,- Contract: Model B, rental agreement Excluding utilities

*** See English  version  below ***   De  Havenmeester, een modern appartementencomplex  aan  de Krijn Taconiskade op IJburg  bestaande  uit 66 luxe 3-kamer appartementen en  drie exclusieve penthouses variërend in  grootte 88 tot 207 m2. De appartementen beschikken over 3 of 4 kamers en zijn voorzien van een luxe inbouwkeuken.  - Licht, lucht en een geweldig uitzicht - De meeste woningen aan de zuidwestkant van het gebouw zijn uitgerust met een afsluitbaar balkon dat zich over de volle gevelbreedte van bijna achter meter uitstrekt. De afgesloten balkons zijn middels vouwpuien volledig te openen. Aan de havenzijde zijn de balkons iets smaller en dieper gemaakt, zodat je vanuit de woonkamer uitkijkt op het water. Dankzij de verdiepingshoge ramen hebben licht, lucht en uitzicht vrij spel.  - Locatie – IJburg is een van de nieuwste stadswijken in Amsterdam, bestaande uit zeven eilanden met elk een eigen karakter. IJburg betekent wonen én werken op een steenworp afstand van de bruisende hoofdstad omgeven in een groene en waterrijke omgeving.  Het appartement ligt centraal naast de uitvalswegen A1, A9 en A10. Met het openbaar vervoer ben je in 15-20 minuten op Amsterdam Centraal Station. Op loopafstand vind je een supermarkt, de jachthaven, diverse restaurants en natuurlijk IJburg strand  - Bijzonderheden Krijn Taconiskade 208 - • Woonoppervlakte ca. 92 m2; • Ruim 3 kamer appartement; • 2 slaapkamers; • Luxe keuken voorzien van inbouwapparatuur; • Badkamer en separate toilet; • Bouwjaar: 2006; • Energielabel: D  - Inkomensrichtlijnen - • Om in aanmerking te komen voor deze woning is het goed te weten dat we hiervoor inkomensrichtlijnen hanteren. Als alleenverdiener bedraagt je bruto maandsalaris (inclusief vakantiegeld en 13e maand) 4x keer de vermelde huurprijs van deze woning. • Voor tweeverdieners tellen wij het tweede inkomen voor 50% mee. • Rekenvoorbeeld: het bruto (gezamenlijke inkomen) maandinkomen voor een woning die € 1.000,- per maand kost is dus € 4.000 (1.000 x 4). • In sommige gevallen is een waarborgsom verplicht. • Ben je een zelfstandig ondernemer, gepensioneerd of meer informatie over de inkomensrichtlijnen? Ga naar dan naar onze website: vanderlinden.nl/woning-huren/faq  - Wil je in aanmerking komen voor deze woning? - Ben je enthousiast geworden over deze woning en voldoe je aan de inkomensrichtlijnen? Kijk dan op vanderlinden.nl/woning-huren om je direct digitaal in te schrijven als woningzoekende.  - Goed om te weten - • Getoonde foto's zijn van een modelwoning en niet van de specifieke woning zelf. • De huurovereenkomst wordt aangegaan voor de duur van 12 maanden. Na deze periode is deze maandelijks opzegbaar, de opzegtermijn bedraagt één maand.  Alle informatie met betrekking tot de woning is met zorg samengesteld. Deze is echter indicatief en er kunnen geen rechten aan ontleend worden.  ***  The Havenmeester consist of 66 luxury 3-room apartments and three exclusive penthouses varying in size from 88 to 207 m2 located on the Krijn Taconiskade in IJburg (Amsterdam). The apartments have 3 or 4 rooms and are equipped with a luxury fitted kitchen.  - Rooms with a great view - Most homes on the south-west side of the building are equipped with a balcony that extends over the full width. Folding doors that can be fully opened give access to the balcony. Balconies facing the harbor are slightly narrower and deeper. This enables you to view the water from the living room. The apartment feels wide open thanks to the floor-to-ceiling windows which allow lots of natural light in.  - Location - IJburg Amsterdam consists of seven islands, each with its own character. The apartment is centrally located next to the highway A1, A9 and A10. You can reach Amsterdam Central Station in 15-20 minutes by public transport. Within walking distance you can find a supermarket, the marina, various restaurants and of course IJburg beach.  - Facts and features Krijn Taconiskade 208 - • Living space approx. 92 square meter; • Spacious 3 room apartment; • 2 bedrooms; • Luxurious kitchen with built-in appliances; • Bathroom and separate toilet; • Year of construction: 2006; • Energy label: D  - Income requirements - • The income requirements for this apartment are at least 4x the monthly rent. • As a single earner your gross monthly salary (including holiday pay and 13th month) should be a minimum of 4x the rent. • A second income from your partner counts for 50%. • Example: the minimum required gross monthly (combined) income for a home that costs € 1,000 per month is therefore € 4,000 (1,000 x 4). • In some cases a deposit is required. • Are you self-employed, retired or more information about the income requirements? Please visit our website: vanderlinden.nl/woning-huren/faq  - Apply for this apartment - Go to: vanderlinden.nl/woning-huren and apply for this apartment online.  - Good to know - • Some of the photos shown are of a model home and not of the specific home itself. • The minimum rental period is 12 months. Notice period for the tenant is 1 month.  We have selected this information with the utmost care. All information regarding this property are indicative. No rights can be derived from the information provided.

Groenmarktkade, Amsterdam Jordaan  (approx.  125 m2)  € 3750,-  Excl. W/E per month   This very tasteful new-build complex  is  located in a prime location on the Singelgracht,  in the  center of Amsterdam. The 9 streets and Leidseplein are also within walking distance. The house is spread over two floors and has a very efficient layout. The apartment will be unfurnished.  The very spacious living room is located on the first floor and can be reached via the stairs at the front of the house. The front of the living room offers a lot of light thanks to the high windows. The spacious balcony can also be reached through the sliding doors. On the other side of the living room is the luxurious kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped, including a refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, Bora induction plate, Quooker, microwave and wine climate cabinet. Next to the kitchen is an extra room/utility room with lots of indoor storage space. The entire house has a beautiful wooden herringbone floor with underfloor heating. Energylabel A++.  The basement can be reached via the beautiful staircase in the living room. On this floor are the two bedrooms, both with their own bathroom. Both bedrooms have enough space for a double bed and wardrobe. The first bathroom has a walk-in shower, bath, sink and toilet. The second bedroom also has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and sink. There is also a separate toilet on this floor.  This brand new building includes a bicycle shed and a communal roof-dune landscape which can be reached via the lift. Here is the swimming pool which is heated (April-October) by the solar panels on the swimming pool. From the roof terrace there is a beautiful panoramic view of Amsterdam and the Westerkerk! There are also fitness machines on the upper floors that can be used. In addition, it is possible to rent a private parking space at an additional cost. There are also no less than 2 external storage rooms. In addition, this beautiful building is the winner of the Zuiderkerk Prize (architecture prize) December 2022 "Best Building in Amsterdam".  The house is located on the edge of the Jordaan and the Da Costabuurt. There are many cozy restaurants, cafes and other entertainment options in the area. (International) schools, shops and supermarkets are also within walking distance. Near public transport tram lines 10, 13 and 14.  This very luxurious apartment is available immediately for a rental period of at least 12 months.

Are you searching  for  a fabulous  and turn-key  corner apartment on the  16th  floor of a sustainably build  and  brand new building with all amenities  available?  Newly build high-end apartment (71,2 m2) with two bedrooms, facade garden and a sunny balcony facing the southwest. The apartment is located on the 16th floor of apartment building VERTICAL EAST in the central part of Sloterdijk close to the train- and metrostation. De property was completed by the end of 2022!  VERTICAL EAST The building is constructed under architecture, future proof, highly insulated and completely gas-free. By use of the WKO installation for underground Heat-Cold storage, solar (boiler) panels and windmills/turbines the demand for energy is kept as low as possible. It is not surprising that the apartment has an energy label A++.  Various shared amenities are there for the residents such as a common bicycle parking, a common courtyard and facade gardens. The 5th floor holds a roofgarden with terrace and multiple “Shared Living” spaces such as a gym, a privat dining room with open kitchen and toilet and 2 guest rooms with bathroom.  Unique feature is the possibility for car and electric bicycle sharing, provided by the owners association.  LAY-OUT First floor: common main entrance with intercom/videophone system and mailboxes; staircase and elevators.  16th Floor: entrance hall with access to all rooms. Spacious bright living room with contemporary well equipped open kitchen with an induction hob, extractor hood, oven, refrigerator and dishwasher. The high windows provide a fantastic view of the surroundings. The living room has access to a balcony of approximately 6 m2 facing southwest. On the south side are two spacious bright bedrooms. The modern bathroom features a bathtub, walk-in shower and sink. Furthermore, there is a separate toilet with hand basin and a spacious indoor storage/utility room with connections for washing machine and/or dryer.  The living room and both bedrooms are surrounded by a facade garden which contributes to the optimal experience of nature.  The house is connected to a communal heat and power installation (WKO-installation) and a mechanical ventilation system with WTW installation. This provides the apartment with heating in winter and cooling in summer.  SURROUNDINGS AND ACCESSIBILITY Amsterdam Sloterdijk is the transition zone between the green area and the city. It is a relatively undiscovered area that is rapidly developing into a metropolitan living/working community where office buildings and unique architectural apartment buildings alternate. The area provides space for greenery (Garden of BRET and Westerpark) and culture (The School and Amsterdam Art Center). For daily shopping one can go to the shopping centers at Willem Kraanstraat and Bos en Lommerplein, both within cycling distance of the apartment.  The presence of an excellent public transport network and its proximity to the A-10 ring road make Sloterdijk-Centrum a real hub location. The apartment is within walking distance of Station Amsterdam-Sloterdijk station, providing easy access to all parts of the city, Schiphol Airport and surrounding cities such as Haarlem.  KEY FEATURES - Build in 2019, completed by the end of 2022. - Living area 71.20 m2 according to NEN measurement report. - Located on the 16th floor with phenomenal views. - Energy label A++. - Equipped with smoke detectors and a Smart Home System  - Beautiful oak herringbone parquet floor. - Modern kitchen with built-in appliances. - Paid parking.  RENTAL CONDITIONS - Delivery in consultation, possible on short term. - It concerns temporary rental on the basis of the "Leegstandwet" (minimum 6 months, maximum 5 years). - Upholstered. - Rental price € 2,500 per month. - Excluding gas, water, electricity, internet/tv and municipal taxes. - Deposit 2 months rent. - Income requirement: gross income at least 3.5x the monthly rent. - No pets allowed. - Not suitable for students. - Screening of the tenant is part of the procedure.

Tastefully 'fully furnished'  two-bedroom  apartment of  95 sq.m,  located on the ground  floor  with a large garden. The  building  has a gym and bike storage. Comfortabel licht 3-kamer  appartement  aan de  rand van  Amsterdam van circa 75  m2.  De woning is voorzien van  onder  andere een dichte keuken, een badkamer  met ligbad en separate douche,  2 slaapkamers en een fijn balkon. Het appartement is gelegen in de wijk Buitenveldert: rustig wonen met alle gemakken binnen handbereik!  Geervliet 183 3-kamer appartement met een oppervlakte van 75 m2.  Het appartement beschikt over een lichte woonkamer van 25 m2 met toegang tot het balkon. Een van de slaapkamers tref je en suite aan de woonkamer. Deze slaapkamer is 13 m2 en ook prima in gebruik te nemen als werk- en/of studeerkamer. De tweede slaapkamer heeft een oppervlakte van 12 m2. De gesloten keuken is uitgerust met een gaskookplaat, elektrische oven, spoelbak en afzuigkap. De badkamer is voorzien van een ligbad, separate douche, designradiator en een wastafel. Het toilet tref je in een aparte ruimte. Praktisch is de inpandige berging welke is voorzien van een aansluiting voor jouw wasmachine en/of droger!   Let op: Het is mogelijk dat er een wand geplaatst is tussen de woonkamer en de en suite slaapkamer.   Rustig wonen met alle gemakken binnen handbereik Hou je van de stad, maar woon je liever iets rustiger? Dan is Buitenveldert een goede keuze. Deze wijk is gebouwd als zuidelijke tuinstad van Amsterdam. Hier woon je dichtbij de aantrekkelijke Zuidas met alle voorzieningen. In Buitenveldert woon je heerlijk groen. In de nabijheid vind je het Amsterdamse Bos, waar je heerlijk kunt wandelen, sporten, spelen of kunt genieten van een heerlijke sauna. De wijk biedt een rijke schakering aan faciliteiten. Van een ruim winkelaanbod en veel sportvoorzieningen, tot scholen en kinderopvang. Winkelcentrum Gelderlandplein ligt op loopafstand. En ook de bereikbaarheid is goed. Vanuit Buitenveldert heb je een directe aansluiting op de ringweg A10, trein en sneltram.

Houthavenkade/Amsterdam (approx. 60  m2)  €2200,- excl.  G/W/E  This new 2-room apartment  on  the ground floor is located  in  the dynamic and trendy Houthaven area. The house  offers a  panoramic view of the surroundings and the Nieuwe Houthavens. Through the entrance you directly reach the modern open kitchen, which is equipped with all comforts, such as a Quooker, Bosch oven, induction hob with extractor, dishwasher and refrigerator. The entire apartment has a beautiful tiled floor with underfloor heating. The living room is spacious and equipped with a modern design sofa and antique cupboard. A lot of cupboard space has been created in the high cupboards, which you can reach via a nice staircase. Through the living room you can go through the patio doors to the outdoor area where you can sit in peace. The bedroom has a lovely double bed and a skylight for natural light. From the bedroom there is access to the bathroom, which is complete and luxuriously finished with a floating toilet, lovely walk-in shower and double sink. There is a communal terrace in the cozy courtyard. The apartment is located in a 100% climate neutral and sustainable residential area. There is therefore no gas available and as a result the monthly advance payment for electricity, water and internet is relatively low; less than €170 per month all-in.  Near the Spaarndammerstraat with its many catering and dining options, terraces, shops, sports facilities, with the Westerpark around the corner and the future Spaarndammerpark as "the backyard" of the apartment complex, this is a wonderful environment to live and relax. Very good accessibility by various roads (A10, A5, A8 and A7). Excellent public transport connections (bus stops just around the corner and tram lines and train stations are close by). Amsterdam Central Station and Sloterdijk Station are approximately 10 minutes by bike.  The furnished apartment is available from 01-04-2023 for a rental period of max. 2 years.

English version below!   Sfeervolle woning  op een  centrale locatie in de  Kerkstraat.  Compleet gerenoveerd in 2009, bestaande  uit  4 woonlagen, 3 slaapkamers (4 mogelijk),  eikenhouten vloeren  en 2 terrassen op het zuiden!  De woning is per direct beschikbaar, de maandelijkse huur bedraagt €3.500,- inclusief water, gas, elektra en internet.  Het is niet geschikt voor woningdelers en de woning is beschikbaar voor 10/12 maanden, dit wordt in overleg afgestemd. Er zijn geen huisdieren toegestaan. De woning wordt gemeubileerd verhuurd.  Indeling: Begane grond: Entree, hal, bijkeuken met wasmachine/droger/berging, half ligbad, meterkast, doorgang naar kelder (geschikt als berging).   Eerste verdieping: Via dubbele Franse deuren komt u binnen in de zeer ruime royale (70m2) woon/eetkamer met een lange (280cm) massief eiken eettafel. Er zijn twee doorgangen naar het grote (18m2) terras met prachtig uitzicht op de binnenplaats. Half open keuken (Bulthaup) met ingebouwde Nespresso machine, 5-pits gasfornuis met afzuigkap, magnetron, vaatwasser, koelkast en Quooker. Via de korte trap en een schuifdeur vindt u de comfortabele (20m2) bibliotheek/kantoor ruimte met Mobilia-bureau, verschuifbaar boekenplanksysteem en uitzicht op de straat.   Tweede verdieping: Slaapkamer met aangrenzend terras (13m2) op het zuiden, tweede (gasten)slaapkamer met uitzicht op de straat, zeer luxueuze badkamer met duo-ligbad, toilet en separate douche.   Derde verdieping: Slaapkamer / complete badkamer met duo-ligbad, dubbele wastafel, douchecabine en toilet.  Omgeving: Gelegen tussen de Vijzelstraat en de Reguliersgracht. Metro- en tramhaltes op loopafstand, Rembrandtplein, Prinsengracht, Keizergracht, Herengracht en Reguliersgracht en talloze restaurants en pubs. Ook bereikt u met een paar minuten lopen de nachtclubs van het Leidsplein, het Nationeel Theater, het Rijksmuseum en de Amstel. Kortom, de levendigheid van het centrum van Amsterdam binnen handbereik maar zonder de drukte.   Bijzonderheden: - Volledig gemeubileerd - 174m2 plus terrassen; - Per direct beschikbaar; - Huurperiode 10-12 maanden; - Video-intercomsysteem; - Eigen entree; - Recentelijk voorzien van LED-verlichting en dimmers overal.  "Deze informatie is door ons met de nodige zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan. Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn indicatief. Van toepassing zijn de NVM voorwaarden."  ***  Charming row house on centrally located Kerkstraat Street. Completely renovated in 2009, this home comprises 4 floors with 3 bedrooms (potentially 4), hardwood floors (oak) throughout, 2 terraces facing South.  The house is available immediately, the monthly rent is € 3.500, including water, gas, electricity and internet.  It is not suitable for home sharers and the home is available for 10/12 months, this will be agreed in consultation. No pets are allowed. The house is rented furnished.  Division:  Ground floor: Entrance hallway, utility room with washer/dryer/storage, half bath, electrical closet, passageway to small cellar (suitable for storage).  First floor:  Enter through double French doors to very spacious (70m2 ) living/dining area with long (280cm) solid oak dining table. Two doorways to large (18m2) terrace with courtyard view.  Semi-open kitchen (Bulthaup) with built-in Nespresso machine, 5-burner gas stove with hood,  microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, Quooker.  Three steps and a sliding door finds a comfortable (20m2) office/library with Mobilia desk, sliding bookshelf system, and street view.   Second floor: Bedroom with adjacent terrace (13m2), second (guest) bedroom with street view, full bath with  duo-bath and shower cabinet.  Third floor: Bedroom/ full en suite bath with duo-bath, double sink, shower cabinet.  Location: Between Vijzelstraat and Reguliersgracht.  Very few minutes walk to metro and tram stops, Rembrantplein, four canals (Prinsengracht, Kaisergracht, Herengracht, and Reguliersgracht), and countless restaurants and pubs.  A few minutes more on foot reaches the nightclubs of Leidseplein, the National Theatre, the Rijksmuseum, and the Amstel River.  In short, the liveliness of the center of Amsterdam within easy reach but without the crowds.  Details:  - Fully furnished  - 174m2 plus terraces; - Available from now on; - Rental of 10/12 months; - Video intercom system; - Private entrance; - Recently retrofitted with LED lighting and dimmer switches throughout.

Nachtwachtlaan 326+PP 1058  EL  Amsterdam.  Only available  for: - one person  -  couples - two young professionals  (sharing)   Bright and recently renovated three-bedroom  penthouse  flat located on the  sixteenth floor of a residential complex located at the foot of-and overlooking-the Rembrandtpark and the skyline of Amsterdam. Underneath the building is a closed garage with parking.  Surroundings and accessibility The dynamics of the city in the background, the breathtaking view of the Zuid-As, the Rembrandt Park in front of the door and all the conveniences of the city at a short distance make this a fantastic location. You will find the centre of Amsterdam just a few minutes by bike. With the World Fashion Center and various catering and shopping facilities a short distance away, there is plenty to do in the immediate vicinity. Thanks to its location within the Ring Road, all connections to locations within and outside the city are within easy reach. The well-maintained apartment complex is located within the Ring directly on the green Rembrandt Park and has a caretaker. It is less than 15 minutes by bike from Amsterdam's most central locations such as Museumplein, Leidseplein and the Jordaan area. The Rembrandtpark is a beautiful well-maintained and relatively quiet park, great for walking or exercising. There is also a petting zoo in the park. Via the Rembrandtpark, you can walk into the Vondelpark within 10 minutes. There are many nice places to eat or drink in the area. Amsterdam's own food market 'De Hallen' is also within easy reach. There are also nurseries, schools, gyms and shops such as Albert Heijn, Kruidvat and Lidl within walking distance. The flat is conveniently located to the A10 ring road and public transport. Schiphol Airport is less than a 15-minute drive away.  Layout Closed communal entrance with lift to the sixteenth floor. From the entrance you reach the hall a separate toilet. Spacious living room with half open fully equipped modern kitchen. Also from the kitchen direct access to the terrace/balcony which is located on the south. The bright living room provides access to side/study room which can also be used as a third bedroom.   The master bedroom with built-in wardrobe plus a second bedroom are located at the end of the hallway. Both bedrooms offer great views of the Amsterdam skyline and the Rembrandtpark.  The flat has a modern bathroom with shower and double washbasin.  Rental price flat per month € 2750,- excluding heating and utilities  Monthly rent for private parking € 150,-   Block heating per month € 250,-  Deposit Two times the rent month. Modern Furnished apartment  with  terrace and  indoor parking.   This beautiful apartment  with  terrace is situated on the  2nd  floor and is part of the residential complex  'Westerkaap 1'  with fine modern architecture. Located along the IJ river and within walking distance from the historic ‘Jordaan’.  The main entrance is on the vibrant IJ bank (Westerdoksdijk/IJ-kade) with pedestrian promenade and landing pier for Rhine cruise ships. The apartment itself is located on the very quiet city-side of the Westerdokseiland (Westerdok) facing a green courtyard with a second entrance.   Location:   The apartment is within walking distance of Central Station, Haarlemmerdijk and Haarlemmerstraat with a variety of shops, bars and restaurants.  You can do your daily shopping just around the corner at  Albert Heijn and Marqt.  In the immediate vicinity you will find a number of good restaurants facing 't IJ  In addition, the Westerpark is around the corner and there are many cafés and cultural activities. The Bimhuis, Pakhuis de Zwijger and the Muziekgebouw are more to the east of the IJ. Finally, Amsterdam North, the NSDM island and the new Eye Film Museum can be reached easily and on foot with the ferry Public transport is well served, the Central station  within walking distance and via the Spaarndammer tunnel you have a fast connection to the A10. . It is conveniently located with easy access to nearby main roads.  Layout:  Ground floor: Entrance with bell and letterbox tableau, shared enclosed courtyard and access to the communal entrance with elevator or stairs to the 2nd floor. The floor level is shared with just one other apartment.   Entrance, access to the hall with separate toilet. From the hallway you have access to two bedrooms, the bathroom and separate laundry area with washer and dryer and storage space. Modern bathroom with bath, walk-in shower and double sink with cabinets.  The spacious and light living room has 4 large sliding windows facing southwest to enjoy afternoon and evening sunshine. Luxurious open kitchen fully equipped with induction stove,  microwave, oven, dishwasher,  extractor fan and fridge freezer. From the living room you have access to the third bedroom which is now in use as a study/office space. By open stairs in the living room you will reach the south facing terrace.  The apartment has oak wooden floors,  seperate storage room in the basement  and an indoor bike storage. Private parking space in the garage downstairs,  Features:  -  Furnished -  Three bedrooms -  Location -  Roof terrace -  Private parking space including in the rent  -  Additional advance payment for heating and internet   Published measurements are not NEN measured This information has been compiled by us with the necessary care. In het bruisende  centrum  van Osdorpplein,  met alle  faciliteiten binnen handbereik ligt  een  slim ingedeeld, mooi afgewerkt, driekamerappartement  van  ca. 63.1 m² op de 2e  verdieping.  Dit fijne appartement  is op een hoek gelegen en daarmee profiteer je van extra veel lichtinval. Wat een luxe! Dit appartement beschikt over een ruime woonkamer met heerlijke buitenruimte van 5,7 m² in de vorm van een loggia gelegen op het zuidoosten. Met mooi weer is deze plek een verlengde van jouw woonkamer en haal jij het buitenleven naar binnen of andersom. De woonkamer bestaat uit een fijn zitgedeelte en een open hoekkeuken. Het appartement beschikt ook over een lichte pvc-vloer en raampartijen die van vloer tot plafond lopen, zodat het aan licht niet ontbreekt. De woning wordt opgeleverd met afgewerkte wanden, zodat jij er bijna gelijk in kunt trekken.  Het appartement is voorzien van een moderne, CO2-neutraal geproduceerde Bruynzeel keuken, uitgevoerd in model Atlas met zwarte Stretto greep lijst, de kasten zijn wit en het keukenblad is modern lichtgrijs. De keuken is voorzien van luxe inbouwapparatuur van het merk Siemens en beschikt onder meer over een combimagnetron, vaatwasser, inductiekookplaat en koelkast met vriesvak. De kasten zijn extra hoog, waardoor je nog meer opbergruimte tot jouw beschikking hebt.  De badkamer is voorzien van een inloopdouche met Hansgrohe douchemengkraan, een Villeroy & Boch wastafel met meubel en een ronde spiegel boven de wastafel. De wanden zijn afgewerkt met witte wandtegels en donkergrijze vloertegels. Het toilet is eveneens Villeroy & Boch en heeft een fonteintje.  Op het dak zijn 3 zonnepanelen direct gekoppeld naar de meter van het appartement. De opbrengst komt dus direct ten goede van het eigen verbruik.  Deze woning beschikt ook over een externe berging van ca. 5.5m²  NEW CENTRAL LIVING | 40 HUURAPPARTEMENTEN IN OSDORPPLEIN, AMSTERDAM. Waar nieuwe energie ontstaat en oude glorie bruist. Dat is de plek waar The Hub Apartments het stralende middelpunt in het vernieuwde Osdorpplein in Amsterdam wordt. Midden in het Osdorpplein komen 40 huurappartementen en vormt zich dé plek waar je wilt wonen, werken, winkelen, uitgaan en ontspannen. Je huurt hier straks vanaf circa €1.350,- per maand  (excl. servicekosten). Je hebt straks ook de mogelijkheid om gemeubileerd te huren bij The Hub Apartments.  WONINGTYPES In The Hub Apartments kun je kiezen uit 2- en 3-kamerappartementen variërend in grootte van circa 47 tot 76 m². De huurprijs is vanaf circa €1.320,- per maand  (excl. Servicekosten). De definitieve servicekosten zijn nog niet bekend. Het voorschot servicekosten is voor nu vastgesteld op een bijdrage van € 75,- per maand.  THE HUB | HET MIDDELPUNT Vanuit The Hub Apartments is alles dichtbij: de binnenstad van Amsterdam, uitvalswegen naar plekken buiten de stad zoals bijvoorbeeld Schiphol. Blijf je in de buurt, dan heb je rondom Osdorpplein al mogelijkheden te over. Van de dagelijkse boodschappen tot sneaker speciaalzaak en van snelle lunch tot romantisch dineren, keuze genoeg. Ook voor events en cultuur ben je om de hoek bij het Theater de Meervaart aan het juiste adres. Een echt middelpunt dus.  MEER WETEN?  Wil je meer weten over de verschillende type appartementen die in The Hub Apartments beschikbaar zijn en je interesse bij ons kenbaar maken, ga dan naar de projectwebsite thehubapartments.nl. An elegant home  by  the water  in a  modern, architecturally-designed villa. Its  abundant  floorspace, a modern look and  feel  and location make this villa unique.  On-lot  parking, a built-in elevator,  excellent layout and easy maintenance contribute to an extremely comfortable living experience.   A tour The spacious entrance on the ground floor features several built-in closets, the coat area, comfortable stairs to the first floor and the elevator. A modern pivot door opens to the living space with enormous sliding glass doors, a fireplace and open gallery. At the rear, the semi-open plan Gaggenau kitchen features a large breakfast bar and a full range of modern fitted appliances. The wine room is off the kitchen, and can accommodate hundreds of bottles of wine.   The ground floor also includes the property's first two bedrooms and a central bathroom. The bathroom is equipped with a spacious walk-in shower, toilet and custom made vanity.   The first floor The comfortable stairs or elevator lead upstairs. This level features the property's further three bedrooms, the large walk-in closet, laundry and the open gallery. The gallery is the focal point of this level, and can be appointed un a multi-functional manner: for example, it can serve as an extra lounge area or office space. Tucked away in the built-in closets is a pantry.  The master bedroom features a large walk-in closet and a private bathroom with a bathtub, walk-in shower and custom made vanity.   The outdoor space  The professionally landscaped garden at the rear of the home borders on the water and is surrounded by greenery. The garden faces south, so that the terrace is the ideal space to enjoy the sunshine until late in the afternoon.   The master bedroom on the first floor also opens to the balcony with a view of the garden.   The area and accessibility  The property is situated in popular and family-friendly Buitenveldert borough. Genhoes is tranquil street, lined predominantly with detached homes that all border on the water. Shops, schools, parks including Aemstelpark, Amstelpark and Amsterdamse Bos are all within walking distance. Groot Gelderlandplein shopping mall is ideal for groceries, as well as an afternoon of shopping or a delicious lunch. By bicycle or public transport, Zuidas, Oud Zuid and Amsterdam's city center are easy to reach quickly.   Schiphol Airport is mere minutes away, by train via Station Amsterdam Zuid or by car via the A10 beltway.   The specifics - Rental price; €14.000,- excl. per month; - Deposit; 3 months' rent; - Rental term; max. 24 months; - Unfurnished; - Pets are not allowed; - CPI + 1%.

Fred. Roeskestraat 92  A2,  1076 ED  in Amsterdam   Fantastic modern apartment,  with  parking space, on the ground  floor  with a large terrace of 48  m²,  situated  on the nice  communal courtyard. The light living room gives access to the terrace and has a modern open kitchen. The apartment has it’s own spacious storage and private parking in the garage (included in the rental price). The apartment is part of a modern building which is located close to the Zuidas and Stadionplein. The accessibility is perfect because of its location close to the A10 highway.  Layout: The building has a locked entrance. The apartment is reachable trough the nice communal courtyard. In the hallway, there is a meter box, closet, and wardrobe. The spacious living room has an open kitchen and gives access to the terrace, which is located around two sides of the apartment. On the other side of the apartment are two bedrooms with a view on the canal behind the building. The bathroom has a walk-in shower, double washbasin, and a toilet. There is also a closet for the washing machine and dryer.  Location: This apartment is located in the South District, close to the historic Olympic Stadium. On the Stadium Square are several eateries and shops, as well as on the nearby Beethovenstraat and shopping center Gelderlandplein. The city center is also easy and quick to reach from here. For recreation, you can go to the Amsterdamse Bos or Vondelpark, which are both in a couple of minutes of cycling distance. The accessibility is also perfect, because there are multiple bus- and tram connections and the A10 highway is around the corner. Spacious loft-style living  in  an industrial  school building   Located in the  Czaar  Peterbuurt, a quiet, lively area  on  the east side of the city  center, you will find this  unique and fully styled, furnished 3-bedroom loft apartment. The apartment has been created in an old elementary school building. It has a living surface of 161m2 with a ceiling height of 3.35m. Here you can enjoy lots of light through the large windows on three sides of the apartment. The apartment has a working wood-burning fireplace and a true roof garden of 113 m2 with a light plan and watering system.  Lay-out The private entrance of the apartment can be found on the second floor of the building. The spacious staircase leads to a hall with a wardrobe, three bedrooms, the bathroom, and the living. The master bedroom has a French balcony and a big built-in wardrobe wall. The bathroom has a double sink, bath, and separate walk-in shower. The living is the creative space of the house. Relaxing, working, and cooking are combined into this uniquely spacious, and warm dream living room. The kitchen is equipped with every conceivable necessity. Behind the kitchen, at the entrance to the roof garden is the pantry. Here you will find the large double fridge with a freezer, laundry space, and storage.  In this fantastic loft apartment, the old industrial elements have been preserved and with a mix of natural materials, a perfect balance has been created between space, design, and functionality. The interior is hand-picked by the owner, an interior stylist.  Details about the property:  •	Double glazed windows throughout •	Floor heating •	Energy label A •	Fireplace •	Roof garden •	Pantry  Area This loft apartment is centrally located on the East side of the city center, the Czaar Peterbuurt. Here you will find a nice variation of delicacy food shops, great restaurants, and a supermarket. A little more to the East side you will find the famous Dappermarkt and lots of other shops for daily groceries.  The Central Station can be reached in less than 10 cycling minutes and you will find public transport around the corner. A parking place can be rented for €200,- a month in the garage next to the building. Public parking with a permit is possible on the street.   For viewings please contact our agency.

Super charming and  extremely  well laid  out 3-room  apartment with spacious balcony  located  on the Quellijnstraat in a  popular  and wanted location in the Frans  Hals neighborhood in De Pijp.   The apartment is located on the section between the Frans Halsstraat and the Ferdinand Bolstraat and is part of a building that was completely renovated in 2006. The street has also been renovated and laid out. At the end of May, the new parking garage Albert Cuyp, under the Boerenwering, was opened at the end of the Quellijnstraat!   The location is great! The Marie Heinekenplein is just around the corner, as is the Ferdinand Bolstraat and the Albert Cuyp market. A large number of trendy cafés and restaurants can be found all over De Pijp.   The accessibility is good. By car you are within about 10 minutes on the highway A10 and parking is possible in the street or in the parking garage at the end of the street.  Around the corner is the departure point for tram 16 and 24, which brings you to other parts of the city, including the city center, in no time! The stop for the North-South line to central station and Zuidas is a very short walk away.   Layout  Common entrance which gives access to the well-kept staircase. The staircase leads you to the entrance on the third floor.   Third floor:  Entrance with access to the hall. The hall gives access to all rooms. The bright living / dining room with open kitchen is at the front. The kitchen has a fridge / freezer combination, a dishwasher, a 5 burner gas stove, an oven and sufficient storage space.   Both bedrooms are at the rear and are large enough for a double bed. The spacious balcony (approximately 9.5 m2) at the rear is accessible through both bedrooms.   The bathroom is centrally located in the house and has a bidet, a bath, a double sink, a towel radiator and a walk-in shower. The toilet is separate from the bathroom and has a small tap.   There is a separate room for the washing machine and the dryer. In the same room is also the central heating boiler and even a wardrobe can be placed.   During the renovation in 2006, among other things, the facade was cleaned, new wooden frames with double glazing were installed and the building was provided with a new foundation.

Well laid out  double  ground floor  apartment of  approx. 115 m² in  a  former shop with high ceilings.  Located  on the ground floor and first  floor  overlooking the water. This area is characterized by the presence of trendy shops, trendy coffee shops, cozy cafes and restaurants. The lovely Vondelpark is a stone's throw away for both sport and relaxation. The center offers an abundance of cultural locations, the De La Mar theater, music temple Paradiso and the Stadsschouwburg are located around the corner. The house is very conveniently located with regard to public transport in various directions and the Ring A10.  LAYOUT The hall gives direct access to the living room with beautiful large windows at the front and high ceilings. The dining area is located with an open kitchen, which is equipped with built-in appliances, via a small elevation (with storage space underneath). The patio doors give access to the city garden. The first floor is accessible from the living room through a hallway with a separate guest toilet. The spacious bedroom at the front is located over the entire width of the house and has a beautiful view over the quay.
