Een buitenkans om  te  wonen aan  het Jan  van Zutphenplantsoen! Het betreft  een  luxe vierkamer appartement (ca. 138  m2)  met een eigen parkeerplaats in de  ondergelegen  garage en een berging.  Het moderne appartement is gelegen op de achtste verdieping van het nieuwbouwcomplex “Aquamarijn”.  Aquamarijn, gelegen aan het water, maakt onderdeel uit van een viertal torens aan de Jan van Zutphenstraat en is winnaar van de Amsterdamse Architectuur prijs 2010 (de Gouden A.A.P.). Het appartement kenmerkt zich door een hoogwaardige bouwkwaliteit en afwerkingsniveau met oog voor detail en comfort. Architectuur, rust en wooncomfort staan op uitzonderlijk hoog niveau.  De omgeving, aan de rand van Osdorp en Nieuw Sloten, heeft vele groenvoorzieningen en speelmogelijkheden, die ervoor zorgen dat het een populaire woonbestemming is voor jong en oud. Alle benodigde voorzieningen, zoals winkels, scholen, openbaar vervoer e.d. zijn in de buurt aanwezig. Voor uw boodschappen kunt u terecht bij Albert Heijn of het winkelcentrum De Dukaat. Hier treft u vele winkels aan waaronder een Jumbo supermarkt met slijterij, bakker, slager, fietsenwinkel, kinderdagverblijf en een gezondheidscentrum met apotheek.  Op loopafstand treft u de tramhalte voor lijn 1 aan, welke u in ca. 20 minuten naar hartje Centrum brengt. Recreëren kunt u aan de rand van de Nieuwe Meer, het Amsterdamse Bos en de Sloterplas. Via de vlakbij gelegen uitvalswegen, A9, A4 en ringweg A10 zijn luchthaven Schiphol, maar ook Haarlem, Hoofddorp, Den Haag en Rotterdam eenvoudig en snel te bereiken.  De globale indeling is als volgt:  Besloten entree; met video-intercomsysteem, een trap en lift (2 stuks) naar de achtste verdieping. Entree; een lange hal met toegang tot de vertrekken. Vanuit de hal heeft u toegang tot de woonkamer/keuken, 3 slaapkamers, badkamer en toiletten. Ook is er een interne berging aanwezig en een aparte ruimte voor de wasmachine.  De open keuken, die aan de rechterzijde van de ruimte is gesitueerd, is voorzien van diverse inbouwapparatuur met onder andere een inductie kookplaat, afzuigkap, combi-oven, vaatwasser en een koel-/vriescombinatie. Opvallend is het granieten werkblad en de aanwezigheid van veel kastruimte. Het geheel zorgt voor een moderne en chique uitstraling.  De lichte en royale woonkamer is, net als de open keuken, afgewerkt met een nette pvc-vloer met vloerverwarming. Vanuit de woonkamer kunt u genieten van een volledig vrij uitzicht. Naast de woonkamer bevinden zich de drie slaapkamers, de badkamer en een apart toilet. De badkamer is ruim, keurig tot aan het plafond betegeld en voorzien van een inloop douche en een wastafel.  In de ondergrondse beveiligde garage bevindt zich een eigen parkeerplaats en berging. Op de begane grond vindt u een nette fietsenstalling.  Kortom; een prachtig en licht appartement dat een bezichtiging meer dan waard is!  Bijzonderheden:  - Per direct beschikbaar - Woonoppervlakte: ca. 138 m2 - 3 slaapkamers - Stadsverwarming - Vloerverwarming in alle vertrekken - Mechanische ventilatie - Eigen parkeerplaats - Servicekosten € 75,- per maand  De kandidaten worden voorgedragen bij verhuurder, verhuurder behoudt zich het recht van gunnen. Netto inkomenseis is 3x de huur netto per maand op 1 of 2 inkomens. Het appartement wordt niet verhuurd aan studenten en of vrienden.

AVAILABLE BY THE  1ST  OF MAY;  THREE BEDROOM  APARTMENT WITH TERRACE ON  THE  SOUTH  At a beautiful  location  on the Zuidas, we offer this  beautiful apartment from 01 May  2023. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a spacious living room, a modern bathroom and a south-facing terrace. This apartment is located on the 5th floor in the IRA complex on the George Gershwinlaan.  The apartment is part of the Gershwin Brothers. The complex has 75 homes with different housing types. The residential tower is fully equipped. From the stylish communal entrance you can reach the 2 lifts to all 6 floors. All apartments have their own storage room. There is also a possibility to rent a parking space in the underground parking garage of the building. In addition, there is a shared bicycle shed where you can park your bicycle or scooter.  The apartment has an area of approximately 94 m2. From the hall at the entrance of the apartment on the right side is the modern bathroom with walk-in shower, bath, double sink and towel radiator. The three bedrooms are located on the right side of the apartment and have an area of approximately 11m2, 10m2 and 8m2. The living room with open corner kitchen has an area of approximately 36 m2 and is equipped with all necessary appliances. Such as a cooking plate with extractor hood, combi oven, dishwasher and fridge / freezer combination. In addition, the living room has a spacious terrace (S) of approximately 25 m2 with a view of the Boelegracht.  The apartment complex is located in the middle of the Zuidas. Also known as the international  business center of Amsterdam. In addition to working, it is also a wonderful place to live. The Zuidas is centrally located in relation to shops, restaurants, supermarkets, entertainment venues, schools and sports centers. The Beatrixpark or Amsterdamse Bos can also be reached within walking distance. From the apartment you can walk to Amsterdam Zuid station for the train, metro and bus in a few minutes. By car you can easily reach the Ring A10 to cities such as Utrecht and The Hague.  Rental conditions: - Available from 01 May 2023 - Deposit of one month's rent if employed and three months if self-employed - Guarantor NOT allowed - NOT possible for students to rent - Minimum rental period of 12 calendar months  The rental price is exclusive of service costs of €75.00 per month. The rent is also exclusive of water and energy costs.  * The images are of a comparable house in the same complex with the same standard

APARTMENT H–F LUXE  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, large storage  room  for storage / technology with  connection  for the washer / dryer, separate toilet and  modern bathroom  with walk-in shower and sink. On the south side two bedrooms, one with access to the first south-facing balcony. On the southeast side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the second balcony on the southeast. All apartments of this type have a PVC floor, wall finishes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments  At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-coloured composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey colour. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury flats. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive flats range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an ensuite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handleless cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (ensuite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the estate agents.  "This information has been compiled with the necessary care. However, we accept no liability for any incompleteness, inaccuracy or otherwise, or the consequences thereof. All dimensions and surface areas are indicative. The NVM conditions apply."

**ENGLISH BELOW**  PER  DIRECT BESCHIKBAAR!   Schrijf  je nu in voor  de  beschikbare appartementen, zie de woningzoeker  op  account.southdock.nl/aanbod voor alle beschikbare woningen. Start  nu  jouw huuraanvraag op de  projectwebsite SOUTHDOCK.NL. De eerste mensen zijn hun prachtige appartement al ingetrokken!  NDSM South Dock biedt ruimte aan meer dan tweehonderd appartementen. Van tweekamerappartementen van circa 62 m2 tot vijfkamerappartementen van circa 129 m2. De grote raampartijen halen het daglicht naar binnen, de buitenruimtes – een terras of balkon – geven een gevoel van ruimte. De appartementen zijn slim ingedeeld, waardoor de beschikbare ruimte optimaal wordt benut. De afwerking is luxe en met veel aandacht uitgevoerd. De badkamer en keuken zijn van alle gemakken voorzien.  NDSM South Dock ligt direct aan het water en bestaat uit meerdere gebouwen. De 18 verdiepingen hoge toren en de grote raampartijen geven NDSM South Dock een unieke uitstraling. Grootstedelijk en open, robuust en toegankelijk. De begane grond van de toren is gereserveerd voor commerciële activiteiten: kantoren, winkels en horeca. Daarboven komen appartementen. NDSM South Dock staat ook voor gemak. Zo is er een ondergrondse parkeergarage en dankzij de bringme service in de lobby mis je nooit meer een pakketje.  De gemeenschappelijke tuin en slim uitgekiende verlichting maken het compleet. NDSM South Dock heeft de perfecte mix van levendigheid, ruimte en geborgenheid.  NDSM bruist van de energie, het is dé plek voor mensen die alles uit het leven willen halen. In de directe omgeving vind je koffie- en lunchtentjes, cafés, restaurants en alle voorzieningen voor je dagelijkse boodschappen. En de stad is nooit ver weg, met de pont ben je in tien minuten in het centrum van Amsterdam.  NDSM South Dock ligt op een top locatie in Amsterdam. Direct aan het IJ schuin tegenover pontsteiger maar dan met de zon en het water op het zuiden. The ground floor of the tower is reserved for commercial activities: offices, shops and catering establishments. Above it will be flats. NDSM South Dock also stands for convenience. In the immediate vicinity you will find coffee and lunch bars, cafés, restaurants and all facilities for your daily shopping. And the city is never far away; the ferry takes you into the centre of Amsterdam in ten minutes.  NDSM South Dock is in a prime location in Amsterdam. APPARTEMENT H–E EXCLUSIEF  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, storage room  with  connection for the washing machine  /  dryer, large storage room for storage  / technology,  separate toilet and modern bathroom with walk-in shower and sink. Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. BEZICHTIGINGEN ZIJN INMIDDELS  GEWEEST,  NIEUWE AANMELDINGEN  WORDEN NIET  IN BEHANDELING GENOMEN.  WONEN  IN PORTERS In het moderne  complex  van Porters zijn er 25 appartementen  te vinden, verspreid over vijf  verdiepingen. Geschikt voor de young professional, het jonge gezin, of voor wie op zoek is naar een welverdiend rustpunt middenin het Amsterdamse stadsleven. Bij Porters geniet je van je eigen plekje én kun je met de bewoners samenkomen in de gemeenschappelijke ruimten.  Porters is een duurzaam en gasloos woongebouw; alle woningen zijn aangesloten op energiezuinige stadsverwarming en zeer goed geïsoleerd. Op het dak van Porters liggen zonnepanelen ten behoeve van de algemene voorzieningen en daarnaast zijn de woningen op de bovenste verdieping aangesloten op meerdere zonnepanelen waardoor deze woningen elektraneutraal zijn.  ZORGELOOS TE BETREKKEN Ben je op zoek naar het gemak van een instapklaar appartement, dan zit je bij Porters goed. Alle appartementen worden opgeleverd met keuken en modern sanitair. Wanden en plafonds zijn strak gestuct en de PVC-vloer wordt voorzien van vloerverwarming, zodat het altijd comfortabel is in huis! Daarnaast worden de appartementen opgeleverd inclusief raambekleding en verlichting, zodat je enkel nog je meubels hoeft aan te schaffen. De extra verdiepingshoogte in de appartementen is ook mooi meegenomen. Met een plafondhoogte van 2,75m tot 3,3m voelen de appartementen extra open en ruimtelijk aan.  VOOR IEDEREEN EEN PASSENDE WONING Alle appartementen zijn voorzien van een open, doorlopende leefruimte met grote raampartijen die de woning voorzien van prachtig daglicht. Naast de nodige voorzieningen bieden de appartementen voldoende ruimte voor een ongestoorde thuiswerkplek. Tenslotte kun je nog kiezen voor een appartement met eigen balkon (10m²). Geen balkon? De gemeenschappelijke tuin beneden kan ook dienen als jouw buitenruimte! De penthouses op de bovenverdieping zijn voorzien van één of twee slaapkamers. Hier zorgen de raampartijen voor een prachtig, bijna panoramisch uitzicht over de stad. Twee penthouses zijn voorzien van een woningbreed dakterras. Haal een koel drankje uit de keuken, voel het warme zonnetje en kijk uit over bruisend Amsterdam. Het genieten kan beginnen!  PARKEREN In de naastgelegen parkeergarage zijn een aantal parkeerplaatsen beschikbaar om te huren. Deze garage is overdekt en wanneer je hier huurt krijg je een vaste plek toegewezen. De parkeerplaatsen zijn voorzien van een laadpaal.  GEMEENSCHAPPELIJKE RUIMTE Uniek aan Porters is de aanwezigheid van gemeenschappelijke ruimten. Zo is er een gemeenschappelijke woonkamer op de begane grond te vinden, waar je kunt werken vanaf jouw thuislocatie of om gewoon gezellig samen te komen. Liever even naar buiten? Pak een boek en neem plaats in het warme zonnetje van de gemeenschappelijke tuin.  OPLEVERING De huidige progonose is een oplevering per 1 april 2023  INKOMENSVOORWAARDEN Het bruto maandinkomen moet minimaal vier keer de maandhuur bedragen. Hierbij mogen eventuele vakantietoeslagen, 13e maand en bonussen worden meegerekend. Het 2e inkomen mag hierbij meegeteld worden voor 100%.

Elegant living in  a  completely high-end  renovated apartment  right in the center  of  Amsterdam.  Special living in  one  of the luxury apartments of the  crown project "The Artesia" at  Reguliersdwarsstraat 98, 100 and 106. This three-room apartment is located on the ground floor and has two bathrooms and a terrace facing south. The high level of finishing and the choice of materials contribute to a stylish living experience. The rear of the apartment and the terrace overlook a triple garden designed by the internationally renowned landscape architect Piet Oudolf. The view of this sheltered courtyard garden is breathtaking.  A tour  The first floor Upon entering through the living room with modern open kitchen at the front immediately appeals to the imagination. The custom kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances and the room gives a spacious and open feeling. At the rear are the two spacious bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes and bathrooms together with a bath, two showers and sinks. The entire apartment has underfloor heating and a lighting plan is available. Light materials and colors have been used, which gives a feeling of elegance and luxury.  The project The Artesia consists of a triptych of 17th-century buildings, located at Herengracht 539 – 543 and the associated buildings on Reguliersdwarsstraat behind it. This concerns house numbers 98, 100 to 104 and 106, including the original coach house.  The houses will be connected to a thermal storage system with 17 groundwater wells of approximately three hundred meters deep. The sources provide heating or cooling by means of the installed heat pumps. The buildings and apartments are also structurally insulated by means of retaining walls, insulated floors and roofs. In this way, a gas-free complex with energy label A++(+) is realized. The project design was done by Hofman Dujardin who focus on a high-end look and feel.  The environment and accessibility The Reguliersdwarsstraat is characterized by its village-like character in the center of Amsterdam. The area offers a wide range of shops, restaurants, terraces, coffee cafes and cultural hotspots such as the Rijksmuseum, De Hermitage, Royal Theater Carré, Hortus Botanicus and Artis. The house is easily accessible by the various tram and bus stops and the metro station of the North / South line on the Rokin. Charmant appartement van  50  m² gelegen  op de  beulingstraat tussen de Herengracht  en  de Singel! Het appartement is  gelegen  op de vierde verdieping en beschikt over één  slaapkamer, woonkamer  met open-keuken, badkamer en zonnig frans balkon.   BIJZONDERHEDEN:  - Huurperiode voor bepaalde tijd, met een maximum van 24 maanden - Huurprijs € 1.750,- per maand excl. gas, water, elektra, internet/tv en gemeentelijke heffingen; - Gestoffeerd; - Waarborgsom gelijk aan 2 maanden huur;  - Per direct beschikbaar;   INDELING: Fraaie entree in het gemeenschappelijke en keurig onderhouden ruime trappenhuis. Trap naar de 4e verdieping. Entree in de hal met intercom. Aan de voorzijde de woonkamer met openslaande deuren naar een frans balkon, vanwaar prachtig uitzicht op de mooie omliggende panden en de grachten. In de ochtend tot in de middag schijnt hier de zon naar binnen. In de middag vallen de zonnestralen op de keuken, welke voorzien is van een houten werkblad, elektrische oven, koelkast, 5-pits gasfornuis met afzuigkap en wasmachine. Tegenover de keuken ligt een ruimte welke ideaal is om te gebruiken als werkplek of eethoek. Boven de woonkamer een gezellige entresol, geschikt als logeerplek of eventueel extra bergruimte. Via de hal is de slaapkamer te bereiken, aan de rustige achterzijde van het gebouw. De slaapkamer heeft een balkenplafond en een hoge nok, waardoor er veel bergruimte is. Tegenover de slaapkamer ligt de moderne badkamer, voorzien van een ligbad met douche, wastafel meubel en spiegelkast, handdoekradiator en toilet. Het gehele appartement is voorzien van een mooie eikenhouten lamelparketvloer.  OMGEVING: Het appartement ligt aan de Beulingstraat, in de binnenstad van Amsterdam, tussen de Herengracht en het Singel. Het betreft een rustige en autoluwe staat, gelegen naast de 9 Straatjes, midden in het oude centrum en dichtbij de Jordaan en Oud-West. In de directe omgeving is een divers aanbod van winkels en gezellige eet- en drinkgelegenheden. Hiervoor hoef je nooit ver te lopen of te fietsen. Voor ontspanning sta je binnen 10 minuten fietsen midden in het Vondelpark. Kortom, hier woon je op een rustig plekje en toch midden in de stad.  BEREIKBAARHEID: Het appartement ligt dichtbij het Koningsplein, waar diverse tramlijnen een halte hebben. Het Centraal Station ligt op slechts 5 minuten fietsafstand, net als metrostation Waterlooplein. Met de auto is er via de afritten S105 en S106 ontsluiting naar de Ring A10. Er is momenteel geen wachtlijst voor een parkeervergunning (vergunningsgebied Centrum 2).  ‘’Deze informatie is door ons met de nodige zorgvuldigheid samengesteld. Onzerzijds wordt echter geen enkele aansprakelijkheid aanvaard voor enige onvolledigheid, onjuistheid of anderszins, dan wel de gevolgen daarvan. Alle opgegeven maten en oppervlakten zijn indicatief. This recently renovated  apartment  is located  behind the  thick walls of a  former  warehouse called "De Pool" and  has  been built in 1688 and can  be  related  to the trading  activities of the Dutch during the Golden age in the Baltic. It is a national monument overlooking a large and quiet communal garden at the back of the house.  This area is one of the most beautiful and relaxed areas of Amsterdam, near "het Amstelveldje", de Reguliersgracht, Prinsengracht and the Utrechtsestraat with its nice shops, restaurants and cafes.  The apartment is part of larger complex, with a shared entrance and a modern video system. It is situated at the raised ground floor. When you enter the living room via the shared hallway you will notice the large glass and steal doors wich give the apartment a spacious and light feeling of a modern penthouse, combined with the authentic characterisitics of an old ware house, like the old wooden beams and thick wall with round curved windows.  ?  The living room has an open kitchen with a kitchen island which also serves as a bar. The nice black wooden kitchen is brand new and comes with all necessary built-in appliances.  ?  The bathroom has a large handmade, concrete double washbasin and a a built-in rainshower. In the hall way there is a seperate toilet.  ?  The apartment has two bedrooms. The master bedroom comes with a double bed and a built-in wardrobe. The second bedroom has a sofa bed and built-in storage space and can be used as guestroom, room for the children or a study.  ?  There is a common facility in the building for bicycles, and separately, a general area with washing machines and dryers.

About the project  At  the Weesperkarspel  you will  find the modern, stylish  apartment  complex De Kameleon. This complex  was  built in 2012 and contains two,  three  and four room flats,  with a living area varying from 54m² to 137m². This beautiful building unerringly manages to combine luxury with pleasure. The flats are luxuriously equipped with a spacious kitchen, spacious bathroom and a large balcony (a lot of privacy thanks to the layout) with views over the surroundings. At the Kameleon, characteristic architecture and luxurious equipment join forces with the vibrant surroundings of Amsterdam Zuidoost.    For all residents De Kameleon offers a roof garden of no less than 5000m², including running water and tall trees. A lovely place where you can enjoy the fresh outdoor air and the view of the surroundings. Ideal in the warm spring and summer months.  Near the building you will find a parking garage. Residents have their own floor for parking, which visitors to the shopping centre cannot enter.    All facilities are within easy reach from the complex. For daily shopping you can go to the underlying shopping centre, complete with several supermarkets, forty specialty shops, fitness facilities and restaurants. Sports enthusiasts can reach the Bijlmerpark in just a few minutes. Ideal for a jog, a piece of cycling or a nice walk. The Gaasperplas is also within easy reach, where you can swim, row, dive or have a lovely picnic.    Amsterdam Zuidoost is a cultural spectacle anyway. The area is really full of cinemas, theatres and concert halls for a well-deserved night out. Southeast is also known for its huge selection of restaurants with various cuisines - a hidden gem awaits you in every corner of every street.    With a location in the heart of the Bijlmer, the Chameleon is easy to reach by both car and public transport. The Kameleon has a very good location in relation to the A1, A2, A9 and A10 motorways. For a direct connection to the characteristic Amsterdam city centre (reachable in 15 minutes) or the luxurious Zuidas you can use the numerous bus connections or get off at the nearby metro station Kraaiennest. Schiphol can be reached in just 30 minutes.  Choice of two-room, three-room and four-room flats  Roof garden with an area of 5000m²  Underneath shopping centre for daily shopping  Several recreational areas within walking distance  Easy connection by car and to the public transport network  Parking garage with own floor for residents  Close to Schiphol  About this type of property This house is ideal for starters and young professionals looking for a spacious apartment in Amsterdam Zuidoost. So you walk from the hall through to the spacious living and dining area. Large windows in combination with the door to the balcony provide a light-filled living area. Besides the luxury open kitchen you will also find access to a large, separate storage room with connections for the washer and dryer. Always convenient! This storage room is so spacious that it could also be used as a home office. A unique plus are the multiple closets in the hallway which, in addition to the storage, provide a lot of storage space.   The balcony covers the entire width of the house and is accessible from the living area through two doors. So with a few steps you are already on your spacious, sunny balcony where you can relax and enjoy the view of the surroundings.   - Continuous living and dining area with open kitchen - French doors to a spacious balcony - Spacious bedroom overlooking balcony - Toilet in separate room - Lots of closet space and a separate storage room  More media of the property are available on our website. No rights can be derived from the offer text and displayed media.

HERENGRACHT 259-3, AMSTERDAM   Completely renovated  (2019) and  beautifully furnished trendy apartment  in  a 17th century canal house  providing  a front-row seat to enjoy the  Amsterdam canal  scene with its bicyclists, horse-drawn carriages and picturesque houses. Approximately 70 m2.  Description: Through the monumental entrance hall you will reach the fully furnished apartment on the third floor. The spacious living room with air conditioning and black marble fireplace has 3 windows overlooking the Herengracht and a side window allowing lots of daylight. The fully equipped luxurious kitchen even contains a climate cabinet for wine. The bedroom, with built-in wardrobe and additional storage space, and the bathroom with walk-in shower, double vanity unit and floor heating are situated at the quiet backside of the house. The laundry room with washer dryer combination and the toilet with wash basin are located in the hall. The entire apartment has parquet flooring.  Location: This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam’s city center on the Herengracht, the oldest and grandest of the three major canals of Amsterdam and part of the UNESCO World Heritage. Situated in the middle of the well known 9-Streets shopping area with its quaint boutiques and cozy restaurants. The Rijksmuseum, Anne Frank House, Dam Square and The Jordaan with its cafes and art galleries are within walking distance.  Close to public transportation (Tram/Metro/Bus).  Features: - Rental price: €2.500,- (including internet), excl. utilities - Deposit: €5.000,- - 70m2 - Fully furnished, air conditioning - Renovated in 2019 - Luxury kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, pyrolytic oven, induction hob and wine climate cabinet - Canal view - Centre of Amsterdam  HERENGRACHT 259-3, AMSTERDAM  Trendy, licht en prachtig gerenoveerd (2019) appartement gelegen aan de Herengracht waar het moderne leven zich afspeelt tegen het decor van de fraaie 17e eeuwse grachtenpanden die zich weerspiegelen in het water.  Kortom een pareltje in het centrum van Amsterdam.  Beschrijving: Via de monumentale entreehal bereikt men dit volledig gemeubileerde appartement op de derde verdieping. De ruime living met zwart marmeren schouw en airconditioning is zeer licht vanwege de 3 ramen die zich over de gehele breedte van de voorgevel uitstrekken en een schitterend uitzicht bieden op de Herengracht. De luxueuze keuken is voorzien van alle moderne inbouwapparatuur en heeft zelfs een wijnklimaatkast. De slaapkamer met ingebouwde kasten en extra opbergruimte is evenals de badkamer met inloopdouche, dubbele wastafel en vloerverwarming gelegen in het rustige achterhuis. In de hal treft men naast de separate wc een aparte ruimte voor de was-en droogcombinatie aan. Het gehele appartement is voorzien van een prachtige parketvloer.   Locatie: Toplocatie in hartje Amsterdam te midden van de ‘negen straatjes’ met hun gezellige boetiekjes en restaurants, in de nabijheid van openbaar vervoer (tram, bus en metro) en in 10 min bereikbaar vanaf de A10. Om de hoek vindt men de Dam en het Koninklijk Paleis, de Bijenkorf en overdekt shopping center Magna Plaza. Op loopafstand van Rijksmuseum, Anne Frank Huis en de gezellige Jordaan.  Kenmerken: - Huurprijs: €2.500,- (inclusief internet),excl. gas, water, licht - Borg: €5.000,- - 70m2 - Volledig gemeubileerd en gestoffeerd - Gerenoveerd in 2019, air conditioning - Luxueuze keuken met vaatwasser, magnetron, pyrolyse oven, inductiekookplaat en wijnklimaatkast - Grachtengordel met uitzicht op de Herengracht - Centrum van Amsterdam

APARTMENT H–G’ LUXE  Entry  into the  entrance with  meter cupboards, storage room  with  connection for the washing machine  /  dryer, large storage room for storage  /  technology,  separate toilet  and modern bathroom with walk-in shower and sink. Two bedrooms on the north side. On the northwest side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the west-facing balcony. All apartments of this type have a PVC floor, wall finishes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. The cozy and  fully  furnished apartment  has two  spacious bedrooms and a  large  living room over the entire  length  of the apartment. This apartment is  located  in  a special  canal house with a view over the Kromme Waal, the beautiful Amrath hotel and the Oosterdok. The Nieuwmarkt with its cafes, restaurants, organic market and supermarket, not to mention Chinatown with its many dining options are also only a five minute walk away. The Central station and large parking garage are within walking distance and you can leave the city within a few minutes via the Prins Hendrikkade.  Through the large windows you have a beautiful view of the canal. Via a small elevation you enter the intermediate space that currently serves as a living and / or television room. In the rear part of this floor is the dining room with large modern open kitchen, equipped with all modern conveniences.  The living room is very bright and has ceilings of more than 4 meters while retaining the original details. A small hall from the living room gives access to a guest toilet and a wardrobe. In the rear part of this room is the original marble fireplace, cupboards and a luxury kitchen with all expected built-in appliances (Smeg) and is fully equipped.  A windowed hallway leads to an annex where, on two floors, two bedrooms are presented, both with en-suite shower, sink and toilet. The bedroom on the ground floor also has a storage room containing the washing machine and dryer.  The general feeling of luxury in this apartment is enhanced by the wide floorboards found throughout the apartment; the use of marble tiles in the bathroom and the luxurious Italian kitchen with a natural stone worktop. The kitchen is equipped with a gas hob, extractor hood, fridge-freezer combination, microwave, convection oven and dishwasher. The spacious living room of 40m2 and open kitchen, together with the high ceilings and combination of 'old & new', give this house a special atmosphere.  Energy label unknown due to being a monument, heating costs are not out of control because it is a sourounded apartment and the neigbours on all sides create a layer of insulation and warm up the apartment for you. Owner is now paying around 250,- euro per month.  This house is immediately available for rent in consultation.  Price per month incl service costs 3000,- Available for 24 months for a certain period of time.

High-end renovated and  beautifully  furnished studio  in a  national monument on one  of  the most beloved parts of  the  Keizersgracht in the heart of Amsterdam.  A "turn-key", stylish studio that  is rare to find. Ideal for companies and the self-employed who want to have an office space in Amsterdam.  The building is equipped with an elevator which is accessible via the common entrance.  The studio is located at the front of the first floor and has canal view. The space has a pantry, separate toilet and bathroom.  For the beautiful finishing natural materials have been chosen: an oak herringbone floor, fitted wardrobes with wooden panel doors and sand-colored marble in the toilet and bathroom.  The rent is excluding gas, water, electricity and internet. It is optional to rent the studio furnished for an additional €500,- p.m.  Surroundings Located on Keizersgracht, in the center of Amsterdam, between Vijzelgracht and Reguliergracht. There are lots of nice shops, restaurants and cafes in the near vicinity. Public transport is within walking distance and the various roads are easily accessible within a few minutes.  Particularities - Studio with office function - Ideal for companies and self-employed people who are looking for an office in Amsterdam - Elevator present - Located in National Monument - Furnished (optionally also for rent unfurnished) - 54 m2 LFA - As a natural person it is not possible to register at this address

*See English version  below*   Per  direct beschikbaar:  een ruim driekamerappartement in  Amsterdam  Nieuw-West!  Heerlijk wonen met  de  stad, maar ook veel groen om  je  heen.  Zo ligt het  Rembrandtpark op 10 minuten loopafstand, maar ben je ook binnen no time in het centrum van Amsterdam. En je dagelijkse boodschappen? Die doe je om de hoek bij Albert Heijn of de Lidl op het Delftlandplein.   De bereikbaarheid van KING is uitstekend. Station Lelylaan ligt op 5 minuten loopafstand en hier pak je de trein, de metro, de tram of de bus en zo kom je gemakkelijk op plaats van bestemming. Ook met de auto is de bereikbaarheid goed. Je rijdt namelijk binnen 3 minuten de A10 op. Parkeren is mogelijk in de ondergelegen parkeergarage. Hier vind je ook de gezamenlijke fietsenstalling.   King bestaat uit 128 twee- en driekamerappartementen van ca. 64 m² en ca. 80 m².   De appartementen beschikken over een complete keuken met een inductiekookplaat, afzuigkap, combi-oven, vaatwasser en een koelkast met vriesvak. Ook beschikt ieder appartement over een afgewerkte, fijne badkamer met een dubbele wastafel en een ruime inloopdouche.  Kenmerken  - huurprijs: € 1945,-  - servicekosten € 65,- per maand - Energielabel A+ - Driekamerappartement van ca. 80 m² op de 3e verdieping - Woonkamer en 2 slaapkamers; - Plafond hoogte van 2,60;  - Balkon op het oosten - Signia Keuken (Siematic); - Inductiekookplaat, koel/vriescombinatie, combi magnetron/oven; - Luxe badkamer met inloopdouche en bad; - Een veilige fietsen berging; - Parkeergarage (afzonderlijk te huur / niet verplicht). Voor eventuele mogelijkheden voor een parkeervergunning dient men zelf bij de gemeente navraag te doen;  Om in aanmerking te komen voor dit appartement, kun je de volgende inkomenseis aanhouden: - Minimale inkomenseis ca. 3,5 keer als alleen verdiener en 3,5 keer bij tweeverdieners tellen wij het tweede inkomen voor 50% mee;  • Woning is niet bedoeld voor woningdelers (vrienden/collega's); • Standaard 1 maand waarborgsom. In bepaalde gevallen wordt deze verhoogd (vraag naar de voorwaarden); • Het gebouw beschikt niet over parkeerplaatsen. Betaald parkeren kan via een aparte stallingsovereenkomst in de nabij gelegen Flow parkeergarage (vraag naar de voorwaarden). Vergunning via de Gemeente is niet mogelijk (zover nu bekend is).  Wil je hier wonen en de woning bezichtigen? En voldoe je aan de inkomenseis? Reageer dan via de interesse button in deze advertentie! Let op: de foto's zijn van een voormalige (vergelijkbare) modelwoning. en zijn niet gemeubileerd ---  Available starting March 1st 2023! A spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Amsterdam Nieuw-West!  Living in the city, surounded by a lot of green. The Rembrandtpark, for example, is a 10-minute walk away, but you can also be in the center of Amsterdam in no time. And your daily shopping? You can do this around the corner at Albert Heijn or Lidl on Delftlandplein.  The accessibility is excellent. Lelylaan station is a 5-minute walk away and here you can catch the train, the metro, the tram or the bus and you can easily reach your destination. The accessibility is also good with the car. You are driving on the A10 within 3 minutes. Parking is possible in the parking garage below. Here you will also find the joint bicycle shed.  King consists of 128 one and two bedroom apartments of approx. 64 m² and approx. 80 m².   The apartments have a complete kitchen with an induction hob, extractor hood, combi oven, dishwasher and a fridge with freezer compartment. Each apartment also has a finished, nice bathroom with a double sink and a spacious walk-in shower.  - rental price: € 1.945,- a month - servicecosts : € 65,- a month - energy label A+ - Two bedroom apartment  - Spacious balcony - Signia kitchen (Siematic); - Luxurious bathroom with walk-in shower and bath; - A safe bicycle shed; - Parking garage (to rent separately / not required). For any possibilities for a parking permit, you must check with the municipality yourself;  To qualify for one of the apartments, your gross monthlty income has to be, at least, 3,5x the rent. A second income can be counted for 50%.  • Home is not intended for home sharers (friends / colleagues); • Standard 1 month deposit. In certain cases this is increased (ask for the conditions); • The building does not have parking spaces. Paid parking is possible through a separate parking agreement in the nearby Flow parking garage (ask for the conditions). Permission via the municipality is not possible (as far as is known).  Do you want to live here and view the property? And do you meet the income requirement? Respond via the interest button in this advertisement! Absolutely spectacular, unique  and  CUSTOMISED FURNISHED  by interior-designer  Ron van Leent, Possibility  for  a parking spot. Available for  6-12  months. 3-room apartment of approximately 114m²  on  the  18th floor. A  famous international designer specialized in interior architecture (branded and customized furniture only). It has a breath-taking view over the city in the super luxury New Amsterdam residential tower. The apartment is located in the modern and one of the most expensive areas of Amsterdam.  This urban apartment near the World Trade Center has 2 bedrooms, 2 luxurious bathrooms, working room (loggia), modern kitchen, swimming pool, GYM, sauna, private parking place in the underground garage and 24 hours security. It is definitely worth a visit.  GENERAL Representative lobby with security desk with 24/7 secure entrance, building manager and two fast elevators. The lift takes you to the 18th floor to the private hall, corridor built-in wardrobe, specious storeroom and laundryroom inclusive washing machine and a separate guest toilet.  All systems in the apartment are regulated by the touch screen and domotic system (lightening, sun protection, heating and cooling floor, etc.) Thanks to Touch Screen system, you can have your shopping delivered in the delivery boxes downstairs for instance, also when you are not at home. Your provisions will be waiting for you to be prepared, uncorked or eaten.  LIVING This corner apartment has a spacious living room with open kitchen. The panoramic view over the city is truly unique. The large (sliding) windows also provide a lot of light and there is a parquet floor with underfloor heating and floor cooling throughout the house. Recessed spotlights from the Modular brand were chosen for the lighting. You will find this throughout the house. The ceiling-high doors give the whole apartment a luxurious look.  TO COOK The open kitchen is equipped with Siemens appliances including a 4 burner induction hob, extractor hood, dishwasher, fridge with 3 drawers freezer and a combination microwave. The granite counter top with white cabinets provide a modern look. There are also custom-made cabinets with glass doors where you can store a lot of things.  TO SLEEP The two bedrooms are very spacious. The master bedroom has a copper-colored headboard panel wall that provides an attractive room. You also have access to the luxurious en suite bathroom. The bedroom on the side wall has fitted wardrobes.  TO BATHE The apartment has two beautiful bathrooms. The bathroom en suite has a walk-in shower, bath, toilet and washbasin. The second “guest” bathroom has a walk-in shower and a washbasin. There is also a separate second toilet with fountain in the hall and a large storage room with washing machine connection.  OUTSIDE/ LOGGIA Adjacent to the living room is the office pace with a view over the forest of Amsterdam and runway of Schiphol! You can use this space for multiple purposes.  ADDITIONAL The complex has a luxury Spa, swimming pool and fitness room. This has recently been renovated to a 5* Spa of hotel level.  New Amsterdam offers -Laundry service: a dry cleaner will pick it up and deliver back all fresh and clean! -Domotica: the computer in your apartment where you program the lights, navigate the camera outside to see what’s going on at the other side of the building / parking or to see who is at the door; order your laundry, hairdresser, florist, taxi, food etc. -Shopping service: Just order your groceries and have them delivered! -Service manager: A manager in the building who can arrange things for you and look after your apartment while you are not there. -Health Club: swimming pool with relaxation zone, spa with steam cabin and saunas. -Fitness: a gym equipped with the latest fitness technology. -Besides exclusiveness, security has the highest priority in New Amsterdam. The building is under camera 24 hours a day. In addition, a security makes his rounds, so that you can enjoy your well-deserved night’s rest.  LOCATION The building is located on the dynamic Zuidas and has a brilliant public transport accessibility in front of the building. A high-quality living environment, thanks to the South Station. From this station a train runs every 6 minutes to Schiphol and there is a direct metro connection to the center of Amsterdam.  South station will be enlarged and modernized in the short term, together with the installation of the dock model for the A10-south highway.  In the immediate vicinity are several restaurants (including Bolenius, Loetje), cafes and shops (opposite the building is an Albert Heijn) nearby. You can shop at Gelderlandplein and Beethovenstraat. The center is 10 minutes away by bike or by metro. Amsterdam South is surrounded by Beatrix and Amstel Park within walking distance. Also you could enjoy the outdoors in the Amsterdam Forest.  HIGHLIGHTS - Usable living area approx. 114m²; - Large (sliding) windows and stunning views; - Two spacious bedrooms; - Two bathrooms and a second toilet; - Officespace / loggia; - Full climate control, air conditioning and underfloor heating and cooling; - On the ground floor is a health club with swimming pool, gym and sauna; - There is the possibility to rent a parking space. Costs on request; - In the representative lobby of the complex there is a reception during the day and a doorman at night

On the east side two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one with access to the first balcony on the east. Also on the east side the spacious living room with the luxurious open kitchen with appliances and access to the second balcony on the east.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. Apollolaan 7, 1077  AA  Amsterdam  A spacious,  luxurious and well-maintained semi-detached  villa  (approx. 396 m²), with a  large  front and back garden, in a  wonderful  location in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid.  The property has five bedrooms and many luxury amenities, including a garage, atmospheric bar, alarm system and air conditioning. The villa has recently undergone a high-quality partial renovation.  Location & accessibility:  The Apollolaan in Oud-Zuid is the most exclusive part of Amsterdam, partly because of its spacious and luxury feel. Lined with majestic old plane trees, the leafy Apollolaan is one of the widest and most beautiful streets in Amsterdam. Although wonderfully quiet, it is still within hand’s reach of everything that the bustling city of Amsterdam has to offer. A number of highly regarded primary and secondary schools, including The British School, are nearby too. The villa is centrally located, close to the lovely Beethovenstraat with its terraces, coffee bars and (specialist) shops. The exclusive P.C. Hooftstraat and Cornelis Schuytstraat are close by as well. Anyone interested in sport and recreation will enjoy the close vicinity of the Vondelpark, Amstelpark and Beatrixpark, while art and culture lovers willa find that they are well-catered for at the Van Gogh Museum, the Stedelijk Museum, the Koninklijke Concertgebouw and/or the Rijksmuseum. The villa is within very easy reach of Station Zuid/WTC, where there are bus, tram, metro and train links to a wide range of destinations - including a direct link to Schiphol. Parking is never a problem, as the villa has its own garage, with an automatic door. Alternatively, you can park on the drive, which has space for a number of cars. Accessibility is excellent: various arterial roads provide you with quick access to the A10.  Layout:  Ground floor: The entrance door opens into a large hall, which has a coat closet and a separate toilet with a washbasin. Double, glazed doors lead into the dual-aspect living room, which is 14 metres long and has dividing doors. Panel doors with built-in cupboards provide access to the sitting room, which is located at the front of this floor and still has its original fireplace. The imposing windows in this room look out over the Apollolaan. At the back of this floor, French doors in the dining room open out into the sunny back garden, which has a raised patio and a wooden garden house. The villa’s luxury open-plan kitchen is adjacent to the dining room and comes complete with a cooking island with a wide range of built-in appliances. These include a Bora induction hob with an integrated extractor hood, a Quooker and a wine climate cabinet. There is space for barstools at the cooking island too. The villa’s former utility room is now an integrated part of the kitchen, has plenty of storage space and has been fitted with a number of Siemens Studioline appliances, including a Siemens refrigerator, freezer and dishwasher. At the back of this floor, there is another room with a gas fire. It features a bespoke, built-in desk, making it the ideal space for a home office or study. French doors in this room give access to the patio. An impressive staircase in the hallway leads to the first floor.  First floor: The hall here gives access to all the rooms on this floor, which include a separate toilet with a washbasin. The master bedroom is located at the back of this floor and benefits from a number of built-in cupboards and an en-suite bathroom. The luxury bathroom features marble with black details and has a bath, walk-in rain shower, toilet and double vanity unit. There are another two good-sized bedrooms at the front of this floor, both of which look out over the Apollolaan. There is also a centrally-located bathroom on this floor. It has a double washbasin, toilet, walk-in shower and radiator.  Second floor: The hall here gives access to all the rooms on this floor: two bedrooms, a bathroom and closed-off storage space. The bedroom at the back comes complete with a built-in cupboard, while the large bedroom at the front has a big built-in cupboard and plenty of storage space. The bathroom has a bath, double vanity unit, shower and radiator and has been finished with pink marble.  Basement: The long hallway in the basement gives access to all the rooms on this floor. A big systems room houses the villa’s central heating boiler, water heater, alarm systems, ventilation/cooling system, water pump. Connections for a washing machine and dryer are located here too. At the front of this floor, there is a big room with French doors; it would suit a number of uses. Next to this, there is another room where you will find the meter cupboard too. An atmospheric, well-equipped bar is one of the many luxury amenities the villa has to offer. Opposite the bar, there is a big room that would suit a number of uses. For example, a fitness room or a cinema.  Apollolaan: Apollo was one of the 12 major gods of Greek mythology: he was the god of the sun, music and poetry and a patron of the muses. Source: stadsatlas Amsterdam.  Details: - A luxury villa in a stunning location (approx. 396 m²) - A large front and back garden - Five bedrooms - Three bathrooms - A bar and hobby space in the basement - Partial renovation by PM Projecten completed recently - Luxury open-plan kitchen with modern appliances - A carport with an automatic door - Video security and alarm system - Ventilation and cooling system - Air conditioning - Herringbone parquet floor - Recessed spotlights - Radiator conversion - Central heating boiler (Remeha 2017) - Rent: € 10,000 per month, excluding gas, water, electricity, TV and internet - Security: two months’ base rent (€ 20,000) - Available immediately - Parking arranged via a permit system and also available off-road (source: Parkeren en verkeer, the municipality of Amsterdam)

Govert Flinckstraat 347,  1074  CC Amsterdam   RENOVATED  2 BEDROOM APARTMENT OF  APPROX  101 M2, IN THE POPULAR  AREA  “DE PIJP”.  Beautiful renovated and  fully furnished  two bedroom apartment, with a spacious living and dining area with open plan kitchen.   SURROUNDINGS: The apartment is located in the popular and lively area “De Pijp”, between the Amstel river and Van Woustraat.  This neighbourhood is famous for its boutique shops, cafes and trendy restaurants. Furthermore, the popular Albert Cuyp market and Sarphatipark are all within walking distance. The property has an excellent connection to public transport, with several tram-, and metro lines (North/South line) all in the near vicinity.   LAY-OUT  Private entrance with staircase leading up to the living area with oak wooden floors.  Light and spacious living room with extra-large sofa and double steel doors that separate the living room from the dining area.  Dining area with large dining table that can seat 8 people next to the open plan kitchen.  This newly renovated fully equipped kitchen has a large cooking island with marble countertop.   Separate guest toilet. Located on the top floor are two good-sized bedrooms.  Modern and renovated bathroom with bathtub, shower, washbasin and second toilet.  Laundry area with washing machine and dryer and a walk-in wardrobe.  Shielded balcony facing South-West.   Overall a beautifully renovated apartment on an excellent location.  PARTICULARS: * Fully Furnished * Total living space approx. 101 m2 * Completely renovated open kitchen  * Spacious dining area * 2 Bedrooms * Modern bathroom with bath and shower.  * Separate walking closet and laundry room * Separate guest toilet.   Available per 17th of February Rental price: € 3.000,-  per month, excluding G/W/E and local tax.  Preferably for rent for expats with owners prior consent.

Schijf u nu  in  op de  projectwebsite om  in aanmerking te komen  voor  een van deze bijzondere woningen.   Midden in het hart van de NDSM-werf, waar  vroeger VOC-schepen  werden gebouwd, waar mammoettankers van de helling rolden en waar op dit moment tal van festivals en andere culturele festiviteiten worden gehouden, ontstaat een plek die tot de verbeelding spreekt. Leven en Wonen staan hier centraal. Met het zicht op het IJ, werken in een nieuw stadsdistrict, maar ook koffie drinken om de hoek. Hier worden maar liefst 30 schitterende nieuwe huurappartementen gerealiseerd. Graag laten we je kennis maken met de huurappartementen van BinnenDok!  De 30 huurappartementen zijn onderdeel van BinnenDok, een gebouw bestaande uit twee woongebouwen en een kantoorgebouw, gelegen aan de NDSM-straat. Het totaal omvat 107 appartementen, waarvan er 30 bestemd zijn voor de verhuur. De koopappartementen zijn inmiddels verkocht. De 30 huurappartementen zijn voornamelijk 2- en 3-kamerappartementen en zijn tussen de 50m2 en 70m2 groot.  Type D 2 - kamerappartement Woonoppervlakte van ca. 51 m2 Balkon van ca. 4 m2 Living met open keuken Keuken van het merk Novitelli met inbouwapparatuur van Whirlpool Eén slaapkamer Badkamer met modern sanitair  Daktuin De daktuin is een gezellige plek om buren en vrienden te ontmoeten. Een tuin voor werken, lunchen, spelen, moestuinieren, zonnen en over het IJ en de NDSM-werf mijmeren.  Bewoners van BinnenDok II ontmoeten elkaar straks in de gezellige daktuin, die op het parkeergebouw wordt aangelegd. Via de 7e verdieping in het woongebouw is de daktuin van ruim 200m² bereikbaar. Het ontwerp van de daktuin is gemaakt door Donker Design. Bij het ontwerpen is rekening gehouden met het versterken van de grote biodiversiteit in de vorm van schuilplaatsen voor insecten en vogels, nestkasten en bij-vriendelijke beplanting. Voor de inrichting zijn de ontwerpers op zoek gegaan naar het maken van ‘besloten ruimtes’ door diverse sferen te creëren. Van oude dukdalven en hergebruikt hout worden bloembakken, zitelementen, banken en een enorme picknicktafel gemaakt. Met behulp van klimop langs staaldraden wordt de pergola de groene kroon op het parkeergebouw.  VOORDELEN VAN EEN GROEN DAK  Beperkend effect op de opwarming van steden Een zuiverend effect op water en lucht Een bijdrage aan de biodiversiteit in je directe omgeving Een vergroening van het leefklimaat in stedelijk gebied   In BinnenDok II zijn straks 30 appartementen te huur. BinnenDok II maakt onderdeel uit van het gebouw BinnenDok bestaande uit totaal 107 appartementen, waarvan 77 appartementen inmiddels zijn verkocht. De 30 huurappartementen worden straks in zes types aangeboden voor verhuur.  Achter het gebouw BinnenDok wordt een parkeervoorziening gerealiseerd met 525 plaatsen. Daarnaast zijn er 70 fietsparkeerplekken voor Blok C. Via blok B (de koopappartementen) zijn deze plekken straks te bereiken.  Alle bewoners van BinnenDok kunnen elkaar straks ontmoeten in de gezellige daktuin, die op het parkeergebouw wordt aangelegd. Op de begane grond komen diverse (winkel)voorzieningen voor de bewoners en de buurt. De bouw van BinnenDok is in het voorjaar 2021 gestart.  De zes types die te huur worden aangeboden hebben een gemiddelde oppervlakte van ca. 60m2 (per type is dit verschillend) en hebben allemaal een balkon. De woningen worden allemaal netjes afgewerkt. Zo worden de wanden voorzien van een vliesbehang en wit gesausd en is de zwevende dekvloer voorzien van houten plinten. De vloer kun je helemaal naar eigen wens zelf plaatsen. De badkamer is voorzien van tegelwerk tot het plafond en ingericht met modern sanitair van Villeroy & Boch. De ingebouwde keuken is van Novitelli en heeft fraaie inbouwapparatuur van Whirlpool.  Voor de huurwoningen zijn meerdere fietsparkeerplekken beschikbaar en enkele appartementen krijgen tevens een externe berging toegewezen van gemiddeld ca. 6 m2.  Let op: In verband met het latere opleveren van de parkeergarage, zal het balkon van type X later opgeleverd worden. Dat komt omdat het balkon van dit type op de parkeergarage gelegen is.

Stylish and modern  upholstered  double upper  house with  four bedrooms, a bathroom,  roof  terrace, two balconies and an  elevator.  This (family) house is a wonderful  place to  come home to.  A tour  The fourth floor Upon entering through its own elevator or staircase, the light through the four large windows immediately appeals to the imagination. The living room with open kitchen is spacious and equipped with a beautiful decorative fireplace and gray cast floor. The kitchen, with cooking island, is located at the rear of the house and is equipped with all modern built-in appliances: such as a Miele steam oven, electric oven, microwave, 5-burner gas stove and a Quooker. There is also access to the first balcony.  The first bedroom, which can be used as a study, is located at the rear of the apartment. There is a separate toilet in the hall.  The fifth floor On this sleeping floor there are three bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with bath, shower, toilet and double sink. At the front are two bedrooms, the larger of which has a walk-in closet. The third bedroom is located at the rear and, just like the hall, offers access to the second balcony. There is a separate toilet in the hall.  The outdoor space The apartment has two balconies on the fourth and fifth floors and a roof terrace of approx. 98m2 with a great view over the city and the museum square.  Area The house is very centrally located on the Paulus Potterstraat, the street that borders the Museumplein on the west side. Neighbors are the Van Gogh Museum, the Rijksmuseum, the Stedelijk Museum and the Concertgebouw. The PC Hooftstraat and Vondelpark are literally around the corner and the canal belt, De Pijp and Leidseplein are within walking distance. This makes the Paulus Potterstraat a sensational location.  All metropolitan facilities are also within easy reach. The Albert Heijn and the Albert Cuijp are within walking distance, and the favorite caterer, butcher and baker can also be found on foot. The farmer's market on Jacob Obrechtplein on Saturdays is a must. The Coffee District symbolizes the high-quality range of facilities.  The property is not only easy to drive by car, but also easily accessible by public transport. Tram lines 2, 3, 5 and 12 and buses 347, 357 and 397 stop in front of the door and around the corner. The bus to Schiphol also has a stop in front of the door, making the airport only 18 minutes away. An unprecedented luxury.  But of course a lot can also be done by bike in Amsterdam; everything is within cycling distance from this central location.  The specifics - Available from April; - Rental price: € 5,650 excl. per month; - Deposit: 2 months rent; - Lease term: fixed period of maximum 24 months, Model B; - Upholstered; - CPI+1%.  Curious? Download the BRSM-magazine or visit the Broersma website.   This information was drafted with the utmost care. This furnished apartment  is  located in  Amsterdam-West, a  ten-minute bike ride from  the  center. This is a modern  2-room  apartment (with 1 bedroom), with excellent  public  transport, supermarkets, shops and  parks close by. The apartment has a living area of 55 m2 and is built in 2008.  Layout: Through your own entrance you reach the ground floor where you will find: hall; bright and spacious living room with underfloor heating and a large sliding door which provides access to an outdoor terrace (35 m2) with modern garden lighting and a covered veranda, located on the southwest; the modern open kitchen with a kitchen island equipped with various built-in appliances (including a dishwasher, cappuccino / espresso machine, fridge / freezer, extractor hood, combi microwave / oven and a ceramic hob); a separate storage room with many storage racks and washing machine; modern marble-tiled bathroom which is equipped with a sink, towel radiator, bath / shower and toilet; 1 bright and spacious bedroom is located at the rear and has a second (adjacent) garden at the front of the house.  Location: The apartment is located in the hip and dynamic Bos & Lommer district. In the immediate vicinity there are various shops, supermarkets (Bos en Lommerplein) for daily shopping. The many streets offer many nice and trendy tents, restaurants and modern catering establishments, spread throughout the neighborhood, so you can enjoy a beer or cup of coffee on a terrace on both Bos & Lommerweg and Bos & Lommerplein. There is a very good connection by car; the Ring A10 and the A5 are a few minutes away and you are in the center in 10 minutes. There are excellent train connections to Schiphol Airport via Station Sloterdijk (7 minutes by bike). Both the Erasmus Park and the Rembrandt Park are a few minutes' walk away. Here you can enjoy the sun in your free time.  • Modern 2-room apartment with a private entrance • Living area of 55 m2, built in 2008 and has an energy label A • 1 bedroom (not suitable for sharers) • Two terraces at the front and rear with a covered veranda (45 m2) • Kitchen island with dishwasher and cappuccino/espresso machine • Storage room with washing machine • Ten minutes by bike from the center • Near Erasmus Park and Rembrandt Park and the A10 ring road • Modern and comfortable bathroom with shower and bath • Fully furnished • Registration is possible • Pets not allowed • Tenant is responsible for connecting utilities

TYPE H-K  Entry  into the  entrance hall  with meter cupboards, spacious  storage  room, separate toilet and stairs  to  the floor. On the west side  the  spacious  living room  with the luxurious open kitchen with cooking island equipped with appliances and access to the balcony facing west.  2nd floor Hallway with spacious storage room for storage/tech with connection for washer/dryer, separate toilet and modern bathroom with double sink and walk-in shower. On the west side three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one bedroom with en-suite the second modern bathroom with double sink, toilet, walk-in shower and bathtub. All apartments of this type are equipped with extra wide PVC flooring, wall finishes, built-in wardrobes, curtains and lighting.  Quartz The graceful stacking of 23 residential floors combined with projecting balconies and the rounded form language is an organic-looking piece of architectural art. Architectural concrete, a high-quality decorative concrete composed of white cement and natural stone granules, has been applied in a variety of ways, from soft smooth to a shiny terrazzo look. The rounded corners and natural form language of the flared balconies enhance views and create visual connections throughout the building.  Special apartments At Quartz, you can choose from particularly pleasant apartments of different sizes and finishes. Apartments starting at 49 square meters up to 152 square meters for the largest penthouse. In the exclusive apartments and penthouses, you will find all the conveniences and features of the luxury apartments, plus extras such as a Quooker tap and other luxury kitchen components. The bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a Grohe shower, washbasin, electric radiator and mirror cabinet. The luxury apartments will be delivered turnkey including PVC floor, net curtains or curtains and lighting throughout the house. The service level of the luxury homes is high and includes a 24-hour reception. Q-Residences has its own parking garage where parking is possible, ask the broker about the conditions.  Three types  LUXURY APARTMENT Starting on the sixth floor, there are ten luxury apartments per floor. Each apartment has a PVC floor with underfloor heating, and underfloor cooling in the summer months. In both the living rooms and bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows allow plenty of natural light into the space. Following on from the open-plan living room is the kitchen, a real eye-catcher with dark cabinet doors with exposed wood structure and a sand-colored composite countertop. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling in a warm light grey color. The luxury apartments range in size from around 49 to 107 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms, and a separate toilet. Each apartment has a spacious balcony.  EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT From the 19th floor onwards, the exclusive apartments are located. These apartments have all the features of the most spacious luxury apartments. The pleasant open living room has a striking, beautiful dark kitchen with Quooker combination tap. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes installed with a dark wood grain finish. The exclusive apartments range from around 62 to 152 m², have one to three bedrooms, one or two bathrooms and a separate toilet.  PENTHOUSE On the 22nd floor are the entrances to eight penthouses situated over two floors. The penthouses have all the design features of the most spacious exclusive apartments plus an en suite bathroom, extra floor with plenty of space, and improbable wide views. The beautiful kitchen with handle less cabinets and Quooker combination faucet is complemented by a Bora hob with extractor on the cooking island - with the panoramic views a guarantee for very special cooking. The penthouses range from around 125 to 152 m², have three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two bathrooms (en suite) and a separate toilet. The floors are accessed internally by an upholstered staircase.  Find out more Living in Quartz means living in a new icon in Amsterdam. If you would like to know more about the different types of homes available in Quartz and express your interest, please visit the project website q-residences.nl/contact. A link to this page is on the project page under the map. Or contact one of the real estate agents.  "This information has been compiled with the necessary care. *** See English  version  below ***   Op  één van de mooiste  plekjes  van IJburg Amsterdam, nabij alle  voorzieningen,  ligt het prachtige complex IJland. De appartementen verschillen  in groottes  van 43 tot 90 m2. Nagenoeg alle appartementen hebben een terras of balkon met uitzicht op het IJmeer of de jachthaven. Als bewoner van IJland heb je daarnaast toegang tot een van de vier op het zuiden gerichte binnentuinen.   - Locatie – Het appartement ligt centraal naast de uitvalswegen A1, A9 en A10. Parkeren kan in de garage onder het appartementencomplex. Met het openbaar vervoer ben je in 15-20 minuten op Amsterdam Centraal Station. Op loopafstand vind je een supermarkt, de jachthaven, diverse restaurants en natuurlijk IJburg strand.  - Bijzonderheden Bert Haanstrakade 596 - • Woonoppervlakte ca. 55 m2 • Ruim 2 kamer appartement op de vierde verdieping • Woonkamer met open keuken • Luxe keuken (Bruynzeel) voorzien van inductiekookplaat, vaatwasser, combimagnetron, koelkast en afzuigkap • Badkamer met douchehoek, wastafel en designradiator • Separate toilet • Berging met aansluiting wasmachine en droger • Bouwjaar: 2010 • Energielabel: A  - Inkomensrichtlijnen -  • Om in aanmerking te komen voor deze woning is het goed te weten dat we hiervoor inkomensrichtlijnen hanteren. Als alleenverdiener bedraagt je bruto maandsalaris (inclusief vakantiegeld en 13e maand) 4x keer de vermelde huurprijs van deze woning. • Voor tweeverdieners tellen wij het tweede inkomen voor 50% mee.   • Rekenvoorbeeld: het bruto (gezamenlijke inkomen) maandinkomen voor een woning die € 1.000,- per maand kost is dus € 4.000 (1.000 x 4). • In sommige gevallen is een waarborgsom verplicht. • Ben je een zelfstandig ondernemer of gepensioneerd? Ga dan voor meer informatie naar onze website: vanderlinden.nl/woning-huren/faq. Na deze periode is deze maandelijks opzegbaar, de opzegtermijn bedraagt één maand.  Alle informatie met betrekking tot de woning is met zorg samengesteld. Deze is echter indicatief en er kunnen geen rechten aan ontleend worden.  ***  The apartment complex IJland is located in IJburg Amsterdam just next to the marina. The apartments very in sizes from 43 to 90 square meter. Almost all apartments have a terrace or balcony with a view over the IJmeer or the marina. As a resident of IJland you also have access to one of the four south-facing enclosed inner gardens.  - Location – The apartment is centrally located next to the highway A1, A9 and A10. There is the possibility to park your car in the garage under the apartment complex. You can reach Amsterdam Central Station in 15-20 minutes by public transport. Within walking distance you can find a supermarket, the marina, various restaurants and of course IJburg beach.  - Facts and features Bert Haanstrakade 596 – • Living space approx. 55 square meter • Spacious 2 room apartment on the 4th floor • Living room with open kitchen • Luxury kitchen (Bruynzeel) with induction cooktop, dishwasher, combi microwave oven, refrigerator and extractor hood • Bathroom with corner shower, sink and design radiator • Separate toilet • Storage room with washing machine and dryer connection • Year of construction: 2010 • Energy label: A  - Income requirements -  • The income requirements for this apartment are at least 4x the monthly rent. • As a single earner your gross monthly salary (including holiday pay and 13th month) should be a minimum of 4x the rent. • A second income from your partner counts for 50%. • Are you self-employed or retired?
